MYC_MESG.HX_QUESR_REVIEW_YN: Indicates whether the history questionnaire has been viewed by a provider in edit mode for this web-based chart system message. Y indicates that the history questionnaire has been viewed, N or a null value indicates that the history questionnaire has not been viewed.
MYC_MESG.HX_QUESR_ENC_CSN_ID: The unique contact serial number for the appt contact if questionnaire is linked to an appt. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).
MYC_MESG.OUTREACH_RUN_ID: This is the campaign outreach configuration template associated with this message.
MYC_MESG.RENEWAL_REQ_SRC_C_NAME: This item stores the request source of a medication renewal request. The  default is 2-Web.
MYC_MESG.REQ_PHARM_FREE_TEXT: If the selected pharmacy was entered by the user as free-text, then it is stored here.
MYC_MESG.HX_QUESR_EDIT_MYPT_ID: Stores the Patient Access Account (WPR) record for the user who last made changes to an in progress history questionnaire
MYC_MESG.HX_QUESR_EDIT_INST_DTTM: Stores the time at which changes were last made to an in progress history questionnaire
MYC_MESG.REFERRAL_ID: The unique ID of the referral this message is associated with.
MYC_MESG.COMM_ID: The customer service record ID corresponding to the message
MYC_MESG.AUTH_REQUEST_ID: The authorization request this message is associated with.
MYC_MESG.INFO_REQ_CSN_ID: The Information Request this message is associated with.
MYC_MESG.NON_HX_QUESR_WITH_HX_DATA_YN: 1 - If WMG stores history data even though the WMG type is not 22 - HISTORY Questionnaire.

MYC_MESG_CHILD._TABLE_: The MYC_MESG_CHILD table contains information about the child message of Secure Patient Message records. Child messages are replies to a Secure Patient Message.
MYC_MESG_CHILD.MESSAGE_ID: The unique identifier for the message record.
MYC_MESG_CHILD.LINE: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
MYC_MESG_CHILD.CHILD_MSG_ID: The child messages for the web based chart system message record. Child messages are replies to the current message.

MYC_MESG_QUESR_ANS._TABLE_: This table stores information on questionnaire answers that have been attached to web based chart system (WMG) messages.  When a patient fills out a message with an attached questionnaire, the resulting message back to the provider will have Questionnaire Answer (HQA) records attached. This table shows those HQA records.
MYC_MESG_QUESR_ANS.MESSAGE_ID: The unique ID used to identify a web based chart system message record.
MYC_MESG_QUESR_ANS.LINE: The line number used to identify each row of read data associated with an individual web based chart system message record.
MYC_MESG_QUESR_ANS.QUESR_ANS_ID: This stores the IDs of the questionnaire answers associated with this message.

MYC_MESG_RTF_TEXT._TABLE_: Patient message content, in RTF format. Replaces item 100 (plain text message body). Further, this content contains only the current message, whereas the plain text item might have appended previous messages in addition to the current message.
MYC_MESG_RTF_TEXT.MESSAGE_ID: The unique identifier for the message record.
MYC_MESG_RTF_TEXT.LINE: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
MYC_MESG_RTF_TEXT.RTF_TXT: The text of a message, in RTF format.

title: Conversations: MYC_CONVO + children → threads
description: MyChart conversation threads with participants, audiences, encounters

IB_MESSAGE_THREAD._TABLE_: Shows information regarding all messages in an HTH thread.
IB_MESSAGE_THREAD.THREAD_ID: Unique message thread ID. A message thread is similar to a conversation in email - it is a series of messages related to the same patient encounter.
IB_MESSAGE_THREAD.ROUTING_COMMENT: Comments attached to the In Basket message being routed. This column will be automatically truncated at 4000 characters.
IB_MESSAGE_THREAD.ATTACHED_NOTE_ID: Note attached to the In Basket message being routed.

MYC_CONVO.THREAD_ID: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the thread record.
MYC_CONVO.PAT_ID: The patient this conversation is about. Currently only ever expected to be one, but that could change in the future.
MYC_CONVO.COMM_ID: Contains a link the communication record created for a customer service conversation. Not all customer service conversations will have this link, its creation is controlled by settings.
MYC_CONVO.SUBJECT: Subject of the conversation.
MYC_CONVO.MYC_MSG_TYP_C_NAME: The MyChart message type of this conversation. This is the primary message type that will be used for messages on this conversation.
MYC_CONVO.PAT_TASK_ID: Stores related patient assigned task ID for the conversation.

MYC_CONVO_ABT_CUST_SVC._TABLE_: Customer service topics associated with the MyChart message conversation.
MYC_CONVO_ABT_CUST_SVC.THREAD_ID: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the thread record.
MYC_CONVO_ABT_CUST_SVC.LINE: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
MYC_CONVO_ABT_CUST_SVC.NCS_TOPIC_C_NAME: Contains the category value of the customer service topic associated with the conversation
MYC_CONVO_ABT_CUST_SVC.TOPIC_DISPLAY_NAME: Contains the name of the customer service topic that was presented to the user that started the conversation. Note that not all customer service topics are presented to the user. Some contexts are hard-coded by the workflow that generates the message.

MYC_CONVO_ABT_MED_ADVICE._TABLE_: Medical advice topic associated with the MyChart message conversation.
MYC_CONVO_ABT_MED_ADVICE.THREAD_ID: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the thread record.
MYC_CONVO_ABT_MED_ADVICE.LINE: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
MYC_CONVO_ABT_MED_ADVICE.MED_ADV_TOPIC_C_NAME: Contains the category value of the medical advice topic that was selected for this conversation. Note that not all medical advice messages may have this data.
MYC_CONVO_ABT_MED_ADVICE.TOPIC_DISPLAY_NAME: Contains the name of the topic that was presented to the user when the conversation was created.

MYC_CONVO_AUDIENCE.THREAD_ID: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the thread record.
MYC_CONVO_AUDIENCE.LINE: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
MYC_CONVO_AUDIENCE.AUDIENCE_USER_ID: MyChart conversation audiences are where the messages that patients send go. These are the users who are the audience of a conversation.
MYC_CONVO_AUDIENCE.AUDIENCE_USER_ID_NAME: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
MYC_CONVO_AUDIENCE.AUDIENCE_DEPARTMENT_ID: MyChart conversation audiences are where the messages that patients send go. These are the departments who are the audience of a conversation.
MYC_CONVO_AUDIENCE.AUDIENCE_DISPLAY_NAME: MyChart conversation audiences are where the messages that patients send go. This is the display name for the corresponding audience pool, user or department.
MYC_CONVO_AUDIENCE.AUDIENCE_PROV_ID: MyChart conversation audiences are where the messages that patients send go. These are providers who are the audience of a conversation.

MYC_CONVO_ENCS._TABLE_: Contains the list of encounters that this message is directly connected to; the encounters created from sending a message. This is not the list of encounters that the conversation is about - for those encounters, see MYC_CONVO_ABT_PAT_ENCS.
MYC_CONVO_ENCS.THREAD_ID: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the thread record.
MYC_CONVO_ENCS.LINE: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
MYC_CONVO_ENCS.PAT_ENC_CSN_ID: Contains the list of encounters that this conversation is attached to.

MYC_CONVO_MSGS.THREAD_ID: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the thread record.
MYC_CONVO_MSGS.LINE: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
MYC_CONVO_MSGS.MESSAGE_ID: This is the list of messages for this MyChart conversation
MYC_CONVO_MSGS.SENT_UTC_DTTM: This is when the corresponding MyChart message was sent

MYC_CONVO_USERS.THREAD_ID: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the thread record.
MYC_CONVO_USERS.LINE: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
MYC_CONVO_USERS.USER_ID: This is the list of all the users who have sent messages on this conversation. This is used for display (with the display name column) and searching.
MYC_CONVO_USERS.USER_ID_NAME: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

MYC_CONVO_VIEWERS.THREAD_ID: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the thread record.
MYC_CONVO_VIEWERS.LINE: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
MYC_CONVO_VIEWERS.MYPT_ID: This is a list of MyChart accounts who can see this thread.

IB_MESSAGE_THREAD.ROUTING_COMMENT: Patient's insurance, AIM with BCBS/Premara, has denied prior authorization for MRI Brain wo Contrast

MYC_CONVO.SUBJECT: Message Your Care Team not working

title: Billing: ARPB_TRANSACTIONS + HSP_ACCOUNT + INVOICE + claims
description: Professional + hospital billing, claims, remittance, invoices

ACCOUNT._TABLE_: Accounts contain information about billing for services, while coverages contain information about insurance payors, benefits, subscribers, and members. This table contains one row for each account record in your system.
ACCOUNT.ACCOUNT_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the guarantor record. This ID number may be encrypted if you have elected to use enterprise reporting�s security utility.
ACCOUNT.ACCOUNT_NAME: This column stores the name for the guarantor record. The name could be hidden if you have elected to use enterprise reporting�s security utility.
ACCOUNT.CONTACT_PERSON: The name of the person to contact for questions regarding the guarantor. This item could be hidden.
ACCOUNT.SEX: The sex of the guarantor. This is extracted as the category abbreviation.
ACCOUNT.IS_ACTIVE: This column indicates whether the guarantor was active at the time of the extract.
ACCOUNT.CITY: The city in which the guarantor lives.
ACCOUNT.STATE_C_NAME: The category value of the state in which the guarantor lives.
ACCOUNT.ZIP: The ZIP Code area in which the guarantor lives.
ACCOUNT.HOME_PHONE: The guarantor�s home phone number (may contain dashes).
ACCOUNT.WORK_PHONE: The guarantor�s work phone number (may contain dashes).
ACCOUNT.ACCOUNT_TYPE_C_NAME: Category value associated with the type of account, such as Personal/Family, Worker�s Comp, etc.
ACCOUNT.REFERRING_PROV_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the referral source for this guarantor.
ACCOUNT.REFERRING_PROV_ID_REFERRING_PROV_NAM: The name of the referral source.
ACCOUNT.SERV_AREA_ID: The ID of the service area (EAF .1) to which this account belongs.
ACCOUNT.FIN_CLASS_C_NAME: The category value of the primary financial class of the guarantor (i.e. commercial, Medicare, self-pay, etc.)
ACCOUNT.TOTAL_BALANCE: The total outstanding balance on the account as of the time of the extract.
ACCOUNT.INSURANCE_BALANCE: The amount of the insurance balance on the guarantor as of the time of the extract.
ACCOUNT.PATIENT_BALANCE: The amount of the self-pay balance on the account as of the time of the extract.
ACCOUNT.BILLING_CYCLE_C: The category value associated with the billing cycle to which the guarantor belongs.
ACCOUNT.BILLING_STATUS_C_NAME: The category value for the billing status used for handling statements for this guarantor, such as Age and Hold Statements, Age and Send Statements, Don�t Age and Hold Statements, and so on.
ACCOUNT.PMT_PLAN_AMOUNT: The dollar amount to be paid per period if a payment plan has been established for this account.
ACCOUNT.PMT_PLAN_STRT_DATE: This column stores the date when the payment plan becomes effective. This column will only be populated if the guarantor is on a payment plan.
ACCOUNT.PMT_PLAN_DUE_DATE: The day of the month when the payment plan amount is due if the account is on a payment plan.
ACCOUNT.LAST_INS_PMT_DATE: The date the most recent insurance payment was received for this account before the enterprise reporting extract.
ACCOUNT.LAST_PAT_PMT_DATE: The date the most recent patient payment was received for this account before the enterprise reporting extract.
ACCOUNT.LAST_PAT_PMT_AMT: The amount of the most recent patient payment received for this account before the enterprise reporting extract.
ACCOUNT.LAST_STMT_DATE: The date the most recent patient statement was sent for the account.
ACCOUNT.CONTRACT_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the pricing contract that was set up with the guarantor.
ACCOUNT.CONTRACT_EXP_DATE: The date on which the contract attached to this guarantor expires.
ACCOUNT.COLLECTOR_USER_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the system user who is the collector assigned to this guarantor. This ID may be encrypted if you have elected to use enterprise reporting�s security utility.
ACCOUNT.COLLECTOR_USER_ID_NAME: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
ACCOUNT.EPIC_ACCT_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the guarantor record. This field will be hidden in a public view of the ACCOUNT table.
ACCOUNT.RESEARCH_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the research study or client record for this guarantor.
ACCOUNT.UNDIST_PMT_YN: Indicates whether the account has any undistributed payments.  Y indicates the account has some undistributed payments.  A null value indicates the account has no undistributed payments.  An N will not be populated for this column.
ACCOUNT.CREDIT_BALANCE_YN: Indicates whether the guarantor has credit balance.  Y indicates the guarantor has credit balance.  A null value indicates the guarantor has no credit balance.  An N will not be populated for this column.
ACCOUNT.PP_AMOUNT_DUE: The Hospital Billing Payment Plan current amount due.
ACCOUNT.PP_CUR_BALANCE: The Hospital Billing Payment Plan current balance.
ACCOUNT.HOM_CLARITY_FLG_YN: This column indicates whether the guarantor should be extracted. If the guarantor is homed it will be extracted, otherwise not: 1-extract, 0-do not extract.
ACCOUNT.HB_BALANCE: This value is the Hospital Billing balance on the guarantor.
ACCOUNT.HB_PREBILL_BALANCE: This value is the Hospital Billing prebilled balance on the account.
ACCOUNT.HB_INSURANCE_BALAN: This value is the Hospital Billing insurance balance on the guarantor, but excludes hospital accounts in external AR or bad debt.
ACCOUNT.HB_SELFPAY_BALANCE: This value is the Hospital Billing self-pay balance on the account, but excludes hospital accounts in external AR, bad debt or that have not yet been billed to self-pay.
ACCOUNT.HB_BADDEBT_BALANCE: This value is the Hospital Billing bad debt balance on the guarantor.
ACCOUNT.HB_UNDISTRIB_BAL: This value is the Hospital Billing undistributed balance on the account, but excludes hospital accounts in external AR or bad debt.
ACCOUNT.HB_INS_AGING_DATE: This column stores the hospital billing insurance aging date.
ACCOUNT.HB_LAST_INS_PMT_DT: This column stores the last hospital billing insurance payment date.
ACCOUNT.HB_LAST_SP_PMT_DT: This column stores the last hospital billing self-pay payment date.
ACCOUNT.SBO_HSP_ACCOUNT_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the default hospital account of the guarantor. The item is only used in single billing office mode.
ACCOUNT.EB_LAST_INFO_ST_DT: This column stores the date the last enterprise non-demand informational statement was generated. Informational statements are those with no self-pay balance for the guarantor.
ACCOUNT.EB_LAST_D_INFO_DT: This column stores the date the last enterprise demand informational statement was generated. Informational statements are those with no self-pay balance for the guarantor.
ACCOUNT.GUAR_REHOMED_YN: Indicates whether a new guarantor was created as a result of running the rehoming report and performing the rehome account action.  Y indicates a new guarantor was created as a result of running the rehoming report and performing the rehome account action.  An N will not be populated for this column.  This item will only be populated if the guarantor is rehomed.
ACCOUNT.OLD_REHOMED_ID: Holds a pointer from the new guarantor to the old guarantor
ACCOUNT.EMPR_ID_CMT: A free text comment that can be entered when the value that is considered to be "Other" is selected as the employer. This option is available only if your organization has chosen to link the account employer to the Employer (EEP) master file in the Facility Profile.
ACCOUNT.PAT_REC_OF_GUAR_ID: If the guarantor is the same person as a patient, this item contains the patient ID.
ACCOUNT.HOUSE_NUM: This column stores the house number for the guarantor's address.
ACCOUNT.NXT_STM_DATE: Specifies the next statement date on the client account
ACCOUNT.CLNT_BILL_FRQNCY_C_NAME: Specifies the statement frequency for this guarantor.  Available options are weekly, monthly, bi-weekly, or weekly and end-of-month.
ACCOUNT.CLNT_BILL_DAY_C_NAME: Specifies the day of the week to generate the client bill on provided that CLNT_BILL_FRQNCY_C is set to weekly or biweekly.
ACCOUNT.CLNT_BILL_DT_MNTH: Specifies the day of the month to bill the client on provided that CLNT_BILL_FRQNCY_C is set to monthly.
ACCOUNT.CLIENT_ACCOUNT_YN: Indicates whether or not this is a client guarantor.
ACCOUNT.PMT_PLAN_DURATION: The payment plan duration in months.
ACCOUNT.PMT_PLAN_ON_TIME_YN: Whether payment plan is on time, "Y" for on time, "N" for not on time.
ACCOUNT.PMT_PLAN_BAL_PD_YN: This column indicates whether the payment plan will be effective until the balance is paid off that is, the payment plan remains effective if new charges occur. This column will only be populated if there is a payment plan.
ACCOUNT.PMT_PLAN_LNKSTMT_YN: Indicates whether the payment plan due day is linked to the statement day.  Y indicates the payment plan due day is linked to the statement day.  This column will only be populated if there is a payment plan.
ACCOUNT.RQG_RELATIONSHIP_C_NAME: This column stores the unique identifier for the guarantor's relationship to the�requisition grouper patient record.
ACCOUNT.HB_BD_SELFPAY_BAL: Self-pay balance of accounts in bad debt that have been billed to self-pay.
ACCOUNT.HB_BD_INSURANCE_BAL: This column stores the total of all insurance buckets for this guarantor's hospital accounts that are in bad debt when using account-based bad debt.
ACCOUNT.HB_BD_UNDISTRIB_BAL: This column stores the total of all undistributed buckets for this guarantor's hospital accounts that are in bad debt when using account-based bad debt.
ACCOUNT.COUNTY_C_NAME: The category number for the county of the guarantor's billing address.
ACCOUNT.COUNTRY_C_NAME: The category number for the country of the guarantor's billing address.
ACCOUNT.EMPY_STAT_C_NAME: The category number for the guarantor's employment status.
ACCOUNT.GUAR_EMPR_CITY: The city of the guarantor's employer.
ACCOUNT.GUAR_EMPR_STATE_C_NAME: The category number for the state of the guarantor's employer.
ACCOUNT.GUAR_EMPR_ZIP: The ZIP code of the guarantor's employer.
ACCOUNT.GUAR_EMP_CNTRY_C_NAME: The category number for the country of the guarantor's employer.
ACCOUNT.LANGUAGE_C_NAME: The category value for the preferred language of the guarantor.
ACCOUNT.HB_LAST_STMT_DATE: This column contains the date of the last statement sent to the guarantor.
ACCOUNT.HB_NEXT_STMT_DATE: This column contains the date of the next statement to be sent to the guarantor.
ACCOUNT.HB_LAST_DEMAND_DATE: This column contains the date of the last demand statement to be sent to the guarantor.
ACCOUNT.HB_BILL_NOTE_EXP_DT: This column contains the expiration date of the billing note on this guarantor.
ACCOUNT.HB_PP_MONTHLY_DUE: This column contains the monthly payment due on a hospital account for a payment plan.
ACCOUNT.HB_PP_CUR_HAR_DUE: Current amount due on a hospital account for a payment plan.
ACCOUNT.HB_PP_INIT_HAR_BAL: The initial balance on the hospital account when the payment plan starts.
ACCOUNT.GUAR_VERIF_STAT_C_NAME: The category number of the guarantor verification status.
ACCOUNT.LAST_VERIF_DT: This column contains the date of the last verification of the associated guarantor.
ACCOUNT.NEXT_REVIEW_DT: Next date this guarantor's verification should be reviewed.
ACCOUNT.LAST_VERIF_USER_ID: This column stores the unique identifier of the last user to verify the guarantor.
ACCOUNT.LAST_VERIF_USER_ID_NAME: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
ACCOUNT.GUAR_EMP_HOUSE_NUM: The house number of the guarantor's employer.
ACCOUNT.GUAR_EMPR_DISTR_C_NAME: The category number for the district of the guarantor's employer.
ACCOUNT.GUAR_VERIF_ID: The verification record of the guarantor.
ACCOUNT.CONF_NAM_OF_ASSC_PT: This item contains the confidential name of the associated patient, if it exists. This name is used to determine the confidential nature of the guarantor.
ACCOUNT.EXT_BD_SP_BAL: This value is the Professional Billing external AR bad debt self-pay balance.
ACCOUNT.EXT_BD_INS_BAL: This value is the Professional Billing external AR bad debt insurance balance.
ACCOUNT.PB_EXT_SP_BAL: This value is the Professional Billing external AR self-pay balance for the account.
ACCOUNT.PB_EXT_INS_BAL: This value is the Professional Billing external AR insurance balance for the account.

ACCOUNT_2._TABLE_: Accounts contain information about billing for services, while coverages contain information about insurance payors, benefits, subscribers, and members. This table contains one row for each account record in your system. This table is the continuation of the ACCOUNT table.
ACCOUNT_2.ACCT_ID: The unique identifier for the account record.
ACCOUNT_2.EMPL_ID_NUM: Employee ID number of the guarantor.
ACCOUNT_2.ALT_BILL_ADDR_YN: Indicates whether the Alternate Billing Address is used. "Y" indicates that the Alternate Billing Address is used. "N" indicates that the Alternate Billing Address is not used.
ACCOUNT_2.ALT_BILL_CITY: This is the city on the Alternate Billing Address.
ACCOUNT_2.ALT_BILL_STATE_C_NAME: The category value of the state on the Alternate Billing Address.
ACCOUNT_2.ALT_BILL_ZIP: This is the zip code on the Alternate Billing Address.
ACCOUNT_2.RQG_ACCT_YN: Indicates whether this is a requisition grouper account.
ACCOUNT_2.GUAR_SYNC_OWNER_ID: When using guarantor account syncing, this item is the record pointer to the owning guarantor account, if one exists.
ACCOUNT_2.EAR_ISOLATED_YN: This flag is set if the guarantor is considered "isolated" for patient data restrictions.  Isolated guarantors are guarantors created from isolated patients.
ACCOUNT_2.CVG_LAST_VERIF_DT: Contains the date that the corresponding coverage was last verified.
ACCOUNT_2.USER_CVG_LST_VER_ID: Contains the date that the corresponding coverage was last verified.
ACCOUNT_2.USER_CVG_LST_VER_ID_NAME: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
ACCOUNT_2.EMPLOYMENT_DATE: The date the guarantor was employed.
ACCOUNT_2.FAX: The fax number associated with this guarantor account.
ACCOUNT_2.LAST_CLAIM_DATE: Last date the claim was produced
ACCOUNT_2.ACCT_VIP_STAT_YN: Indicates whether there is VIP status for this account. Y indicates the account has VIP status. N indicates the account does not have VIP status.
ACCOUNT_2.HBMYC_LST_ST_V_DTTM: The date and time when a Hospital Billing statement was last viewed in MyChart by this guarantor. This field will be updated when either a guarantor-level or hospital account-level statement is viewed in MyChart for this guarantor.  The date and time for this column is stored in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC) and can be converted to local time by using the EFN_UTC_TO_LOCAL Clarity database function.
ACCOUNT_2.HBMYC_LST_DB_V_DTTM: The date and time when a Hospital Billing detail bill was last viewed in MyChart by this guarantor.  The date and time for this column is stored in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC) and can be converted to local time by using the EFN_UTC_TO_LOCAL Clarity database function.
ACCOUNT_2.HBMYC_LST_LT_V_DTTM: The date and time when a Hospital Billing letter was last viewed in MyChart by this guarantor. This field will be updated when either a guarantor-level or hospital account-level letter is viewed in MyChart for this guarantor.  The date and time for this column is stored in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC) and can be converted to local time by using the EFN_UTC_TO_LOCAL Clarity database function.
ACCOUNT_2.PROPENSITY_TO_PAY_C_NAME: Category describing the likelihood for this guarantor to pay.
ACCOUNT_2.FOL_UP_LAST_LET_DT: Date the last follow-up letter was sent.
ACCOUNT_2.UNDIST_INS_CR_BAL: Account undistributed credit balance - insurance credits only.
ACCOUNT_2.UNDIST_SP_CR_BAL: Account undistributed credit balance - self-pay credits only.
ACCOUNT_2.DELIVERY_POINT: The billing delivery point is a two digit extension to the nine digit US zip code, with values from 00 to 99.
ACCOUNT_2.MILITARY_RANK_C_NAME: This column stores the military rank to which the patient's guarantor belongs.
ACCOUNT_2.BRANCH_OF_SERVICE_C_NAME: This column stores the military branch of service to which the guarantor belongs.
ACCOUNT_2.MIL_COMPONENT_C_NAME: This column stores the guarantor's military component, which is used to distinguish between guarantors who are on regular active duty and those who are members of one of the augmenting support groups.
ACCOUNT_2.MIL_PAY_GRADE_C_NAME: This column stores the military pay grade to which the patient's guarantor belongs.
ACCOUNT_2.DIST_LATER_COUNT: Number of undistributed credits that are marked as for later distribution in this account.
ACCOUNT_2.GUAR_EMPR_COUNTY_C_NAME: The category value corresponding to the county in which the guarantor's employer is located.
ACCOUNT_2.ALT_BILL_COUNTY_C_NAME: The category number for the alternate county of the guarantor's billing address.
ACCOUNT_2.ALT_BILL_COUNTRY_C_NAME: The category number for the alternate country of the guarantor's billing address.
ACCOUNT_2.ALT_BILL_HOUSE_NUM: The alternate billing house number for the guarantor.
ACCOUNT_2.ALT_BILL_DISTRICT_C_NAME: The category number for the alternate district of the guarantor's billing address.
ACCOUNT_2.STMT_HOLD_DT: The most recent date on which the account was held from the Professional Billing (PB) statement processing.
ACCOUNT_2.STMT_HOLD_REASON_C_NAME: The reason why the account was held in Professional Billing statement processing.
ACCOUNT_2.MYPT_ID: The unique ID of the MyChart account that is linked to this guarantor record. This is used when the guarantor is not a patient in the system but needs to have access to the billing information in MyChart.
ACCOUNT_2.GUAR_SUBDIV_CODE_C_NAME: Capture the guarantor's country subdivision code.
ACCOUNT_2.FOL_UP_LAST_LEVEL: This retains the value of the current follow up level (I EAR 3007) when a letter was last generated.
ACCOUNT_2.PMT_PLAN_DLQ_AMT: This is the sum of delinquent payment plan payments.
ACCOUNT_2.PMT_PLAN_DUE_AMT: This includes both the delinquent amount and the amount due for the current month.
ACCOUNT_2.PMT_PLAN_PAID_AMT: This is the total amount of the payment plan payments.
ACCOUNT_2.PMT_PLAN_REMAIN_AMT: This is the remaining amount of the payment plan.
ACCOUNT_2.HB_EXT_AR_SELF_PAY_BAL: This item stores the Hospital Billing (HB) external Accounts Receivable (AR) self-pay balance for the account.
ACCOUNT_2.HB_EXT_AR_INS_BAL: This item stores the Hospital Billing (HB) external Accounts Receivable (AR) insurance balance for the account.
ACCOUNT_2.HB_EXT_AR_UNDIST_BAL: This item stores the Hospital Billing (HB) external Accounts Receivable (AR) undistributed balance for the account.
ACCOUNT_2.HB_LAST_AUTOPAY_DATE: The most recent Auto Pay date for guarantor set up with a payment plan on Auto Pay.
ACCOUNT_2.EMAIL_ADDRESS: Email address documented on the guarantor.   Any clarity report looking for the guarantor's email address must search in the following sequence, and use the first found one: - The primary email address from the associated patient of the guarantor.  - The email address from the MyChart account associated with the guarantor. - The email address returned by this clarity column.
ACCOUNT_2.ADDR_CHG_USER_ID: The user who initiated the linked address changes.
ACCOUNT_2.ADDR_CHG_USER_ID_NAME: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
ACCOUNT_2.ADDR_CHG_INSTANT_DTTM: The instant that the linked address change was initiated.
ACCOUNT_2.ADDR_CHG_SOURCE: The source record that initiated the linked address changes.
ACCOUNT_2.PREFERENCE_ID: The ID number of the communication preferences record for the guarantor.
ACCOUNT_2.PMT_PLAN_CURRENT_MISS_CNT: This item will store the number of payments that are currently late on the payment plan
ACCOUNT_2.PMT_PLAN_TOTAL_MISS_CNT: This item will store the total number of missed payments on the account's payment plan.
ACCOUNT_2.PMT_PLAN_AUTOPAY_CARD_ID: Credit card associated with the payment plan. This credit card will be charged automatically when an installment is due for the payment plan.  This column will be deprecated in the future release as the payment plan is being transitioned to use the scheduled payment framework.  Once the transition is complete, reference the scheduled payment record for the current credit card.
ACCOUNT_2.PB_PP_AUTOPAY_SCHED_PMT_ID: The scheduled payment record (BSP) associated with the guarantor's payment plan. Scheduled payment record is used to define the auto pay payment plan terms, including the payment method, day to trigger payment, and monthly amount.
ACCOUNT_2.PMT_PLAN_CURR_AMT: If Guarantor is on autopayment plan using Scheduled Payment architecture, this item stores the monthly amount to be used for this payment plan cycle if the value is different than the updated payment plan monthly amount in payment plan amount.
ACCOUNT_2.KI_GUAR_ACCT_VERIF_DATE: This item indicates the most recent date the patient verified the self-guarantor billing information is correct in Welcome.
ACCOUNT_2.KI_GUAR_ACCT_VERIF_STS_C_NAME: This item indicates the most recent patient-selected status of whether the self-guarantor billing information is correct in Welcome.
ACCOUNT_2.LAST_PB_BAL_NOTIF_DATE: The date on which the last balance notification was sent to the guarantor for their Professional Billing (PB) balances.
ACCOUNT_2.LAST_HB_BAL_NOTIF_DATE: The date on which the last balance notification was sent to the guarantor for their Hospital Billing (HB) / Single Billing Office (SBO) balances.
ACCOUNT_2.PB_SELF_PAY_BAL_UPDATE_DATE: This is updated based on changes to patient balance.
ACCOUNT_2.HB_SELF_PAY_BAL_UPDATE_DATE: This is updated based on changes to Hospital Billing (HB) self-pay balance (I EAR 20003).

ACCOUNT_3._TABLE_: Accounts contain information about billing for services, while coverages contain information about insurance payors, benefits, subscribers, and members. This table contains one row for each account record in your system.
ACCOUNT_3.ACCOUNT_ID: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the account record.
ACCOUNT_3.PNB_TYPE_C_NAME: The Posted Not Billed rule type category ID for the guarantor account.
ACCOUNT_3.ALWAYS_SELF_PAY_YN: Indicates whether this account should always be self-pay.
ACCOUNT_3.REFERRAL_SOURCE_COMMENT: The comment associated with the referral source in ACCOUNT.REFERRAL_SOURCE.
ACCOUNT_3.BILLING_TITLE_C_NAME: The category ID of the title used to address the person associated with the guarantor account.
ACCOUNT_3.HB_NEXT_BAL_NOTIF_DT: The date on which the next balance notification will be sent to the guarantor for their HB/SBO balances.
ACCOUNT_3.HB_NEXT_AUTOPAY_DT: The next Auto Pay date for guarantor set up with a payment plan on Auto Pay.
ACCOUNT_3.PB_NEXT_BAL_NOTIF_DT: Stores the date on which the next balance notification will be sent to the guarantor for their PB balances.
ACCOUNT_3.FAMILY_INCOME: The annual family income for this account.
ACCOUNT_3.CLEAR_FOLLOWUP_FLAG: Stores whether the account should be considered for a new follow-up cycle by nightly processing.
ACCOUNT_3.FOL_UP_LETTER: The follow-up letter associated with the account.
ACCOUNT_3.FOL_UP_TEMPLATE: The comma-delimited string of SmartText records associated with the account.
ACCOUNT_3.FAMILY_SIZE: The number of family members associated with the account.
ACCOUNT_3.OUTSTANDING_ACCT_C_NAME: This column specifies if the account is outstanding or not.
ACCOUNT_3.PMT_PLAN_SECOND_DUE_DT: Contains the day of the month that the second bi-monthly payment is due.
ACCOUNT_3.PMT_PLAN_EXP_AMT: The expected paid amount of the payment plan. This amount is updated by nightly processing. The amount is incremented by the monthly amount when the closed batch date equals the current due date.
ACCOUNT_3.PMT_PLAN_NEXT_DUE_DT: Next due date of the payment plan. The date is updated by nightly processing when the closed batch date is the current due date.
ACCOUNT_3.PMT_PLAN_AUTOPAY_DUE_DT: The date when the card will be charged for the auto-pay payment plan.
ACCOUNT_3.PMT_PLAN_AUTOPAY_DAY: The day of the month when card will be automatically charged.
ACCOUNT_3.STMT_HOLD_REASON_TEXT: The free text information related to the reason why the account was held in PB statement processing.
ACCOUNT_3.HB_IN_PROG_SP_BAL: This item stores the HB self-pay balance of in progress accounts for the guarantor, excluding hospital accounts in external AR or bad debt. In progress accounts are those that have not yet been billed to self-pay.
ACCOUNT_3.HB_IN_PROG_BAD_DEBT_SP_BAL: This item stores the HB self-pay balance of in progress bad debt accounts for the guarantor. In progress accounts are those that have not yet been billed to self-pay.
ACCOUNT_3.HB_IN_PROG_EXTERNAL_AR_SP_BAL: This item stores the HB self-pay balance of in progress external AR accounts for the guarantor. In progress accounts are those that have not yet been billed to self-pay.
ACCOUNT_3.HB_CONTEST_SP_BAL: This item stores the HB self-pay balance of contested accounts for the guarantor, excluding hospital accounts in external AR or bad debt.
ACCOUNT_3.HB_CONTEST_BAD_DEBT_SP_BAL: This item stores the HB bad debt self-pay balance of contested accounts for the guarantor.
ACCOUNT_3.HB_CONTEST_EXTERNAL_AR_SP_BAL: This item stores the HB External AR self-pay balance of contested accounts for the guarantor.
ACCOUNT_3.DECLINED_FA_UTC_DTTM: The most recent time a guarantor declined financial assistance.
ACCOUNT_3.PB_CONTEST_SP_BAL: The total contested PB HAR balance for the guarantor
ACCOUNT_3.PB_CONTEST_EXTERNAL_AR_SP_BAL: The total contested external A/R PB HAR balance for the guarantor
ACCOUNT_3.EB_PMT_PLAN_SCHED_PMT_ID: The unique ID of the HB/SBO payment plan agreement record for this guarantor.

ACCOUNT_CONTACT._TABLE_: This table contains the information recorded in billing system account contact for each account. Each row in this table contains information about one contact and is uniquely identified by the Account ID and line number combination.
ACCOUNT_CONTACT.ACCOUNT_ID: The unique ID for the account record. This ID number could be encrypted if you have elected to implement enterprise reporting�s encryption security function.
ACCOUNT_CONTACT.LINE: Line number to identify the account contact information within the account.
ACCOUNT_CONTACT.CONTACT_DATE: The date the contact was recorded.
ACCOUNT_CONTACT.USER_ID: The ID of the system user who recorded the contact. This ID may be encrypted if you have elected to use enterprise reporting�s security utility.
ACCOUNT_CONTACT.USER_ID_NAME: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
ACCOUNT_CONTACT.CONTACT_STATUS_C_NAME: The category value associated with the activity performed by collections staff on the account, such as No Contact, Check Mailed, Promised Payment, etc.
ACCOUNT_CONTACT.TICKLER_DATE: The date the account should be contacted again.
ACCOUNT_CONTACT.LETTER_NUMBER: The letter number of the letter associated with this guarantor.
ACCOUNT_CONTACT.REFUND_REQ_ID: Stores payment transaction numbers of a refund request for the Account Contact activity.
ACCOUNT_CONTACT.REFUND_REQ_STATUS_C_NAME: Stores the refund request status associated with the Account Contact activity.
ACCOUNT_CONTACT.REFUND_REQ_AMT: Stores the amount of the refund request associated with the activity.
ACCOUNT_CONTACT.PAYMENT_TXS: A comma-delimited list of follow-up transactions.
ACCOUNT_CONTACT.FOL_UP_ACT_INFO: This item stores the activity info to be displayed in account contact.
ACCOUNT_CONTACT.LETTER_SUMMARY: A short summary of the letter that was sent to the patient. This can be customized by your organization, and may include information like the patient's name, address and balance.
ACCOUNT_CONTACT.LETTER_STATUS_C_NAME: The letter status category ID for the guarantor, for example "queued" or "sent".
ACCOUNT_CONTACT.NOTE_ID: The ID of the note associated with this contact.
ACCOUNT_CONTACT.FOL_UP_HX_CRM_ID: Stores the ID for an customer service record that is related to the guarantor.
ACCOUNT_CONTACT.FOL_UP_NOTE: Each guarantor account may have a follow-up note posted to it per contact. This column holds either a system generated or custom note that further describes the contact, if a note was produced.
ACCOUNT_CONTACT.PAPERLESS_UPD_WHY_C_NAME: Reason for updating the guarantor's MyChart paperless billing status.

ACCOUNT_CONTACT_2._TABLE_: This table contains the information recorded in billing system account contact for each account. Each row in this table contains information about one contact and is uniquely identified by the Account ID and line number combination.
ACCOUNT_CONTACT_2.ACCT_ID: The unique ID for the account record. This ID number could be encrypted if you have elected to implement enterprise reporting�s encryption security function.
ACCOUNT_CONTACT_2.LINE: Line number to identify the account contact information within the account.
ACCOUNT_CONTACT_2.FOL_UP_MYC_USER_ID: The ID of the MyChart user who created the contact. This ID may be encrypted if you have elected to use enterprise reporting�s security utility.
ACCOUNT_CONTACT_2.PAY_PLAN_SOURCE_C_NAME: The source workflow category ID that set up the payment plan for the guarantor.

ACCOUNT_CREATION._TABLE_: The items populated at the time a guarantor account is created.
ACCOUNT_CREATION.ACCT_ID: The unique identifier for the guarantor record.
ACCOUNT_CREATION.CONTACT_DATE_REAL: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.
ACCOUNT_CREATION.CONTACT_DATE: The date of this contact in calendar format.
ACCOUNT_CREATION.ACCOUNT_CREATOR: Name of user who created a guarantor account

ACCT_ADDR._TABLE_: This table contains one row for each line of the billing address of a guarantor account.
ACCT_ADDR.ACCOUNT_ID: The unique identifier for the guarantor record. This column is frequently used to link to the ACCOUNT table
ACCT_ADDR.ADDRESS_LINE: The line number for the guarantor billing address. This line number represents a single line of a guarantor's billing address.
ACCT_ADDR.ADDRESS: This represents the guarantor's street address. Each ACCOUNT_ID value represents a different guarantor account and each ADDRESS_LINE value represents a different line of that guarantor's address.

ACCT_COVERAGE._TABLE_: This table contains coverage lists for every accounts receivable (EAR) record.
ACCT_COVERAGE.ACCOUNT_ID: The unique account record ID. This ID number may be encrypted if you have elected to use enterprise reporting�s security utility.
ACCT_COVERAGE.LINE: Line number to identify the status information within the account.
ACCT_COVERAGE.COVERAGE_ID: The coverage ID for the guarantor record.

ACCT_GUAR_PAT_INFO._TABLE_: This table contains information about the account guarantor - patient relationship.
ACCT_GUAR_PAT_INFO.ACCOUNT_ID: The unique ID for the account. This ID number could by encrypted if you have elected to implement enterprise reporting�s encryption security function.
ACCT_GUAR_PAT_INFO.LINE: Line number to uniquely identify the patient within the guarantor account.
ACCT_GUAR_PAT_INFO.PAT_ID: The unique ID for the patient related to the guarantor of the account.
ACCT_GUAR_PAT_INFO.GUAR_REL_TO_PAT_C_NAME: The relationship of the patient to the guarantor of the account (e.g. Mother, Brother, Legal Guardian, etc.)
ACCT_GUAR_PAT_INFO.PATIENT_ADDR_LINKED_YN: Indicates whether the patient address and the guarantor address are linked.

ACCT_HOME_PHONE_HX._TABLE_: This table contains the guarantor's home phone history.
ACCT_HOME_PHONE_HX.ACCOUNT_ID: The unique identifier for the account record.
ACCT_HOME_PHONE_HX.LINE: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
ACCT_HOME_PHONE_HX.CHANGE_DATE: The date the home phone number was changed.
ACCT_HOME_PHONE_HX.PHONE_NUMBER: The home phone number on the account.
ACCT_HOME_PHONE_HX.CHANGE_SOURCE_C_NAME: The source of the change of the home phone number.

ACCT_TX._TABLE_: This tables stores the unique IDs of the transaction (ETR) records  for account records.
ACCT_TX.ACCOUNT_ID: The unique identifier for the guarantor record.
ACCT_TX.LINE: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
ACCT_TX.TX_ID: The unique ID associated with the transaction record for this row.  This column is frequently used to link to the ARPB_TRANSACTIONS table.

ARPB_AUTH_INFO._TABLE_: Stores authorization information for a charge transaction.
ARPB_AUTH_INFO.TX_ID: The unique identifier for the transaction record.
ARPB_AUTH_INFO.LINE: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
ARPB_AUTH_INFO.OVRD_AUTH_CVG_ID: Lists all the coverages on the guarantor account for this transaction.
ARPB_AUTH_INFO.OVRD_AUTH_NUM: Stores the authorization number received from payor. This item is never automatically populated by the system. Users have to manually enter.
ARPB_AUTH_INFO.AUTH_SOURCE_C_NAME: The authorization source type category ID of the authorization source for the transaction.
ARPB_AUTH_INFO.AUTH_ID: List of linked Authorization records based on coverages.
ARPB_AUTH_INFO.AUTH_OVRIDE_USER_ID: This stores the user that was responsible for the last authorization assignment.
ARPB_AUTH_INFO.AUTH_OVRIDE_USER_ID_NAME: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
ARPB_AUTH_INFO.AUTH_UPDATE_DTTM: This stores the last time an authorization was assigned.
ARPB_AUTH_INFO.INCL_IN_AUTH_CHG_CNT_YN: This column indicates whether the charge contributes to the used count of the authorization linked to it.

ARPB_CHG_ENTRY_DX._TABLE_: The table lists all diagnoses on a charge entry session in which the charge was posted.
ARPB_CHG_ENTRY_DX.TX_ID: The unique internal ID of the transaction record representing this charge.
ARPB_CHG_ENTRY_DX.LINE: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
ARPB_CHG_ENTRY_DX.DX_ID: The diagnosis internal ID (EDG .1) associated with the charge entry session.  This diagnosis is from the primary codeset.
ARPB_CHG_ENTRY_DX.DX_QUALIFIER_C_NAME: Qualifier for the diagnosis on this line.  Indicates if diagnosis is:  1 - Active 2 - Acute 3 - Chronic 4 - Inactive 5 - Temporary

ARPB_TRANSACTIONS._TABLE_: This table contains information about professional billing transactions.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.TX_ID: A transaction's unique internal identification number. A patient's record can include charges, payments, or adjustments and the patient's account balance will reflect these transactions.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.POST_DATE: The date when a transaction is entered into the billing system.  This differs from the service date, which is the date when the service was performed.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.SERVICE_DATE: The date a medical service is performed.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.TX_TYPE_C_NAME: The type of this transaction: Charge, payment or adjustment.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.ACCOUNT_ID: The internal ID of the record that maintains the patient's transactions. A patient may use more than one account and an account may contain more than one patient.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.DEBIT_CREDIT_FLAG_NAME: This column contains a 1 if the transaction is a debit and a -1 if the transaction is a credit. A charge is always a debit, a payment is always a credit, and an adjustment can be either a debit or a credit.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.SERV_PROVIDER_ID: The internal identifier of the provider who performed the medical services on the patient.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.BILLING_PROV_ID: The billing provider associated with the transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.DEPARTMENT_ID: The department ID of the department associated with the transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.POS_ID: The place of service ID of the place of service associated with the transaction
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.LOC_ID: The location ID of the location associated with the transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.SERVICE_AREA_ID: The service area ID of the service area associated with the transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.MODIFIER_ONE: The first procedure modifier associated with this transaction. This is the external modifier, as it would be printed on the claim.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.MODIFIER_TWO: The second procedure modifier associated with this transaction. This is the external modifier, as it would be printed on the claim.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.MODIFIER_THREE: The third procedure modifier associated with this transaction. This is the external modifier, as it would be printed on the claim.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.MODIFIER_FOUR: The fourth procedure modifier associated with this transaction. This is the external modifier, as it would be printed on the claim.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.PRIMARY_DX_ID: The primary diagnosis ID associated with the transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.DX_TWO_ID: The second diagnosis ID associated with the transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.DX_THREE_ID: The third diagnosis ID associated with the transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.DX_FOUR_ID: The fourth diagnosis ID associated with the transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.DX_FIVE_ID: The fifth diagnosis ID associated with the transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.DX_SIX_ID: The sixth diagnosis ID associated with the transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.PROCEDURE_QUANTITY: The quantity as entered in Charge Entry for the procedure of this transaction (TX_ID). If the row has a DETAIL_TYPE value of 10-13, this column displays a negative value. If the row has a DETAIL_TYPE value of 20-33, 43-45, 50, or 51, this column displays a zero.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.AMOUNT: The original amount of this transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.OUTSTANDING_AMT: The outstanding amount of the transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.INSURANCE_AMT: The insurance portion of the transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.PATIENT_AMT: The patient or self-pay portion of the transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.VOID_DATE: If this transaction is voided, this column will have the date in which this transaction is voided.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.LAST_ACTION_DATE: This column contains the most recent date when an action is performed on this transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.PROV_SPECIALTY_C_NAME: This column contains the provider specialty of the provider associated with the transaction. The procedure category of the charge on the transaction may affect what specialty is recorded here and in the "Encounter Specialty" displayed in Hyperspace.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.PROC_ID: The Procedure ID of the procedure associated with the transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.TOTAL_MATCH_AMT: This column contains the total amount matched to the transaction, including adjustments.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.TOTAL_MTCH_INS_AMT: This column contains the total insurance amount matched to the transaction, including adjustments.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.TOTAL_MTCH_ADJ: This column contains the total adjustment amount matched to the transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.TOTAL_MTCH_INS_ADJ: This column contains the total insurance adjustment amount matched to the transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.REPOST_ETR_ID: This is the repost source transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.REPOST_TYPE_C_NAME: The repost type category ID for the transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.DISCOUNT_TYPE_C_NAME: The discount type category ID for the transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.PAT_ENC_CSN_ID: The Contact Serial Number for the patient encounter with which this transaction is associated. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in your system.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.ENC_FORM_NUM: The encounter form number corresponding to the charge transaction. If you are not using encounter forms, a negative number is stored in this item.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.BEN_SELF_PAY_AMT: Stores the adjudicated self-pay amount calculated by the benefits engine
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.BEN_ADJ_COPAY_AMT: Stores the copay part of the adjudicated self-pay amount calculated by the benefits engine
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.BEN_ADJ_COINS_AMT: Stores the coinsurance part of the adjudicated self-pay amount calculated by the benefits engine
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.VISIT_NUMBER: This item stores the visit number for this transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.REFERRAL_ID: This item stores the Referral (RFL) ID for this transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.ORIGINAL_EPM_ID: This item stores the original payor (EPM) ID for this transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.ORIGINAL_FC_C_NAME: This item stores the original financial class for this transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.ORIGINAL_CVG_ID: This item stores the original coverage (CVG) ID for this transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.PAYOR_ID: This item stores the current payor (EPM) ID for this transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.COVERAGE_ID: This item stores the current coverage (CVG) ID for this transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.ASGN_YN: This item stores the assignment flag for a coverage.  This item is set to Yes if the charge is currently assigned to the payor in the PAYOR_ID column.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.FACILITY_ID: This item stores the facility (EAF) ID for this transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.PAYMENT_SOURCE_C_NAME: This item stores the payment source for credit transactions. This is a list of possible sources including Cash, Check, Credit Card, etc.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.USER_ID: This item stores the user who posted the transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.USER_ID_NAME: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.NOT_BILL_INS_YN: Indicates whether the transaction is marked for do not bill insurance.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.CHG_ROUTER_SRC_ID: This item stores the universal charge line (UCL) ID for this transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.RECEIVE_DATE: This item stores the charge entry batch receive date.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.CE_CODED_DATE: The date this�charge session was coded, from charge entry.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.PANEL_ID: The ID of the panel procedure that generated this transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.BILL_AREA_ID: Networked to BIL: the Bill Area for this transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.BILL_AREA_ID_BILL_AREA_NAME: The record name of this bill area, financial subdivision, or financial division.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.CREDIT_SRC_MODULE_C_NAME: The module that creates a payment or credit adjustment
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.UPDATE_DATE: The date that this row was last updated.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.CLAIM_DATE: The most recent date that this transaction has been on an accepted claim run.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.IPP_INV_NUMBER: This item stores the original invoice number that user posts to in GUI payment posting or remittance.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS.IPP_INV_ID: This item stores the original invoice ID that user posts to in�graphical user interface�(GUI) payment posting or remittance.

ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2._TABLE_: This table contains information about professional billing transactions.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.TX_ID: The unique identifier for the transaction record.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.EB_PMT_TOTAL_AMT: Displays the enterprise payment total amount.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.FIN_DIV_ID: The Financial Division for this transaction.  Taken from the ETR listed or from the associated Bill Area, as found in ARPB_TRANSACTIONS
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.FIN_DIV_ID_BILL_AREA_NAME: The record name of this bill area, financial subdivision, or financial division.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.FIN_SUBDIV_ID: The Financial Subdivision for this transaction.  Taken from the ETR listed or from the associated Bill Area, as found in ARPB_TRANSACTIONS
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.FIN_SUBDIV_ID_BILL_AREA_NAME: The record name of this bill area, financial subdivision, or financial division.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.RESEARCH_STUDY_ID: The record ID for the research study or client associated with the charge.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.RSH_MOD_TYPE_C_NAME: The research billing modifier type for a research study related charge.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.RSH_ORIG_ACCOUNT_ID: Stores the original patient account for charges billed to the guarantor account related to a research study.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.OUTSTANDING_FLAG_C_NAME: The type of balance category ID for the transaction
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.VST_DO_NOT_BIL_I_YN: This item indicates whether the visit has been marked as do not bill insurance.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.TREATMENT_PLAN_CSN: The contact serial number of the treatment plan that generated the order, which generated this charge.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.TX_ENTERED_INSTANT_DTTM: The transaction entered instant (date and time in UTC) for manually posted payments. The transaction filing instant (date and time in UTC) for electronically posted payments.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.CVG_PLAN_ON_PMT_ID: This column contains the coverage plan associated with the invoice number stamped on an insurance payment or credit adjustment.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.REVERSED_PMT_TX_ID: For the negation payment generated during a payment reversal, this item stores the transaction ID of the original payment.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.PMT_REVERSAL_TX_ID: This virtual item returns the reversal transaction ID for a reversed payment.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.STMT_HOLD_DT: The most recent date on which the transaction was held from the Professional Billing statement processing.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.STMT_HOLD_REASON_C_NAME: The reason why the transaction was held in PB statement processing.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.REPOST_REASON_C_NAME: If this transaction was reposted from another, this contains the category value of the reason the transaction was reposted.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.SUSP_NRP_INDICATOR_YN: This item indicates whether NRP is currently suspended.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.SUSP_NRP_INST_DTTM: This item stores the instant (date and time) when the next responsible party action was suspended.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.SUSP_NRP_USER_ID: This item stores the suspended next responsible party user for the transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.SUSP_NRP_USER_ID_NAME: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.OUTST_CLM_STAT_C_NAME: The status of an outstanding claim that is attached to a transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.POS_TYPE_C_NAME: Place of service type for a charge transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.INACTIVE_TYPE_C_NAME: This column returns the type of an inactive transaction.  Inactive transactions are those involved in a void or reversal. This item subcategorizes the transaction's role in the void or reversal. This will be for both the actual voided/reversed credit and the associated negation payment or debit adjustment.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.VOIDED_INS_AMT: The total amount owed from insurance at the time a charge was voided. This includes previously applied payments and adjustments.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.PROV_NETWORK_STAT_C_NAME: Basic indicator of whether a provider was in or out of network on the service date of a transaction
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.NETWORK_LEVEL_C_NAME: The provider's level of network involvement category ID for the transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.SPEC_CHG_TYPE_C_NAME: The special type category ID for the charge.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.ORIG_BUNDPMT_ETR_ID: The original bundled payment transaction ID.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.ORIG_BUNDPMT_HTR_ID: The original bundled payment hospital transaction ID.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.REFERENCE_AMT: Holds the reference amount that is calculated based on the financial class for the charge. This is set by the system and is applicable only to charges.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.REFERENCE_AMT_SRC_C_NAME: Holds the source of the reference amount that is used in the calculation of the reference amount. This is set by the system and is applicable only to charges.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.CLM_RMV_RSN_C_NAME: Stores the reason charge was removed from the claim queue.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.ADJUSTMENT_CAT_C_NAME: Stores the adjustment category of the associated adjustment code when the credit adjustment is posted.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.WRITE_OFF_RSN_C_NAME: The reason a credit adjustment was posted. This is determined programmatically when possible (e.g. contractual adjustments, self-pay discounts). Otherwise, this is the write-off reason associated with the adjustment category for this adjustment.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.SCHED_PMT_ID: Stores the scheduled payment record that resulted in this payment.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.TAX_CHARGE_TX_ID: Stores the source transaction for a tax charge
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.PATIENT_ESTIMATE_ID: This column contains the Patient Estimate (PES) record ID for a dental estimate that is finalized and is linked to this charge.  If the charge was triggered from dental and if there is a dental estimate associated with the encounter (in a status of "Finalized"), that estimate's record ID will be stored in ETR item 1801 and extracted in this column. The item and column are not updated if and when the original finalized estimate is replaced.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.PATIENT_WISDOM_PROC_ID: Patient dental procedure that was respected by the temporary transaction that filed into this transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.RFL_OVRIDE_SRC_C_NAME: This item stores the referral override source. The options are 1-User or 2-System.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.RFL_OVRIDE_USER_ID: This item stores the user who overrode the referral associated with this charge.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.RFL_OVRIDE_USER_ID_NAME: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.PARENT_SCHED_PMT_ID: Stores the parent scheduled payment record that resulted in this payment.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.MANUAL_PRICE_OVRIDE_YN: Permanent transaction indicator used during repost/correct/retro to determine if the charge's price was originally overridden.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.IS_PRE_SERVICE_PMT_YN: Indicates whether or not this is a pre-service payment, such as a co-pay. This item is only populated for self-pay payments. A payment is considered pre-service if it is a visit pre-pay or co-pay payment (such as during check-in).
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.FIRST_HTR_TX_ID: Stores the hospital transaction ID of the first transaction in a chain of transactions. Note that this chain will include transactions from both Hospital Billing and Professional Billing, so this item will return the very first transaction. For a given transaction, either column ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.FIRST_HTR_ID, or column ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.FIRST_ETR_ID will be populated. This is different from column ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.FIRST_TX_ID, which only chains back to the point that the transaction was transferred from Hospital Billing.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.FIRST_ETR_TX_ID: Stores the transaction ID of the first transaction in a chain of transactions. Note that this chain will include transactions from both Hospital Billing and Professional Billing, so this item will return the very first transaction. For a given transaction, either column ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.FIRST_HTR_ID, or column ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.FIRST_ETR_ID will be populated. This is different from column ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.FIRST_TX_ID, which only chains back to the point that the transaction was transferred from Hospital Billing.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.POSTING_DEPARTMENT_ID: The department where the transaction was posted.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.EXP_REIMB_SYS_AMT: The item stores the original reimbursement amount calculated by contract if the original reimbursement amount is overridden.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.EXP_REIMB_SRC_C_NAME: The item stores how the reimbursement amount was calculated for the charge.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME: This column displays the transaction record status.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.RESEARCH_ENROLL_ID: The unique ID of the research study association linked to this charge.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.STMT_HOLD_RSN_TEXT: The free text information related to the reason why the transaction was held in Professional Billing statement processing.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.E_PMT_RECEIPT_MSG: Saves the receipt message received from the gateway for an electronic payment transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS2.PARENT_TX_ID: This column contains the charge ID that created this transaction during transaction filing. This is used for anesthesia supplemental charges, charge quantity splitting, and charge shadowing.

ARPB_TRANSACTIONS3._TABLE_: This table contains information about professional billing transactions.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS3.TX_ID: The unique identifier for the transaction record.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS3.IS_SCANNED_CHECK_YN: Indicates if a transaction was made using a scanned check.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS3.SUSP_NRP_SRC_COVERAGE_ID: This column stores the coverage when the next responsible party (NRP) action was suspended.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS3.SUSP_NRP_DST_COVERAGE_ID: This column stores the coverage for the suspended NRP action.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS3.SUSP_NRP_AMT: This column stores the amount of the suspended NRP action.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS3.SUSP_NRP_ASSIGN_C_NAME: This column stores the assignment value for the suspended NRP action.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS3.SUSP_NRP_SOURCE_MODULE_C_NAME: This column stores the module for the suspended NRP action.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS3.SUSP_NRP_COMMENT: This column stores the comment for the suspended NRP action.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS3.EB_PMT_HTT_ID: The Enterprise payment hospital temporary transaction ID.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS3.IS_CSA_PAYMENT_YN: Indicates that a payment was identified as coming from a consumer spending account during professional billing remittance processing.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS3.BFD_COVERAGE_ID: This item stores the coverage used to compute reimbursement and pricing contracts for charge lines that qualify for bill for denial workflows.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS3.ADV_PRICING_DESCRIPTION: Description of the advanced pricing line in ECP used for this charge.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS3.ADV_PRICING_INDEX_ID: Component or component group used in advanced pricing.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS3.ADV_PRICING_INDEX_ID_COMPONENT_INDEX_NAM: The name of the component index record
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS3.ADV_PRICING_FSC1_ID: Fee schedule 1 used in advanced pricing.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS3.ADV_PRICING_FSC1_ID_FEE_SCHEDULE_NAME: The name of each fee schedule.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS3.ADV_PRICING_FSC2_ID: Fee schedule 2 used in advanced pricing.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS3.ADV_PRICING_FSC2_ID_FEE_SCHEDULE_NAME: The name of each fee schedule.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS3.ADV_PRICING_FSC_PERC_1: Percent of specified fee schedule 1 used in advanced pricing.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS3.ADV_PRICING_FSC_PERC_2: Percent of specified fee schedule 2 used in advanced pricing.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS3.ADV_PRICING_PERC_BASE: Percent of base price used in advanced pricing.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS3.ADV_PRICING_LPP_ID: Pricing extension used in advanced pricing.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS3.PRIM_TIMELY_FILE_DEADLINE_DATE: The primary timely filing deadline date.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS3.PAT_PMT_COLL_WKFL_C_NAME: This column contains the workflow category ID performed to collect a patient payment from the point of view of the user. For example, MyChart eCheck-in vs. MyChart One-Touch.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS3.MYC_SIGNIN_METHOD_C_NAME: This column denotes how the patient or guarantor logged in to MyChart to either post the payment or create an agreement that will post a payment via Auto Pay. Only populated for agreements made via MyChart.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS3.POSTING_MYPT_ID: This column contains either the MyChart account that created the agreement that resulted in the self-pay payment (if applicable) or the MyChart account that posted the self-pay payment.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS3.POSTING_MYC_STATUS_C_NAME: This item contains either the status of the MyChart account that created the agreement that resulted in the self-pay payment (if applicable) or the status of the MyChart account that posted the self-pay payment.   An active MyChart account status is defined as whether a MyChart user could log into the account with a user name and password. Accounts that are not yet active, deactivated, or are proxy accounts are considered inactive.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS3.EB_TX_SOURCE_C_NAME: This column stores the enterprise posting module for the transaction. This is calculated based on the professional billing transaction source for the transaction.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS3.IMPLIED_QTY: The implied quantity for a charge.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS3.IMPLIED_UNIT_TYPE_C_NAME: The unit type of the implied quantity.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS3.OVR_REIMB_CONTRACT_ID: The override reimbursement contract that was entered.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS3.OVR_REIMB_CONTRACT_ID_CONTRACT_NAME: The name of the Vendor-Network contract.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS3.OVR_REIMB_CONTRACT_DATE: The contact that should be used of the override reimbursement contract that was entered.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS3.OVR_EXPECTED_REIMB_AMOUNT: Stores the expected reimbursement override amount for the charge. This override amount was entered by a user.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS3.PMT_PLAN_AGRMT_SCHED_PMT_ID: The unique ID of the transaction's target guarantor's active payment plan agreement record at the time of filing.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS3.IS_EST_PRE_SERVICE_PLAN_PMT_YN: Indicates whether this payment was made on an estimated balance on a payment plan at time of filing ('Y'). 'N' or NULL indicates that the transaction is not a payment, the payment is not on a balance on a payment plan, or the balance was not estimated at the time of filing.
ARPB_TRANSACTIONS3.IS_PRE_SERVICE_PLAN_PMT_YN: Indicates whether this payment was made toward a hospital account on a payment plan that was added by an estimate ('Y'). 'N' or NULL indicates that the transaction is not a payment or the payment was not made toward a hospital account on a payment plan that was added by an estimate.

ARPB_TX_ACTIONS._TABLE_: This table contains information about actions performed on professional billing transactions.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.TX_ID: The unique key or identification number for a given transaction.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.LINE: This column contains the line count for the information in this table. Each action associated with this transaction is stored on a separate line, one line for each entry.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.ACTION_TYPE_C_NAME: The action type category ID taken on the transaction.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.ACTION_DATE: The date in which this action is performed.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.ACTION_AMOUNT: The amount associated with this action.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.PAYOR_ID: The Payor associated with this action.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.DENIAL_CODE: The denial code associated with this action.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.DENIAL_CODE_REMIT_CODE_NAME: The name of each remittance code.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.POST_DATE: The date this transaction was posted in calendar format.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.STMT_DATE: The statement date of this transaction.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.OUT_AMOUNT_BEFORE: Outstanding amount of associated transaction before the action is performed.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.OUT_AMOUNT_AFTER: Outstanding amount of the associated transaction after the action is performed.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.INS_AMOUNT_BEFORE: Insurance amount of the associated transaction before the action is performed.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.INS_AMOUNT_AFTER: Insurance amount of the associated transaction after the action is performed.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.BEFORE_PAYOR_ID: The Payor of the associated transaction before the action is performed.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.AFTER_PAYOR_ID: The Payor of the associated transaction after the action is performed.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.BEFORE_CVG_ID: The coverage of the associated transaction before the action is performed.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.AFTER_CVG_ID: The coverage of the associated transaction after the action is performed.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.ACTION_USER_ID: The unique ID of the user who performed this action.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.ACTION_USER_ID_NAME: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.ADJ_CODE_ID: If an adjustment is associated with this action, this column contains the adjustment code of that adjustment.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.RMC_ID: The first reason code ID associated with this action.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.RMC_ID_REMIT_CODE_NAME: The name of each remittance code.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.RMC_TWO_ID: The second reason code�ID associated with this action.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.RMC_TWO_ID_REMIT_CODE_NAME: The name of each remittance code.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.RMC_THREE_ID: The third reason code ID associated with this action.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.RMC_THREE_ID_REMIT_CODE_NAME: The name of each remittance code.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.RMC_FOUR_ID: The fourth reason code ID associated with this action.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.RMC_FOUR_ID_REMIT_CODE_NAME: The name of each remittance code.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.PMT_PAYOR_ID: The Payor of the payment if this action is associated with a payment.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.POS_ID: Place of Service ID of the transaction.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.PROC_ID: The procedure ID for the transaction record.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.SERVICE_AREA_ID: Service Area ID for this transaction
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.ACCOUNT_ID: The internal ID of the record that maintains the patient's transactions. A patient may use more than one account and an account may contain more than one patient.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.PRIMARY_DX_ID: Primary Diagnosis code for this charge.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.MODIFIER_ONE: The first procedure modifier of the associated transaction. This is the external modifier, as it would be printed on the claim.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.MODIFIER_TWO: The second procedure modifier of the associated transaction. This is the external modifier, as it would be printed on the claim.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.MODIFIER_THREE: The third modifier of the associated transaction. This is the external modifier, as it would be printed on the claim.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.MODIFIER_FOUR: The fourth modifier of the associated transaction. This is the external modifier, as it would be printed on the claim.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.ASSIGNMENT_BEF_YN: This item is a Yes/No flag to determine if the transaction was assigned to insurance before the action on this line for this transaction.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.ASSIGNMENT_AFTER_YN: This item is a Yes/No flag to determine if the transaction was assigned to insurance after the action on this line for this transaction.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.ACTION_REMIT_CODES: This field stores a comma delimited list of external remittance codes for this transaction.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.ACTION_COMMENT: This is the system generated comment for this transaction.
ARPB_TX_ACTIONS.ACTION_DATETIME: The UTC date and time the action was performed.

ARPB_TX_CHG_REV_HX._TABLE_: Charge Review History Related Information.  This information is copied from the TAR (temporary transaction) record when a charge in charge review is filed to ETR (permanent transaction).
ARPB_TX_CHG_REV_HX.TX_ID: The unique identifier for the transaction record.
ARPB_TX_CHG_REV_HX.LINE: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
ARPB_TX_CHG_REV_HX.CR_HX_USER_ID: Charge Review History User ID.  This is the user that performs the activity reflected in this line in the charge review history.
ARPB_TX_CHG_REV_HX.CR_HX_USER_ID_NAME: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
ARPB_TX_CHG_REV_HX.CR_HX_TIME: Displays the date the recall must be made by.
ARPB_TX_CHG_REV_HX.CR_HX_ACTIVITY_C_NAME: The charge review history activity category ID for the transaction. Examples include Entry, Review, Resubmit, etc.
ARPB_TX_CHG_REV_HX.CR_HX_CONT_LINE_YN: Charge Review History Continuation Flag.  This flag is set to yes if this line is a continuation of the previous line
ARPB_TX_CHG_REV_HX.CR_HX_USER_COMMENT: The comment associated to a Charge Review history action.

ARPB_TX_MATCH_HX._TABLE_: Matching History Transaction Related Items.  A line is added to this related group whenever two transactions are matched together.
ARPB_TX_MATCH_HX.TX_ID: The unique identifier for the transaction record.
ARPB_TX_MATCH_HX.LINE: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
ARPB_TX_MATCH_HX.MTCH_TX_HX_DT: This item stores the date that a transaction was matched to this transaction.
ARPB_TX_MATCH_HX.MTCH_TX_HX_ID: This item stores the transaction that this transaction was matched to.  If the MTCH_TX_HX_UN_DT is null, then the transaction is still currently matched to this transaction.
ARPB_TX_MATCH_HX.MTCH_TX_HX_AMT: This item stores the (insurance+self-pay) amount for which this transaction is matched to the transaction in column MTCH_TX_HX_ID.
ARPB_TX_MATCH_HX.MTCH_TX_HX_INS_AMT: This item stores the insurance amount for which this transaction is matched to the transaction in column MTCH_TX_HX_ID.
ARPB_TX_MATCH_HX.MTCH_TX_HX_PAT_AMT: This item stores the self-pay amount for which this transaction is matched to the transaction in column MTCH_TX_HX_ID.
ARPB_TX_MATCH_HX.MTCH_TX_HX_COMMENT: This item holds the comment for the matching of this transaction to the transaction in column MTCH_TX_HX_ID.  This item is typically only populated by the system and not user entered comments.
ARPB_TX_MATCH_HX.MTCH_TX_HX_UN_DT: This item holds the date that the transaction was unmatched from the transaction in column MTCH_TX_HX_ID.
ARPB_TX_MATCH_HX.MTCH_TX_HX_D_CVG_ID: This item stores the coverage ID at the time that the transaction was matched to the transaction in column MTCH_TX_HX_ID.
ARPB_TX_MATCH_HX.MTCH_TX_HX_DSUSR_ID: This item stores the users who matched this transaction to the transaction from column MTCH_TX_HX_ID.
ARPB_TX_MATCH_HX.MTCH_TX_HX_DSUSR_ID_NAME: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
ARPB_TX_MATCH_HX.MTCH_TX_HX_UDUSR_ID: This item stores the user that unmatched this transaction from the transaction in the MTCH_TX_HX_ID column.
ARPB_TX_MATCH_HX.MTCH_TX_HX_UDUSR_ID_NAME: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
ARPB_TX_MATCH_HX.MTCH_TX_HX_INV_NUM: This item stores the invoice associated with the debit transaction in the matching group.
ARPB_TX_MATCH_HX.MTCH_TX_HX_UN_COM: This item stores the comment entered when the transaction is undistributed.
ARPB_TX_MATCH_HX.MTCH_TX_HX_UN_CV_ID: This is the coverage of the debit transaction at the time of unmatch.
ARPB_TX_MATCH_HX.MTCH_TX_HX_LINE: This item stores the corresponding line from the matched transaction.
ARPB_TX_MATCH_HX.MTCH_TX_HX_DTTM: The UTC date and time the transaction was matched.
ARPB_TX_MATCH_HX.MTCH_TX_HX_UN_DTTM: The UTC date and time the transaction was unmatched.

ARPB_TX_MODERATE._TABLE_: Transaction Information that is used moderately often.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.TX_ID: The unique identifier for the transaction record.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.ORIGINATING_TAR_ID: This item holds the originating temporary transaction�ID for this transaction. If the transaction is a charge, then the originating temporary transaction�ID will be the temporary transaction ID of the charge. If transaction is a payment, then the originating temporary transaction ID will be the payment temporary transaction ID unless the payment is from fast payment. In the fast payment case, the originating temporary transaction ID will be the charge temporary transaction ID.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.SOURCE_TAR_ID: This item holds the source temporary transaction ID for this transaction.  The source temporary transaction ID will always be equal to the temporary transaction ID that generates the transaction.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.SRC_TAR_CHG_LINE: Indicates the temporary transaction charge line this transaction originated from.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.PAT_AGING_DATE: Aging date used for self-pay aged A/R
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.INS_AGING_DATE: Aging date used for insurance aged A/R
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.HOSP_ACCT_ID: This item stores the hospital account record ID for the transaction.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.ORDER_ID: The unique ID of the order record that triggered this transaction. This item is not always populated if you use the Charge Router.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.EXT_REF_NUM: External reference number.  This is a customer item that can be populated as they see fit.  Typically, this item is populated with data from an external system via an interface or transaction import.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.REFERENCE_NUM: This item stores the reference number (check number) for a payment transaction.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.PMT_RECEIPT_NUM: This item stores the receipt number for a payment transaction.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.PAT_TYPE_C_NAME: This item stores the patient type for the patient on this transaction.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.REFERRAL_PROV_ID: This stores this transaction's referral provider.  Note that this field is linked to the referral source master file and not the provider master file.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.REFERRAL_PROV_ID_REFERRING_PROV_NAM: The name of the referral source.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.INSURANCE_AMT_PAID: This item stores the insurance amount that has been paid on a charge transaction.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.WRITEOFF_EXCEPT_C_NAME: The Yes-No write-off category number for a charge transaction. The value indicates whether the charge transaction was adjudicated as a write-off in charge entry and thus the insurance portion write-off is suppressed.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.PAT_LOCATION_ID: The unique ID of the location associated with the patient for this transaction.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.ORIG_PRICE: This item stores the original price of the transaction if the price was changed during charge entry.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.EXP_REIMB_DYNAMIC: The expected reimbursement will be updated whenever reimbursement is calculated. This amount cannot exceed the charge amount.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.EXPECTED_REIMB: The expected reimbursement calculated at charge entry. This item is not updated by any change during claims. Also, this amount cannot exceed the charge amount.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.COVERAGE_PLAN_ID: The Plan (EPP) ID that is associated with this transaction.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.CVG_PLAN_GROUP_ID: This item stores the employer group (PPG) ID that is associated with this transaction.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.CVG_PLAN_GROUP_ID_PLAN_GRP_NAME: The name of the employer group record
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.MED_NEC_YN: This is the flag that is set in charge entry if medical necessity is needed for a transaction.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.TECHNICAL_CHG_FL_YN: This flag is set to yes if the transaction is a technical charge.  This is only populated if using the split billing functionality.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.CNTR_DISCOUNT_AMT: This item stores the pricing contract discount amount for a transaction.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.UNDIST_TX_DATE: This items stores the date that a transaction was undistributed (unmatched).
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.UNDIST_CHG_USER_ID: This item stores the user that unmatched a transaction.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.UNDIST_CHG_USER_ID_NAME: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.UNDIST_INSTANT: This item stores the instant that a transaction was undistributed (unmatched).
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.ORIGINAL_AMT_COPAY: This item stores the original copay amount for the transaction.
