ARPB_TX_MODERATE.BAD_DEBT_CHG_YN: Indicates whether the charges is written off to bad debt.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.AUTO_PAT_WO_C_NAME: This item stores if a transaction had its self-pay portion automatically written off.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.TX_USER_COMMENT: The comments entered by users when they perform an action like transfer, retro, void, and undistribute on a transaction in Transaction Inquiry are stored in this item.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.CONTESTED_YN: This item stores a flag to determine if a transaction is contested.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.CONTEST_REASON_C_NAME: This item stores the reason that a transaction is contested if the transaction is contested.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.MEA_IDENTIFIER_C_NAME: This item stores the measurement (MEA) identifiers that are entered in charge entry.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.CRC_CODE_C_NAME: This item stores the CRC code entered in charge entry.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.REIMB_CONTRACT_AMT: Stores the allowed amount as calculated by the reimbursement contract. This amount can exceed the charge amount.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.EXT_CUR_AGENCY_ID_COLL_AGENCY_NAME: The name of the collection agency.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.EXT_CURAGNCY_STAT_C_NAME: The current agency status category ID for the transaction.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.EXTERNAL_ID: This item stores the external transaction ID
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.SURGICAL_LOG_ID: The unique ID associated with the surgical log record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the OR_LOG table. This item is populated if charge is entered from OpTime.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.SUPPLY_ID: The unique ID associated with the supply record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the OR_SPLY table.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.SUPPLY_ID_SUPPLY_NAME: The name of the inventory item.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.IMPLANT_ID: The unique ID associated with the implant record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the OR_IMP table.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.EXT_AGNCY_SENT_DTTM: The instant the charge was sent to its current agency.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.FIRST_SELFPAY_DATE: This items stores the date when a charge first goes to self-pay.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.PROV_TYPE_C_NAME: The provider type for the transaction.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.CLAIM_ID: The claim record for the transaction.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.IS_WK_COMP: Indicates whether the transaction is for worker's comp.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.EOB_UPDATED_DT: Date in which the Explanation of�Benefits for this transaction was last updated.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.RAD_THER_COMP_TX_ID: This item stores the ID for radiation therapy component transactions and rollup charges.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.RAD_THER_END_YN: Indicates whether Radiation Therapy is at the end of treatment for this transaction.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.START_TIME: Start time of a timed procedure.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.STOP_TIME: Stop time of a timed procedure.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.PURCHASESERVICE_AMT: This is the amount paid for or to be paid to a third party for performing a service. This field is used to report this amount on claims and statements along with price being charged to the payor or guarantor for the service.  This item should only be used if it is desired this purchased service information be reported on claims and statements.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.THIRD_PARTY_POS_ID: The third party or reference lab where an individual purchased service was performed. This item is used to reference a Place of Service in order to report the address and National Provider Identifier of the third party on claims and statements. This item should only be used if it is desired this purchased service information be reported on claims and statements.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.MNL_RETRO_REASON_C_NAME: The retroadjudication reason category ID for the transaction
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.TYPE_OF_SERVICE_C_NAME: The type of service category number associated with the transaction.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.DX_PRIM_CODESET_C_NAME: This item stores the primary diagnosis codeset for the transaction.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.DX_ALT_CODESET_C_NAME: This item stores the alternate diagnosis codeset for the transaction.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.START_DATE: The date on which a service is started.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.STOP_DATE: The date on which a service was stopped.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.PROC_MINUTES: The length of time in minutes that this procedure took.
ARPB_TX_MODERATE.CRD_CHARGE_SLIP_NO: The encounter form number associated with copay payments entered during scheduling.

ARPB_TX_MODIFIERS._TABLE_: This table contains multiple response information for modifiers associated with A/R (ETR) transactions.
ARPB_TX_MODIFIERS.ETR_ID: The unique ID of the transaction (ETR) record for this row.
ARPB_TX_MODIFIERS.LINE: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
ARPB_TX_MODIFIERS.EXT_MODIFIER: The external ID of the modifier record.

ARPB_TX_STMCLAIMHX._TABLE_: This table contains information about the statement and claim history for professional billing transactions.
ARPB_TX_STMCLAIMHX.TX_ID: The unique ID of the transaction record
ARPB_TX_STMCLAIMHX.LINE: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.
ARPB_TX_STMCLAIMHX.BC_HX_TYPE_C_NAME: This item stores whether the current line is a bill or claim entry.  A category value of 1 means claim and 2 means bill.
ARPB_TX_STMCLAIMHX.BC_HX_DATE: The date the statement or claim was processed. This can be NULL when an insurance payment posts and it can�t find a matching claim with that payer in the history.
ARPB_TX_STMCLAIMHX.BC_HX_COVERAGE_ID: The unique ID of the coverage that is associated with the bill or claim run
ARPB_TX_STMCLAIMHX.BC_HX_ASSIGNED_YN: Indicates whether or not the coverage is assigned to insurance for this transaction. Y indicates the coverage is assigned.
ARPB_TX_STMCLAIMHX.BC_HX_AMOUNT: The amount of the transaction on the bill or claim.
ARPB_TX_STMCLAIMHX.BC_HX_INVOICE_NUM: The invoice number for the bill or claim.
ARPB_TX_STMCLAIMHX.BC_HX_PAYMENT_AMT: Payment amount for payment associated with this invoice.  This field applies to claims only.
ARPB_TX_STMCLAIMHX.BC_HX_PAYMENT_DATE: Payment date for payment associated with this invoice.  This field applies to claims only.
ARPB_TX_STMCLAIMHX.BC_HX_PAYOR_ID: The unique ID of the payor for this claim. This field applies to claims only.
ARPB_TX_STMCLAIMHX.BC_HX_RESUBMIT_DATE: Resubmit date for this claim.  This field applies to claims only.
ARPB_TX_STMCLAIMHX.BC_HX_CLM_DB_ID: The unique ID of the claim information record for this claim. This field applies to claims only.
ARPB_TX_STMCLAIMHX.BC_HX_HELD_AMOUNT: Amount held (not shown) on a bill.  This item applies to bills only.
ARPB_TX_STMCLAIMHX.BC_HX_BO_PROC_ID: The internal record ID for the procedure billed out on the claim. This item only applies to claims.
ARPB_TX_STMCLAIMHX.BC_HX_AUX_PROC: Claim Auxiliary Procedure.  This item is only used by claims.  This is populated when claim bundling grouping rules are used and there are procedures that are left over from the claim. This item is a semicolon delimited list of extra procedures.  For example, if the bundling rule is set up to bundle and 99212 and a 99213 and there are two 99212s and one 99213, then the 99212 procedure identifier would appear in this column.
ARPB_TX_STMCLAIMHX.BC_HX_ACCEPT_DATE: Accept date for bill or claim
ARPB_TX_STMCLAIMHX.BC_HX_FIRST_CLM_FLG: This item is set to 0 for accepted claims where all previous lines in the statement-claim history are claims. This item is set to 1 for accepted claims where there is at least one previous line in the statement-claim history that was a statement.  This item is only populated for claims.
ARPB_TX_STMCLAIMHX.BC_HX_AR_CLASS_C_NAME: AR classification at the time of claim/statement run acceptance.
ARPB_TX_STMCLAIMHX.BC_HX_ACCEPT_DTTM: The UTC date and time the statement or claim was accepted.

ARPB_TX_STMT_DT._TABLE_: This table stores the statement dates for transactions.
ARPB_TX_STMT_DT.TX_ID: The unique identifier for the transaction record.
ARPB_TX_STMT_DT.LINE: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
ARPB_TX_STMT_DT.STATEMENT_DATE: The statement dates for the transaction.

ARPB_TX_VOID._TABLE_: This table contains information on transactions that were either: * Transferred * Voided * Reversed * Retroadjudicated
ARPB_TX_VOID.TX_ID: The unique identifier for the transaction record.
ARPB_TX_VOID.OLD_ETR_ID: This item holds a pointer for a transaction that was reposted retroactively to the original transaction.
ARPB_TX_VOID.REPOSTED_ETR_ID: This item stores a pointer to the old transaction in the case of charge correction or repost.
ARPB_TX_VOID.REPOST_TYPE_C_NAME: This indicates the type of repost on the source transaction.  This is either set to repost or correction.
ARPB_TX_VOID.IS_RETRO_TX: This item serves as a flag to determine if this transaction was voided as a result of retroadjudication.
ARPB_TX_VOID.TRANS_TX_ID: This item stores a pointer to the transaction ID that this transaction was transferred from. This item is only populated if a transaction was transferred from another transaction.
ARPB_TX_VOID.TRANS_FROM_C_NAME: This item stores the void status of the transferred from transaction for this transaction.  This item is only populated if this transaction was transferred from a different account.
ARPB_TX_VOID.RETRO_CHARGE_ID: This item stores the transaction ID for the reposted transaction caused by the retroadjudication of this transaction.
ARPB_TX_VOID.DEL_REVERSE_DATE: This is the date that the transaction was voided or reversed.
ARPB_TX_VOID.DEL_CHARGE_USER_ID: This item stores the user who voided this transaction.
ARPB_TX_VOID.DEL_CHARGE_USER_ID_NAME: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
ARPB_TX_VOID.DEL_CHARGE_INSTANT: This item stores the instant that a transaction was voided.
ARPB_TX_VOID.IS_REVERSED_C_NAME: This flag determines if a transaction has been reversed.
ARPB_TX_VOID.VOIDED_BY_MSG_YN: This flag is set if the charge was voided as a result of a Charge Router message.
ARPB_TX_VOID.VOID_REASON_C_NAME: The reason for voiding/reversing category ID for the transaction
ARPB_TX_VOID.VOIDED_BY_CGR_C_NAME: Indicates that a charge is voided by charge router.

ARPB_VISITS._TABLE_: This table contains Professional Billing visit information stored in the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file. It doesn�t include HAR records created for Hospital Billing and Single Billing Office.
ARPB_VISITS.PB_VISIT_ID: The unique identifier for the Professional Billing visit.
ARPB_VISITS.PB_BILLING_STATUS_C_NAME: This column stores the Professional Billing status category ID for the visit.
ARPB_VISITS.PB_FO_OVRRD_ST_C_NAME: This column indicates whether the Professional Billing filing order has been overridden by a user.
ARPB_VISITS.PB_FO_MSPQ_STATE_C_NAME: This column indicates whether the filing order for the Professional Billing visit has been verified by Medicare Secondary Payer Questionnaire logic.
ARPB_VISITS.PB_VISIT_NUM: This column stores the PB visit number.
ARPB_VISITS.PRIM_ENC_CSN_ID: The contact serial number associated with the primary patient contact on the Professional Billing visit.
ARPB_VISITS.GUARANTOR_ID: Stores the guarantor ID associated with the Professional Billing visit.
ARPB_VISITS.COVERAGE_ID: The primary coverage on the Professional Billing visit.
ARPB_VISITS.SELF_PAY_YN: Indicates whether the Professional Billing visit is self-pay.
ARPB_VISITS.DO_NOT_BILL_INS_YN: Indicates�whether the Professional Billing visit has the Do Not Bill Insurance flag set.
ARPB_VISITS.ACCT_FIN_CLASS_C_NAME: The financial class category ID�for the Professional Billing visit.
ARPB_VISITS.SERV_AREA_ID: The service area of the Professional Billing visit.
ARPB_VISITS.REVENUE_LOCATION_ID: The revenue location of the Professional Billing visit.
ARPB_VISITS.DEPARTMENT_ID: The department of the Professional Billing visit.
ARPB_VISITS.PB_TOTAL_BALANCE: Contains the combined total balance of transactions on the PB visit.
ARPB_VISITS.PB_TOTAL_CHARGES: The total charges on the PB visit.
ARPB_VISITS.PB_TOTAL_PAYMENTS: The total payments on the PB visit.
ARPB_VISITS.PB_TOTAL_ADJ: Contains total adjustments on the PB visit.
ARPB_VISITS.PB_INS_BALANCE: Contains insurance balance on the PB visit.
ARPB_VISITS.PB_UND_BALANCE: Contains undistributed balances on the PB visit.
ARPB_VISITS.PB_SELFPAY_BALANCE: Contains the self-pay balance on the Professional Billing visit.
ARPB_VISITS.PB_BAD_DEBT_BALANCE: Contains the bad debt balance on the Professional Billing visit.
ARPB_VISITS.REC_CREATE_USER_ID: The user who created the Professional Billing visit record.
ARPB_VISITS.REC_CREATE_USER_ID_NAME: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
ARPB_VISITS.FIRST_PB_CHG_TX_ID: Contains the first valid Professional Billing charge on the Professional Billing visit.
ARPB_VISITS.BAL_FULL_SELF_PAY_YN: This item shows whether the balances for this hospital account are in full self-pay.

CLARITY_EAP._TABLE_: The CLARITY_EAP table contains basic information about the procedure records in your system. This does include both A/R and clinical procedures.
CLARITY_EAP.PROC_ID: The unique ID of each procedure record in your system. This is not the CPT� code or other procedure code.

CLARITY_EAP_3._TABLE_: The CLARITY_EAP_3 table contains basic information about the procedure records in your system. This includes both A/R and clinical procedures. This is a continuation of Clarity table CLARITY_EAP.
CLARITY_EAP_3.PROC_ID: The unique ID number for a procedure record.
CLARITY_EAP_3.PT_FRIENDLY_NAME: The patient friendly procedure name for use in MyChart.

CLARITY_EAP_5._TABLE_: The CLARITY_EAP_5 table contains basic information about the procedure records in your system. This includes both A/R and clinical procedures. This is a continuation of Clarity table CLARITY_EAP.
CLARITY_EAP_5.PROC_ID: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the procedure record.
CLARITY_EAP_5.MYC_TKT_OVR_RULE_ID: Specify a rule to determine when to allow manually sending appointment requests to the patient for scheduling.

CLM_DX._TABLE_: All values associated with a claim are stored in the Claim External Value record. The CLM_DX table holds the diagnoses for the claim.
CLM_DX.RECORD_ID: The unique identifier for the Claim Info record.
CLM_DX.LINE: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.
CLM_DX.CLM_DX_QUAL: This item holds the qualifier identifying the code set for the claim diagnoses.
CLM_DX.CLM_DX: This item holds the diagnoses for the claim. The principal diagnosis is stored on the first line and the other diagnoses are on subsequent lines.
CLM_DX.CLM_DX_POA: This item identifies if the diagnosis was present when the patient was admitted.
CLM_DX.CLM_DX_CODE_SET_OID: The object ID (OID) for the diagnosis code set.
CLM_DX.CLM_DX_RANK: This item holds the explicit rank of the diagnoses when it is present in the raw claims data.
CLM_DX.CLM_DX_FROM_HEADER_YN: Indicates whether the diagnosis was received at the header level.
CLM_DX.RX_DX_QUAL: This item holds the qualifier identifying the code set for the claim diagnoses on a pharmacy claim.

CLM_NOTE._TABLE_: All values associated with a claim are stored in the Claim External Value record. The CLM_NOTE table holds claim level notes or remarks.
CLM_NOTE.RECORD_ID: The unique identifier for the Claim Info record.
CLM_NOTE.LINE: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.
CLM_NOTE.CLM_NOTE: This item holds claim level notes.

CLM_VALUES._TABLE_: All values associated with a claim are stored in the Claim External Value record. The CLM_VALUES table holds claim-level values set by the system during claims processing or by user edits.
CLM_VALUES.RECORD_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the claim record.
CLM_VALUES.BIL_PROV_TYP_QUAL: The value indicating whether the billing provider on the claim is a person or a non-person.
CLM_VALUES.BIL_PROV_NAM_LAST: The billing provider's last name (if a person) or the organization name (if a non-person).
CLM_VALUES.BIL_PROV_NAM_FIRST: The billing provider's first name. It is only populated when the billing provider is a person.
CLM_VALUES.BIL_PROV_NAM_MID: The billing provider's middle name. It is only populated when the billing provider is a person.
CLM_VALUES.BIL_PROV_NAM_SUF: The suffix to the billing provider's name (e.g., Jr, III). It is only populated when the billing provider is a person.
CLM_VALUES.BIL_PROV_NPI: The billing provider's National Provider Identifier (NPI).
CLM_VALUES.BIL_PROV_TAXID_QUAL: The qualifier for the billing provider's tax ID defining the type of ID reported as the tax ID.
CLM_VALUES.BIL_PROV_TAXID: The billing provider's tax ID. For individuals, this ID could be the SSN or tax ID.
CLM_VALUES.BIL_PROV_UPIN: The billing provider's unique physician identification number (UPIN). It is only populated when the provider is a person.
CLM_VALUES.BIL_PROV_LIC_NUM: The billing provider's license number. It is only populated when the billing provider is a person.
CLM_VALUES.BIL_PROV_ADDR_1: The first line of the billing provider's street address.
CLM_VALUES.BIL_PROV_ADDR_2: The second line of the billing provider's street address.
CLM_VALUES.BIL_PROV_CNTRY: The billing provider's country. It is only populated if the address is outside the United States.
CLM_VALUES.BIL_PROV_CNTRY_SUB: The billing provider's country subdivision (e.g., state, province). It is only populated if the address is outside the United States.
CLM_VALUES.CLM_CVG_SEQ_CD: The code identifying the filing order for the claim (e.g., primary, secondary, tertiary).
CLM_VALUES.CLM_CVG_GRP_NUM: The group number entered in the coverage record.
CLM_VALUES.CLM_CVG_GRP_NAM: The group name entered in the coverage record.
CLM_VALUES.CLM_CVG_INS_TYP: The insurance type code for the claim.
CLM_VALUES.CLM_CVG_FILING_IND: The indicator identifying the type of claim.
CLM_VALUES.CLM_CVG_PYR_ID_TYP: The qualifier that describes the type of ID used to identify the payer.
CLM_VALUES.CLM_CVG_PYR_ID: The primary ID for the payer.
CLM_VALUES.CLM_CVG_ACPT_ASGN: The indicator that the provider accepts assignment from the payer.
CLM_VALUES.CLM_CVG_AUTH_PMT: The indicator that the insured assigns benefits to the provider.
CLM_VALUES.CLM_CVG_REL_INFO: The indicator that the insured has authorized the release of information to the payer.
CLM_VALUES.PYR_ADDR_1: The first line of the payer's street address.
CLM_VALUES.PYR_ADDR_2: The second line of the payer's street address.
CLM_VALUES.PYR_CNTRY: The payer's country. It is only populated if the address is outside the United States.
CLM_VALUES.PYR_CNTRY_SUB: The payer's country subdivision (e.g., state, province). It is only populated if the address is outside the United States.
CLM_VALUES.PAT_NAM_SUF: The suffix to the patient's name (e.g., Jr, III).
CLM_VALUES.PAT_CVG_MEM_ID: The coverage member ID for the patient.
CLM_VALUES.PAT_REL_TO_INS: The patient's relationship to the coverage subscriber.
CLM_VALUES.PAT_SIG_ON_FILE: The indicator that the patient has signed the necessary release forms and the forms are on file at the provider.
CLM_VALUES.PAT_SIG_SRC: The indicator that the release forms were signed on the patient's behalf.
CLM_VALUES.PAT_DEATH_DATE: The date of the patient's death.
CLM_VALUES.PAT_WT: The patient's weight (in pounds) when needed for the claim.
CLM_VALUES.PAT_PREG_IND: The indicator that the patient is pregnant.
CLM_VALUES.PAT_WK_COMP_NUM: The identification number used for workers' comp claims.
CLM_VALUES.PAT_ADDR_1: The first line of the patient's street address.
CLM_VALUES.PAT_ADDR_2: The second line of the patient's street address.
CLM_VALUES.PAT_CNTRY: The patient's country. It is only populated if the address is outside the United States.
CLM_VALUES.PAT_CNTRY_SUB: The patient's country subdivision (e.g., state, province). It is only populated if the address is outside the United States.
CLM_VALUES.INV_NUM: The invoice number that uniquely identifies the claim in the billing system.
CLM_VALUES.ICN: The payer's internal control number (ICN) that uniquely identifies the claim in the payer's system.
CLM_VALUES.TTL_CHG_AMT: The total charge amount for the claim.
CLM_VALUES.BILL_TYP_FAC_CD: The facility code portion of the bill type (first and second digits).
CLM_VALUES.BILL_TYP_FREQ_CD: The frequency code portion of the bill type (third digit).
CLM_VALUES.MOMS_MRN: The mother's medical record number when the patient is a newborn.
CLM_VALUES.PAYTO_ADDR_TYP_QUAL: The indicator that the pay-to address entity on the claim is a person or a non-person.

CLM_VALUES_2._TABLE_: All values associated with a claim are stored in the Claim External Value record.  The CLM_VALUES_2 table holds claim-level values set by the system during claims processing or by user edits.
CLM_VALUES_2.RECORD_ID: The unique identifier for the claim values record.
CLM_VALUES_2.ADMSN_TYP: The admission type for the claim.
CLM_VALUES_2.ADMSN_SRC: The admission source for the claim.
CLM_VALUES_2.DISCHRG_DISP: The patient's discharge status, also referred to as the discharge disposition.
CLM_VALUES_2.RFL_NUM: The referral number for the claim.
CLM_VALUES_2.AUTH_NUM: The prior authorization number for the claim.
CLM_VALUES_2.SPEC_PROG_IND: The indicator that the services on the claim were rendered under one of a list of special programs.
CLM_VALUES_2.CLM_DELAY_RSN: The reason code explaining why the claim was submitted after the payer's normal filing deadline.
CLM_VALUES_2.AUTH_EXCEPT_CD: The code explaining why services that normally need authorization were performed without the necessary authorization.
CLM_VALUES_2.PAT_AMT_PAID: The amount already paid by the patient.
CLM_VALUES_2.PAT_AMT_DUE: The amount estimated to be the patient's responsibility.
CLM_VALUES_2.AUTO_ACDNT_STATE: The state in which an automobile accident occurred.
CLM_VALUES_2.AUTO_ACDNT_CNTRY: The country in which an automobile accident occurred. It is only populated when the accident occurred outside the United States.
CLM_VALUES_2.MAMM_CERT_NUM: The provider's certification number when the claim contains mammography services.
CLM_VALUES_2.CLIA_NUM: The Clinical Laboratory Improvement Amendment (CLIA) number when the claim contains lab services.
CLM_VALUES_2.DEMO_PRJ_ID: The identifier for claims billed under atypical rules (e.g., pilot programs, clinical trials).
CLM_VALUES_2.SPINAL_MAN_COND_CD: The patient's condition when the claim contains chiropractic services.
CLM_VALUES_2.EPSDT_CERT_APPLIES: The indicator that identifies whether an Early and Periodic Screening, Diagnostic, and Treatment (EPSDT) referral was given to the patient.
CLM_VALUES_2.ORTHO_TOT_MO: The total number of months of orthodontic treatment.
CLM_VALUES_2.ORTHO_MO_REMAIN: The number of months of orthodontic treatment remaining for a transfer patient.
CLM_VALUES_2.ADMSN_DX_QUAL: The qualifier that identifies the code set for the admission diagnosis for the claim.
CLM_VALUES_2.ADMSN_DX: The admission diagnosis for the claim.
CLM_VALUES_2.DRG: The Diagnosis Related Group (DRG) determined for the claim.
CLM_VALUES_2.ANES_SURG_PROC: The HCPCS code of the surgical procedure performed under anesthesia when the code needs to be reported on the anesthesia claim.
CLM_VALUES_2.OUTSIDE_LAB: The indicator that the claim includes purchased services rendered by an independent provider.
CLM_VALUES_2.OUTSIDE_LAB_CHG: The price of the purchased services.
CLM_VALUES_2.CLM_FROM_DT: The earliest date represented on the claim. This date could be the minimum service date for an outpatient or professional claim or the admission date for an inpatient claim.
CLM_VALUES_2.CLM_TO_DT: The latest date represented on the claim. This date could be the maximum service date for an outpatient or professional claim or the discharge date for an inpatient claim.
CLM_VALUES_2.ADMSN_DT: The admission date on the claim. For outpatient claims, this date represents the visit or start of care date.
CLM_VALUES_2.ADMSN_TM: The time at which the patient was admitted to the facility. This time is only available for institutional claims.  Note that the value is the exact time, including both the hour and minutes.
CLM_VALUES_2.DISCHG_DT: The discharge date on the claim.
CLM_VALUES_2.DISCHG_TM: The time at which the patient was discharged. This time is only available for institutional claims.  Note that the value is the exact time, including both the hour and minutes.
CLM_VALUES_2.ILL_INJ_DT: The date in which the patient was injured or when the current illness was first noticed.
CLM_VALUES_2.INIT_TREAT_DT: The initial treatment date when the claim represents a series of visits (e.g., physical therapy, spinal manipulation, dialysis, pregnancy).
CLM_VALUES_2.LST_SEEN_DT: The date the patient was last seen by the attending or supervising provider.
CLM_VALUES_2.ACUTE_MANIF_DT: The date acute symptoms first manifested.
CLM_VALUES_2.ACDNT_DT: The date the automobile accident occurred.
CLM_VALUES_2.LMP_DT: The date of the last menstrual period.
CLM_VALUES_2.LST_XRAY_DT: The date of the last X-Ray.
CLM_VALUES_2.HEAR_VIS_RX_DT: The date on which the prescription was written for hearing devices or vision frames and lenses.
CLM_VALUES_2.DISAB_START_DT: The earliest date on which the patient was disabled and could not work.
CLM_VALUES_2.DISAB_END_DT: The latest date on which the patient was disabled and could not work.
CLM_VALUES_2.LST_WK_DT: The last date on which the patient was able to perform his or her duties at work.
CLM_VALUES_2.AUTH_RETURN_WK_DT: The date on which the patient can return to work.
CLM_VALUES_2.ASSUM_CARE_DT: The date on which care was assumed by another provider during post-operative care.
CLM_VALUES_2.RELINQ_CARE_DT: The date on which the provider of the claim ceased post-operative care.
CLM_VALUES_2.ORTHO_BAND_DT: The date orthodontic appliances were placed.
CLM_VALUES_2.DENT_SRV_DT: The date on which dental services were performed.
CLM_VALUES_2.SIMILAR_ILL_DT: The earliest date on which symptoms of the same or similar illness were noticed.
CLM_VALUES_2.AMB_PAT_WT: The patient's weight (in pounds) when the patient is transported by an ambulance.
CLM_VALUES_2.AMB_TRANS_RSN_CD: The code explaining why the patient was transported by ambulance.
CLM_VALUES_2.AMB_TRANS_DIST: The distance (in miles) the patient was transported.
CLM_VALUES_2.AMB_RND_TRIP_DESC: The note explaining the need for round trip transportation.
CLM_VALUES_2.AMB_STRETCHER_DESC: The note explaining the need for a stretcher.
CLM_VALUES_2.CNTRCT_TYP: The code representing the type of contract between the provider and the payer.
CLM_VALUES_2.CNTRCT_AMT: The amount assigned by the contract between the provider and the payer.
CLM_VALUES_2.CNTRCT_PCT: The contract percentage for the claim assigned by the contract between the provider and the payer.
CLM_VALUES_2.CNTRCT_CD: The code representing the claim type under the contract between the provider and the payer.
CLM_VALUES_2.CNTRCT_DISCNT_PCT: The discount percentage assigned by the contract between the provider and the payer.
CLM_VALUES_2.CNTRCT_VERS_ID: The version of the contract used on the claim.
CLM_VALUES_2.ATT_PROV_NAM_SUF: The suffix to the attending provider's name (e.g., Jr, III).
CLM_VALUES_2.ATT_PROV_NPI: The attending provider's National Provider Identifier (NPI).
CLM_VALUES_2.OPER_PROV_NAM_SUF: The suffix to the operating provider's name (e.g., Jr, III).
CLM_VALUES_2.OPER_PROV_NPI: The operating provider's National Provider Identifier (NPI).
CLM_VALUES_2.OTH_PROV_NAM_LAST: The other operating provider's last name.
CLM_VALUES_2.OTH_PROV_NAM_FIRST: The other operating provider's first name.
CLM_VALUES_2.OTH_PROV_NAM_MID: The other operating provider's middle name.
CLM_VALUES_2.OTH_PROV_NAM_SUF: The suffix to the other operating provider's name (e.g., Jr, III).
CLM_VALUES_2.OTH_PROV_NPI: The other operating provider's National Provider Identifier (NPI).
CLM_VALUES_2.REND_PROV_TYP: The rendering provider on the claim is a person or a non-person.
CLM_VALUES_2.REND_PROV_NAM_LAST: The rendering provider's last name (if a person) or the organization name (if a non-person).
CLM_VALUES_2.REND_PROV_NAM_FIRST: The rendering provider's first name. It is only populated when the provider is a person.
CLM_VALUES_2.REND_PROV_NAM_MID: The rendering provider's middle name. It is only populated when the provider is a person.
CLM_VALUES_2.REND_PROV_NAM_SUF: The suffix to the rendering provider's name (e.g., Jr, III). It is only populated when the provider is a person.
CLM_VALUES_2.REND_PROV_NPI: The rendering provider's National Provider Identifier (NPI).
CLM_VALUES_2.REF_PROV_NAM_SUF: The suffix to the referring provider's name (e.g., Jr, III).
CLM_VALUES_2.REF_PROV_NPI: The referring provider's National Provider Identifier (NPI).
CLM_VALUES_2.SUP_PROV_NAM_SUF: The suffix to the supervising provider's name (e.g., Jr, III).
CLM_VALUES_2.SUP_PROV_NPI: The supervising provider's National Provider Identifier (NPI).
CLM_VALUES_2.ASST_SURG_NAM_LAST: The assistant dental surgeon's last name.
CLM_VALUES_2.ASST_SURG_NAM_FIRST: The assistant dental surgeon's first name.
CLM_VALUES_2.ASST_SURG_NAM_MID: The assistant dental surgeon's middle name.

CLM_VALUES_3._TABLE_: All values associated with a claim are stored in the Claim External Value record. The CLM_VALUES_3 table holds claim level values set by the system during claims processing or by user edits.
CLM_VALUES_3.RECORD_ID: The unique identifier for the claim values record.
CLM_VALUES_3.ASST_SURG_NAM_SUF: The suffix to the assistant dental surgeon's name.
CLM_VALUES_3.ASST_SURG_NPI: The assistant dental surgeon's National Provider Identifier (NPI).
CLM_VALUES_3.ASST_SURG_TAXONOMY: The assistant dental surgeon's taxonomy code.
CLM_VALUES_3.SVC_FAC_NAM: The name of the external location where the services were performed.
CLM_VALUES_3.SVC_FAC_NPI: The NPI of the external location where the services were performed.
CLM_VALUES_3.SVC_FAC_CNCT_NAM: The contact name for the external location.
CLM_VALUES_3.SVC_FAC_CNCT_PH: The contact phone number for the external location.
CLM_VALUES_3.SVC_FAC_CNCT_EXT: The contact phone extension for the external location.
CLM_VALUES_3.SVC_FAC_ADDR_1: The first line of the external location street address.
CLM_VALUES_3.SVC_FAC_ADDR_2: The second line of the external location street address.
CLM_VALUES_3.SVC_FAC_CNTRY: The external location's country. It is only populated if the address is outside the United States.
CLM_VALUES_3.SVC_FAC_CNTRY_SUB: The external location's country subdivision (state, province, etc). It is only populated if the address is outside the United States.
CLM_VALUES_3.PICK_UP_ADDR_1: The first line of the ambulance pick-up location street address.
CLM_VALUES_3.PICK_UP_ADDR_2: The second line of the ambulance pick-up location street address.
CLM_VALUES_3.PICK_UP_ZIP: The ambulance pick-up location's ZIP code.
CLM_VALUES_3.PICK_UP_CNTRY: The ambulance pick-up location's country. It is only populated if the address is outside the United States.
CLM_VALUES_3.PICK_UP_CNTRY_SUB: The ambulance pick-up location's country subdivision (e.g., state, province). It is only populated if the address is outside the United States.
CLM_VALUES_3.DROP_OFF_NAM: The name of the ambulance drop-off location.
CLM_VALUES_3.DROP_OFF_ADDR_1: The first line of the ambulance drop-off location street address.
CLM_VALUES_3.DROP_OFF_ADDR_2: The second line of the ambulance drop-off location street address.
CLM_VALUES_3.DROP_OFF_ZIP: The ambulance drop-off location's ZIP code.
CLM_VALUES_3.DROP_OFF_CNTRY: The ambulance drop-off location's country. It is only populated if the address is outside the United States.
CLM_VALUES_3.DROP_OFF_CNTRY_SUB: The ambulance drop-off location's country subdivision (e.g., state, province). It is only populated if the address is outside the United States.
CLM_VALUES_3.CREATE_DT: The date the claim was created. It is used for paper institutional claims.
CLM_VALUES_3.CLM_CVG_AMT_PAID: The amount already paid by the payer of the current coverage.
CLM_VALUES_3.PAT_PROP_CAS_ID_TYP: The qualifier for the Property and Casualty Patient ID used on American National Standards Institute (ANSI) version 5010 claims.
CLM_VALUES_3.PAT_PROP_CAS_ID: This column stores the patient identifier for property and casualty claims used on American National Standards Institute (ANSI) version 5010 claims.
CLM_VALUES_3.ADMSN_QUAL: The qualifier to identify when the admission hour is reported along with the admission date.
CLM_VALUES_3.REMARK: The claim remark printed on institutional claims as the billing note.
CLM_VALUES_3.CLM_CVG_AMT_DUE: The amount due by the payer of the current coverage.
CLM_VALUES_3.CLM_CVG_COMPLMT_ID: The complementary payer ID for the payer of the current coverage.
CLM_VALUES_3.CLM_CVG_REL_INFO_DT: The date on which the insured authorized the release of information to the payer.
CLM_VALUES_3.LOCAL_USE_CMS: The value to print in Reserved for Local Use Box 10d on the paper 1500 version 08/05 Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS) claim form. On the 1500 version 02/12 form, this field was removed and no longer used.
CLM_VALUES_3.DISABILITY_QUAL: The qualifier for the disability date and time.
CLM_VALUES_3.CAS_SRC_CEV_ID: The source claim values record to which this reason code claim values record is attached.
CLM_VALUES_3.CAS_LVL_C_NAME: The indicator that the claim values record includes claim-level or line-level explanation of benefits data.
CLM_VALUES_3.CAS_CVG_LN_NUM: The coverage line number in the source claim values record for claim-level explanation of benefits.
CLM_VALUES_3.CAS_SVC_LN_NUM: The service line number in the source claim values record.
CLM_VALUES_3.NCPDP_RECORD_TYPE: The National Council for Prescription Drug Programs (NCPDP) transaction type being submitted.
CLM_VALUES_3.TXST_TRANSMISSION_ACTION: The indicator that the file being loaded is a replacement file, update file, or delete file.
CLM_VALUES_3.TXST_SUBMISSION_NUMBER: The number of times data set has been re-sent.

CLM_VALUES_4._TABLE_: All values associated with a claim are stored in the Claim External Value record. The CLM_VALUES_4 table holds claim-level values set by the system during claims processing or by user edits.
CLM_VALUES_4.RECORD_ID: The unique identifier for the claim value record.
CLM_VALUES_4.CLM_TRANS_INTMD: The identifier for claim transmission intermediaries.
CLM_VALUES_4.CLM_PRO_APP_NUM: The Peer Review Organization (PRO) Approval Number for the claim.
CLM_VALUES_4.CLM_REP_ORGID: The Repricing Organization Identifier for the claim.
CLM_VALUES_4.REP_PDIEM_FLTRT_AMT: The Repricing Per Diem or Flat Rate Amount for the claim.
CLM_VALUES_4.REP_APRVD_DRG_CODE: The Repriced Approved Diagnosis Related Group Code for the claim.
CLM_VALUES_4.REP_APPRVD_AMT: The Repriced Approved Amount for the claim.
CLM_VALUES_4.REP_APRVD_REV_CODE: The Repriced Approved Revenue Code for the claim.
CLM_VALUES_4.REP_ASU_MSRMNT_CODE: The basis of measurement (e.g., Days, Units) for Repriced Approved Service Unit Count.
CLM_VALUES_4.REP_APR_SERV_CNT: The Repriced Approved Service Unit Count for the claim.
CLM_VALUES_4.PAYTO_PLAN_TAXID: The Pay-To Plan Tax Identification Number.
CLM_VALUES_4.FIRST_CNCT_DT: The Property and Casualty Date of First Contact.
CLM_VALUES_4.DENTAL_SVC_FROM_DT: The Dental Service From Date. It will only be populated when using a dental form.
CLM_VALUES_4.DENTAL_SVC_TO_DT: The Dental Service To Date. It will only be populated when using a dental form.
CLM_VALUES_4.DENTAL_SVC_DT_QUAL: The dental date range qualifier. It will only be populated on a dental form.
CLM_VALUES_4.ORTHO_TREAT_IND: The Orthodontic Treatment Indicator. This column will only have data when a dental claim has orthodontic services without any months of orthodontic treatment being reported.
CLM_VALUES_4.DENT_PREDET_CODE: The code identifying whether a claim is a pre-authorization dental claim. If the claim is a predetermination of benefits claim (pre-auth), this column will be populated with "PB".  If the claim is a statement of actual services, this column will be null.
CLM_VALUES_4.OTH_ACC_EMER_YN: The indicator that the claim includes emergency services.
CLM_VALUES_4.STER_ABOR_YN: The indicator that a visit was related to a sterilization or abortion.
CLM_VALUES_4.CLM_LVL_TOS: The claim-level type of service code.
CLM_VALUES_4.CLM_LVL_EPSDT_YN: The indicator that the claim was related to an Early and Periodic Screening, Diagnostic, and Treatment (EPSDT) visit.
CLM_VALUES_4.CLM_LVL_FAM_PLAN_YN: The indicator that the claim was related to family planning.
CLM_VALUES_4.CLM_LVL_EMER_YN: The indicator that the claim was related to emergency services.
CLM_VALUES_4.PAT_LOCATION_IDENT: The county code corresponding to the patient address.
CLM_VALUES_4.PAT_PERSONAL_IDENT: The combination of patient name characters and digits from their SSN used by the Statewide Planning and Research Cooperative System (SPARCS) to identify the patient.
CLM_VALUES_4.DRG_SOI: The Severity Of Illness (SOI) of Diagnosis Related Group (DRG) determined for the claim.
CLM_VALUES_4.DRG_ROM: The Risk Of Mortality (ROM) of Diagnosis Related Group (DRG) determined for the claim.
CLM_VALUES_4.CAS_SVC_POS_NUM: The position number within the service line in the source claim CEV.
CLM_VALUES_4.CLM_RECORD_INDICATOR: The action to be taken on the claim.
CLM_VALUES_4.LINE_OF_BUSINESS_CODE: The line of business (LOB) code under which claim was paid.
CLM_VALUES_4.BENEFIT_ID: The identifier for a set of parameters, benefits, or coverage criteria used to adjudicate a claim.
CLM_VALUES_4.ADJUD_DATE: The date the claim was processed.
CLM_VALUES_4.ADJUD_TM: The time the claim was processed.
CLM_VALUES_4.REJECT_OVERRIDE_CODE: The reason for paying a claim when override is used.
CLM_VALUES_4.CROSS_REF_ICN: The ID associated with the original claim for adjustment claims.
CLM_VALUES_4.PAYMENT_CLARIFICATION_CODE: The additional information on the status of the payment of the claim.
CLM_VALUES_4.ADJUSTMENT_TYPE: The type of adjustment whether debit or credit.
CLM_VALUES_4.STER_ABOR_CODE: The single-letter sterilization/abortion code appearing in field 22D on the eMedNY 150003 claim form
CLM_VALUES_4.POSSIBLE_DISABILITY_YN: The indicator that the service was for treatment of a condition which appeared to be of a disabling nature for field 22F on the eMedNY 150003.
CLM_VALUES_4.PMT_SRC_MCR_INVOLVE: The single-digit source code indicator that indicates Medicare's involvement in paying for these charges for field 23B box M on the eMedNY 150003 claim form.
CLM_VALUES_4.PMT_SRC_OTHR_INVOLV: The single-digit code indicating whether the patient has a coverage besides Medicare and Medicaid for field 23B box O on the eMedNY 150003 claim form.
CLM_VALUES_4.PMT_SRC_INS_CODE: The two-digit insurance code for the commercial coverage, if any, for field 23B box O on the eMedNY 150003 claim form.
CLM_VALUES_4.LOCATOR_CODE: The locator code assigned by Medicaid for the address where the service was performed for field 25C on the eMedNY 150003 paper claim form.
CLM_VALUES_4.MEM_SUBMIT_PMT_RELEASE_DATE: The date the member submitted claim became payable, which could differ from the check date.
CLM_VALUES_4.DRG_CODE_SET: The code set of the Diagnosis Related Group (e.g., APR-DRG, MS-DRG).
CLM_VALUES_4.CLM_STATUS: The submitter's claim status (e.g., clean, denied).
CLM_VALUES_4.DRG_CODE_VERSION: The version of the code set that the Diagnosis Related Group (DRG) code on the claim is associated with (e.g., Version 31, Version 32)
CLM_VALUES_4.IS_CLINICALLY_INVALID_IDENT: The external identifier representing if the claim is clinically invalid or not.
CLM_VALUES_4.DRG_CODE_SET_IDENT: The external identifier representing the Diagnosis Related Group (DRG) code set.
CLM_VALUES_4.DRG_CODE_VER_IDENT: The external identifier representing the Diagnosis Related Group (DRG) version.

CLM_VALUES_5._TABLE_: All values associated with a claim are stored in the Claim External Value record. The CLM_VALUES_5 table holds claim-level values set by the system during claims processing or by user edits.
CLM_VALUES_5.RECORD_ID: The unique identifier for the claim value record
CLM_VALUES_5.FHIR_GROUP_IDENTIFIER: The bulk FHIR group ID for which the claim was received.
CLM_VALUES_5.DEPT_ALT_CODE: This item stores the alternate code for the department. The alternate code comes from MPI.   For Norway, this item stores the IK44 code.
CLM_VALUES_5.PAYER_ENTERPRISE_IDENTIFIER: Patient's enterprise ID assigned by the payer.
CLM_VALUES_5.ATT_PROV_SPECIALTY: The specialty of the attending provider.
CLM_VALUES_5.NON_PAYMENT_RSN_DESC: Claim level denial reason code description.
CLM_VALUES_5.CARRIER_PAYMENT_DNL_DESC: Carrier claim payment denial code description.
CLM_VALUES_5.BCDA_GROUP_IDENT: Claim Group Identifier provided by Beneficiary Claims Data API
CLM_VALUES_5.PRIMARY_PAYER_CD: Code used to determine if Medicare was the primary payer of this claim.
CLM_VALUES_5.BIL_PROV_SPEC_CODE_SET: Stores the code set for the Billing Provider Specialty Code.
CLM_VALUES_5.OPER_PROV_TAXONOMY: Holds the Operating Provider Taxonomy Code for a claim.
CLM_VALUES_5.PREDETERMIN_IDENT: This is the predetermination of benefits identifier for the claim.
CLM_VALUES_5.ADJ_TO_CLAIM_ID: Holds the adjustment to claim ID for the claim received from raw data
CLM_VALUES_5.REV_TO_CLAIM_ID: Holds the reversal to claim ID for the claim received from raw data
CLM_VALUES_5.ADJ_SEQUENCE: Holds the adjustment sequence for the claim received from raw data
CLM_VALUES_5.PLAN_NAME: The plan name from raw claims data.
CLM_VALUES_5.CORPORATION_NAME: Corporation name from raw claims data.
CLM_VALUES_5.NETWORK_LEVEL: Specifies the network level of the claim.
CLM_VALUES_5.REGION_NAME: The name of the region associated with the claim.
CLM_VALUES_5.LINE_OF_BUSINESS_NAME: The name of the line of business associated with the claim.
CLM_VALUES_5.SVC_PROV_IN_NETWORK: This value indicates if the service provider / pharmacy is in-network.
CLM_VALUES_5.MEDICARE_DRUG_CVG_CODE: Identifies if a claim was processed under the Medicare Part B benefit or Part D benefit.
CLM_VALUES_5.SVC_FAC_CCN: Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services Certification Number (CCN) for the service facility location.
CLM_VALUES_5.PCP_REF_PROV_NAM_LAST: This item holds the PCP referring provider's last name (NM1*P3).
CLM_VALUES_5.PCP_REF_PROV_NAM_FIRST: This item holds the PCP referring provider's first name (NM1*P3).
CLM_VALUES_5.PCP_REF_PROV_NAM_MID: This item holds the PCP referring provider's middle name (NM1*P3).
CLM_VALUES_5.PCP_REF_PROV_NAM_SUF: This item holds the PCP referring provider's suffix (NM1*P3).
CLM_VALUES_5.PCP_REF_PROV_NPI: This item holds the PCP referring provider's NPI (NM1*P3).
CLM_VALUES_5.PCP_REF_PROV_TAXONOMY: This item holds the referring provider's taxonomy code.
CLM_VALUES_5.REF_PROV_FROM_LINE_YN: Identifies whether the referring provider was received at the header level, or rolled up from the line level.
CLM_VALUES_5.REN_PROV_FROM_LINE_YN: Identifies whether the rendering provider was received at the header level, or rolled up from the line level.
CLM_VALUES_5.OPER_PROV_FROM_LINE_YN: Identifies whether the operating provider was received at the header level, or rolled up from the line level.
CLM_VALUES_5.OTHOP_PROV_FROM_LINE_YN: Identifies whether the other operating provider was received at the header level, or rolled up from the line level.
CLM_VALUES_5.PAT_RESIDENCE_CODE: The code identifying the patient's place of residence. This data is only populated for Pharmacy claims.
CLM_VALUES_5.SVC_FAC_CMS_PARTD_FLAG: Indicates whether the patient resides in a facility that qualifies for the CMS Part D benefit. This data is only populated for Pharmacy claims.
CLM_VALUES_5.BANK_IDENT_NUM: The card issuer ID or bank ID number used for network routing. This data is only populated for Pharmacy claims.
CLM_VALUES_5.PROCESSOR_CTL_NUM: The number assigned by the processor. This data is only populated for Pharmacy claims.
CLM_VALUES_5.RX_PRIOR_AUTH_TYPE: The code clarifying the prior authorization number submitted or benefit/plan exemption.
CLM_VALUES_5.PRESCRIBER_LAST_NAME: The last name of the prescribing provider. This data is only populated for Pharmacy claims.

CLM_VALUE_RECORD._TABLE_: This table holds basic identification and processing information for the claim value record.
CLM_VALUE_RECORD.RECORD_ID: The unique identifier for the claim values record.
CLM_VALUE_RECORD.RECORD_CREATION_DT: The date the record was created.
CLM_VALUE_RECORD.CLM_TYP_C_NAME: The type of claim values stored in the record. CMS is used for professional and dental claims. UB is used for institutional claims.
CLM_VALUE_RECORD.FORM_TYP_C_NAME: The type of form used during processing.
CLM_VALUE_RECORD.CONTEXT_C_NAME: The direction of the claim file, either incoming or outgoing. This value is only set for Accounts Payable claims.
CLM_VALUE_RECORD.AP_CLAIM_ID: The claim information record associated with the invoice. This value is only set for Accounts Payable claims.
CLM_VALUE_RECORD.SERV_AREA_ID: The service area for the claim values record.
CLM_VALUE_RECORD.HEALTH_SYS_IDENT: This item holds the Health System Identifier (HSI) of the source for the claim.
CLM_VALUE_RECORD.SOURCE_ORGANIZATION_ID: The source organization of the external record. This value is only set for external claims.
CLM_VALUE_RECORD.SOURCE_ORGANIZATION_ID_EXTERNAL_NAME: Organization's external name used as the display name on forms and user interfaces.
CLM_VALUE_RECORD.CLAIM_RECON_ID: The claim reconciliation record ID (CRD) associated with the claim data.
CLM_VALUE_RECORD.CRD_CONTACT_DATE_REAL: The contact date of the claim reconciliation record, in internal format.

CLP_NON_GRP_TX_IDS._TABLE_: This table stores claim print transaction IDs for Hospital Billing.
CLP_NON_GRP_TX_IDS.CLAIM_PRINT_ID: The unique identifier for the claim record.
CLP_NON_GRP_TX_IDS.LINE: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.
CLP_NON_GRP_TX_IDS.NON_GROUP_HTR_ID: Stores charges that are active on the current claim.

CLP_OCCUR_DATA._TABLE_: This table extracts the occurrence codes and occurrence dates for each claim.
CLP_OCCUR_DATA.CLAIM_PRINT_ID: The ID of the claim print record.
CLP_OCCUR_DATA.OCCURRENCE_CODE_C_NAME: The occurrence code category list for an institutional claim.
CLP_OCCUR_DATA.OCCURRENCE_DT: Stores Occurrence Date to print on institutional claims

CL_REMIT._TABLE_: This table stores information for each Image Database (IMD) record. This can be check-level or claim-level, and is indicated in column IMD_TYPE_C.
CL_REMIT.IMAGE_ID: This is the ID for the remittance image record. A separate remittance image record is created for each invoice payment.
CL_REMIT.CREATION_DATE: The date when the remittance image record was created (i.e., when the electronic file was loaded and created).
CL_REMIT.SERVICE_AREA_ID: The service area of the invoice to which this remittance payment was posted.
CL_REMIT.PAYMENT_METHOD_C_NAME: The posting method by which this remittance record was created (manual or through electronic remittance).
CL_REMIT.PAYMENT_TYPE_C_NAME: The payment type for this remittance record (self-pay or insurance).
CL_REMIT.PAYMENT_AMOUNT: Total amount paid by the payer in the remittance file.
CL_REMIT.CREDIT_DEBIT_C_NAME: Code indicating whether payment amount is a credit or debit.
CL_REMIT.PAYMENT_MTD_CODE_C_NAME: Code identifying the method for the movement of payment instructions.
CL_REMIT.PAYMENT_FMT_CD_C_NAME: Code identifying the payment format used.
CL_REMIT.SENDER_ID_QUAL_C_NAME: Sender ID qualifier. Code identifying the type of identification number of Depository Financial Institution (DFI).
CL_REMIT.SENDER_IDN_NUM: Sender Depository Financial Institution (DFI) identification number from the remittance file.
CL_REMIT.ISSUE_DATE: Check issue date or Effective Entry Date for electronic fund transfers.
CL_REMIT.TRACE_TYP_CD_C_NAME: Code identifying which transaction is being referenced.
CL_REMIT.REF_IMG_ID: Reference remittance record for general remittance file information.  A separate remittance image record is created for each invoice payment in the remittance file. The general check level information is stored in the first remittance image record and subsequent image records hold the image ID of that record in this item.
CL_REMIT.GRP_REF_ID: Reference remittance image record for Provider Summary Information and Provider Supplemental Summary Information.  A separate remittance image record is created for each invoice payment in the remittance file.  Multiple invoice payments can share the same Provider Summary Information and Provider Supplemental Summary Information. This information is stored in the first remittance image record. Subsequent image records hold the image ID of the original remittance image in this item.
CL_REMIT.PAT_ID: The patient from the invoice to which the payment in the remittance image record is posted.
CL_REMIT.CLM_START_DATE: The starting date of the claim that was sent out to the payer.
CL_REMIT.CLM_END_DATE: The ending date of the claim that was sent out to the payer.
CL_REMIT.CLP_ID: Internal ID of the claim record (for Hospital Billing only).
CL_REMIT.IMD_TYPE_C_NAME: Specifies the type of Remittance Image. 1 is Check Level and 2 is File Level.
CL_REMIT.INTER_CTRL_NUM: Holds the Interchange Control Number from the electronic remittance file.
CL_REMIT.GROUP_CTRL_NUM: Holds the Group Control Number from the electronic remittance file.

CL_RMT_CLM_DT_INFO._TABLE_: Contains claim level date information from the electronic remittance payment. This information is sent in the DTM segment in Loop 2100 of an ANSI 835 Health Care Claim Payment/Advice file. This segment is used to send specific dates associated with the claim being paid. This information is stored in the remittance image record.
CL_RMT_CLM_DT_INFO.IMAGE_ID: This is the ID for the remittance image record with related claim date information.
CL_RMT_CLM_DT_INFO.LINE: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
CL_RMT_CLM_DT_INFO.CLAIM_DATE_QUAL_C_NAME: The date qualifier code for the claim date information. This is a standard code that indicates what the date represents.
CL_RMT_CLM_DT_INFO.CLAIM_DT: Claim related date sent in the remittance file. The specific meaning of this date is indicated by the associated date qualifier code.

CL_RMT_CLM_ENTITY._TABLE_: Contains identifying information for entities (persons or organizations) from an electronic remittance payment. This information is sent in the NM1 segment of an ANSI 835 Health Care Claim Payment/Advice file. This information is stored in the remittance image record.
CL_RMT_CLM_ENTITY.IMAGE_ID: ID for the remittance image record containing the claim related entity information.
CL_RMT_CLM_ENTITY.LINE: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
CL_RMT_CLM_ENTITY.ID_CODE_C_NAME: The entity identifier code for the claim related entity. This is a standard code that indicates what type of individual or organization is being identified.
CL_RMT_CLM_ENTITY.ENT_QUAL_C_NAME: Code indicating whether this information is for a person or a non-person entity.
CL_RMT_CLM_ENTITY.LAST_NAME_ORG_NAME: This is the individual last name or organization name.
CL_RMT_CLM_ENTITY.MIDDLE_NAME: The individual middle name or initial.
CL_RMT_CLM_ENTITY.IDEN_CODE_QUALF_C_NAME: The identification code qualifier. This is a standard code that indicates what type of ID is used to identify the specific individual or organization.
CL_RMT_CLM_ENTITY.IDEN_CODE: The ID associated with the specific individual or organization.

CL_RMT_CLM_INFO._TABLE_: This table contains the invoice level information to which the payment in the remittance record is posted.
CL_RMT_CLM_INFO.IMAGE_ID: This is the ID for the remittance image record.
CL_RMT_CLM_INFO.INV_NO: The invoice number for the remittance image.
CL_RMT_CLM_INFO.CLM_STAT_CD_C_NAME: This is the code identifying the status of an entire claim.
CL_RMT_CLM_INFO.CLAIM_CHRG_AMT: This is the amount for submitted charges on this claim.
CL_RMT_CLM_INFO.CLAIM_PAID_AMT: This is the amount paid on the claim.
CL_RMT_CLM_INFO.PAT_RESP_AMT: This is the patient responsibility amount for the claim.
CL_RMT_CLM_INFO.CLM_FILING_CODE_C_NAME: This is a code identifying the type of claim.
CL_RMT_CLM_INFO.ICN_NO: This is the payer's internal control number for the claim.
CL_RMT_CLM_INFO.FAC_CODE_VAL: This is the facility code used when the submitted code has been modified through adjudication.
CL_RMT_CLM_INFO.CLAIM_FREQ_C_NAME: This is the frequency code of the claim.
CL_RMT_CLM_INFO.DRG_CODE: This is the Diagnosis Related Group (DRG) code indicating a patient's diagnosis group based on a patient's illnesses, diseases, and medical problems.
CL_RMT_CLM_INFO.DISCHRG_FRAC: The discharge fraction expressed as a decimal.
CL_RMT_CLM_INFO.FILE_INV_NUM: Contains the actual invoice number that came in the file.

CL_RMT_DELIVER_MTD._TABLE_: This table contains information on the remittance delivery method when the funds are transferred independently from the remittance.
CL_RMT_DELIVER_MTD.IMAGE_ID: The unique identifier for the image record.
CL_RMT_DELIVER_MTD.RPT_XMISSION_CODE_C_NAME: Information about how the report and related funds were transmitted
CL_RMT_DELIVER_MTD.THIRD_PARTY_NAME: Holds the name of the third party processing entity
CL_RMT_DELIVER_MTD.COMM_NUM: The communication number of the third party processing entity.

CL_RMT_HC_RMK_CODE._TABLE_: Contains health care remark code information from the service line level of an electronic remittance file. This information is sent in the LQ segment of an ANSI 835 Health Care Claim Payment/Advice file. This information is stored in the remittance image record.
CL_RMT_HC_RMK_CODE.IMAGE_ID: ID for the remittance image record containing the health care remark code information.
CL_RMT_HC_RMK_CODE.LINE: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
CL_RMT_HC_RMK_CODE.LQ_SERVICE_LINE: The service line associated with the health care remark code.
CL_RMT_HC_RMK_CODE.CODE_LST_QUAL_C_NAME: The code list qualifier code. This is a standard code which indicates which code set the remark code belongs to.
CL_RMT_HC_RMK_CODE.INDUSTRY_CODE: The specific health care remark code.

CL_RMT_INP_ADJ_INF._TABLE_: This table contains inpatient adjudication information from the Remittance Image.
CL_RMT_INP_ADJ_INF.IMAGE_ID: This is the ID for the remittance image record with inpatient adjudication information.
CL_RMT_INP_ADJ_INF.COVERED_DAYS: Covered days or visit count for the claim for inpatient adjudication information.
CL_RMT_INP_ADJ_INF.PPS_OPER_OUTL_AMT: Prospective payment system operating outlier amount for inpatient adjudication information.
CL_RMT_INP_ADJ_INF.LIFETIME_PSYC_DAYS: Lifetime psychiatric days count for inpatient adjudication information.
CL_RMT_INP_ADJ_INF.CLAIM_DRG_AMT: Monetary amount for the diagnosis related group for inpatient adjudication information.
CL_RMT_INP_ADJ_INF.REMARK_CODE_1: Remark code 1 for inpatient adjudication info.
CL_RMT_INP_ADJ_INF.CLM_DISP_SHAR_AMT: Monetary amount for the claim disproportionate share for inpatient adjudication information.
CL_RMT_INP_ADJ_INF.CLAIM_MSP_PASS_AMT: Monetary amount for the claim Medicare secondary payor pass through for inpatient adjudication information.
CL_RMT_INP_ADJ_INF.CLAIM_PPS_CAP_AMT: Monetary amount for the prospective payment system capital for inpatient adjudication information.
CL_RMT_INP_ADJ_INF.PPSCAP_FSP_DRG_AMT: Monetary amount for the prospective payment system's capital federal-specific portion for the diagnosis-related group for inpatient adjudication information.
CL_RMT_INP_ADJ_INF.PPSCAP_HSP_DRG_AMT: Monetary amount for the prospective payment system's capital hospital-specific portion for the diagnosis-related group for inpatient adjudication information.
CL_RMT_INP_ADJ_INF.PPS_DSH_DRG_AMT: Monetary amount for the prospective payment system's capital disproportionate share diagnosis related group for inpatient adjudication information.
CL_RMT_INP_ADJ_INF.OLD_CAPITAL_AMT: Monetary amount of old capital for inpatient adjudication information.
CL_RMT_INP_ADJ_INF.PPS_CAPTL_IME_AMT: Monetary amount for the prospective payment system capital's indirect medical education for inpatient adjudication information.
CL_RMT_INP_ADJ_INF.PPS_OP_HSP_DRG_AMT: Monetary amount for the prospective payment system's operating hospital's specific diagnosis related group for inpatient adjudication information.
CL_RMT_INP_ADJ_INF.COST_REPORT_DAYS: The number of days that may be claimed as Medicare patient days on a cost report for inpatient adjudication information.
CL_RMT_INP_ADJ_INF.PPS_FED_DRG_AMT: Monetary amount for the prospective payment system's operating federal specific diagnosis related group for inpatient adjudication information.
CL_RMT_INP_ADJ_INF.CLAIM_PPS_CAPT_AMT: Monetary amount for the prospective payment system's capital outlier for inpatient adjudication information.
CL_RMT_INP_ADJ_INF.CLAIM_INDR_TCH_AMT: The monetary amount for the claim indirect teaching amount for inpatient adjudication information.
CL_RMT_INP_ADJ_INF.NONPY_PROF_COM_AMT: The monetary amount for the nonpayable professional component for inpatient adjudication information.
CL_RMT_INP_ADJ_INF.REMARK_CODE_2: Remark code 2 for inpatient adjudication info.
CL_RMT_INP_ADJ_INF.REMARK_CODE_3: Remark code 3 for inpatient adjudication info.
CL_RMT_INP_ADJ_INF.REMARK_CODE_4: Remark code 4 for inpatient adjudication info.
CL_RMT_INP_ADJ_INF.REMARK_CODE_5: Remark code 5 for inpatient adjudication info.
CL_RMT_INP_ADJ_INF.PPS_EXCEPTION_AMT: Monetary amount for the prospective payment system's capital exception for inpatient adjudication information.

CL_RMT_OPT_ADJ_INF._TABLE_: This table contains outpatient adjudication information from the Image Database (IMD) master file.
CL_RMT_OPT_ADJ_INF.IMAGE_ID: This is the ID for the remittance image record with outpatient adjudication information.
CL_RMT_OPT_ADJ_INF.REIMBURSEMENT_RATE: The reimbursement rate percentage expressed as a decimal for outpatient adjudication info.
CL_RMT_OPT_ADJ_INF.HCPCS_PAYABLE_AMT: Monetary amount for the claim Healthcare Common Procedure Coding System (HCPCS) payable amount for outpatient adjudication info.
CL_RMT_OPT_ADJ_INF.CLAIM_ESRD_PAY_AMT: End stage renal disease (ESRD) payment amount for outpatient adjudication info.
CL_RMT_OPT_ADJ_INF.OUT_NONPAY_PRF_AMT: Monetary amount for outpatient adjudication nonpayable professional component.

CL_RMT_PRV_SUM_INF._TABLE_: This table stores the provider summary information for a remittance image record.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUM_INF.IMAGE_ID: This is the ID for the remittance image record with related remit claim references.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUM_INF.PROV_IDENTIFIER: This is the provider number for the remittance record.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUM_INF.FACILITY_TYPE: This is the code identifying the type of facility where services were provided for the claim reimbursed by the remittance record.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUM_INF.FP_DATE: This is the last day of the provider�s fiscal year.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUM_INF.TOT_CLAIM_COUNT: This is total number of claims.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUM_INF.TOT_CLAIM_AMT: This is the total reported charges for all claims.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUM_INF.TOT_COV_AMT: This is the monetary amount for the total covered charges. This is submitted charges less the non-covered charges.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUM_INF.TOT_NONCOV_AMT: This is the amount for the total of non-covered charges.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUM_INF.TOT_DEN_AMT: This is the monetary amount for the total of denied charges.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUM_INF.TOT_PROV_AMT: This is the monetary amount for the total provider payment. The total provider payment amount includes the total of all interest paid. The amount can be less than zero.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUM_INF.TOT_INT_AMT: This is the total amount of interest paid.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUM_INF.TOT_CONT_AMT: This is the amount for the total contractual adjustment.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUM_INF.TOT_GRAM_AMT: This is the amount for the total Gramm-Rudman adjustment.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUM_INF.TOT_MSP_AMT: This is the total Medicare Secondary Payer (MSP) primary payor amount.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUM_INF.TOT_BLOOD_AMT: This is the total blood deductible amount in dollars.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUM_INF.TOT_NONLAB_AMT: This is the summary of non-lab charges.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUM_INF.TOT_COINS_AMT: This is the total coinsurance amount.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUM_INF.HCPCS_AMT: This is the Health Care Financing Administration Common Procedural Coding System (HCPCS) reported charges.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUM_INF.HCPCS_PAYABLE: This is the total Health Care Financing Administration Common Procedural Coding System (HCPCS) payable amount.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUM_INF.TOTAL_DEDUCT_AMT: This is the total deductible amount.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUM_INF.TOT_PROF_AMT: This is the total professional component amount.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUM_INF.PAT_MSP_LIABILITY: This is the total Medicare Secondary Payer (MSP) patient liability met.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUM_INF.PAT_REIMB_AMT: This is the total patient reimbursement amount.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUM_INF.PIP_CLAIM_CNT: This is the total periodic interim payment (PIP) number of claims.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUM_INF.PIP_ADJ_AMT: This is the total periodic interim payment (PIP) adjustment.

CL_RMT_PRV_SUP_INF._TABLE_: This table contains the provider supplemental summary information for the remittance record.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUP_INF.IMAGE_ID: This is the ID for the remittance image record with related remit claim references.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUP_INF.TOT_DRG_AMT: This is the total diagnosis related group amount for the remittance record.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUP_INF.FED_AMT: This is the total federal-specific amount for the remittance record.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUP_INF.HOSP_AMT: This is the total hospital-specific amount for the remittance record.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUP_INF.DISP_SHARE_AMT: This is the total disproportionate share amount for the remittance record.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUP_INF.TOT_CAP_AMT: This is the total capital amount for the remittance record.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUP_INF.MED_EDU_AMT: This is the total indirect medical education amount for the remittance record.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUP_INF.TOT_OUT_DAY_CNT: This is the total number of outlier days for the remittance record.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUP_INF.DAY_OUT_AMT: This is the total day outlier amount for the remittance record.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUP_INF.COST_OUT_AMT: This is the total cost outlier amount for the remittance record.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUP_INF.AVG_DRG_LEN_STAY: This is the diagnosis related group (DRG) average length of stay for the remittance record.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUP_INF.TOT_DISCHARGE_CNT: This is the total number of discharges for the remittance record.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUP_INF.COST_REP_DAY_CNT: This is the total number of cost report days for the remittance record.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUP_INF.CVRD_DAY_CNT: This is the total number of covered days for the remittance record.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUP_INF.NONCVRD_DAY_CNT: This is the total number of non-covered days for the remittance record.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUP_INF.MSP_PASS_THRU_AMT: This is the total Medicare Secondary Payer (MSP) pass- through amount calculated for a non-Medicare payer for the remittance record.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUP_INF.AVG_DRG_WEIGHT: This is the average diagnosis-related group (DRG) weight for the remittance record.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUP_INF.PPS_CAP_FSP_DRG_AM: This is the total prospective payment system (PPS) capital, federal-specific portion, diagnosis-related group (DRG) amount for the remittance record.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUP_INF.PPS_CAP_HSP_DRG: This is the total prospective payment system (PPS) capital, hospital-specific portion, diagnosis-related group (DRG) amount for the remittance record.
CL_RMT_PRV_SUP_INF.TOT_PPS_DSH_DRG_AM: This is the total prospective payment system (PPS) disproportionate share, hospital diagnosis-related group (DRG) amount for the remittance record.

CL_RMT_SVCE_LN_INF._TABLE_: This table contains service line information from the remittance image.
CL_RMT_SVCE_LN_INF.IMAGE_ID: This is the ID for the remittance image record with remittance service line information.
CL_RMT_SVCE_LN_INF.LINE: The line number in the results of a query.  Each instance of service line information will have its own line.
CL_RMT_SVCE_LN_INF.SERVICE_LINE: Service line information for claim remittance.
CL_RMT_SVCE_LN_INF.PROC_IDENTIFIER: The composite medical procedure identifier to identify a medical procedure by its standardized codes for service line information.
CL_RMT_SVCE_LN_INF.LINE_ITEM_CHG_AMT: Monetary amount for submitted service line item charge.
CL_RMT_SVCE_LN_INF.PROV_PAYMENT_AMT: Monetary amount for the service line item provider payment amount.
CL_RMT_SVCE_LN_INF.NUBC_REV_CD: National uniform billing committee revenue code for service line information.
CL_RMT_SVCE_LN_INF.UNITS_PAID_CNT: Count of the Units of Service Paid for service line information.
CL_RMT_SVCE_LN_INF.SUBM_PROC_IDENT: Submitted composite medical procedure identifier information if that was different from adjudicated procedure for service line information.
CL_RMT_SVCE_LN_INF.ORIG_UNITS_CNT: Original units of service count for service line information.
CL_RMT_SVCE_LN_INF.SVC_LINE_CHG_PB_ID: ID for professional billing service line charge.
CL_RMT_SVCE_LN_INF.SVC_LINE_CHG_HB_ID: ID for hospital billing service line charge.

CL_RMT_SVC_AMT_INF._TABLE_: This table contains service line amount information for a remittance record.
CL_RMT_SVC_AMT_INF.IMAGE_ID: This is the ID for the remittance image record with related remit claim references.
CL_RMT_SVC_AMT_INF.LINE: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record. (Standard for this column type)
CL_RMT_SVC_AMT_INF.AMT_SVC_LN: The service line which this amount information refers to.
CL_RMT_SVC_AMT_INF.SVC_AMT_QUAL_C_NAME: The amount qualifier code for the claim supplemental information. This is a standard code that indicates what the monetary amount represents.
CL_RMT_SVC_AMT_INF.SVC_SUPPL_AMT: Monetary amount for the supplemental claim information. The specific meaning of this amount is indicated by the associated amount qualifier code.

CL_RMT_SVC_DAT_INF._TABLE_: This table contains service date information for a service line in a remittance record.
CL_RMT_SVC_DAT_INF.IMAGE_ID: This is the ID for the remittance image record.
CL_RMT_SVC_DAT_INF.LINE: The line number in the results of a query.
CL_RMT_SVC_DAT_INF.SVC_DATE_QUAL_C_NAME: This is the Code specifying type of service date.
CL_RMT_SVC_DAT_INF.SERVICE_LN: This is the service line for which service date is specified

CL_RMT_SVC_LVL_ADJ._TABLE_: This table contains the claim adjustment (CAS) level information for a service line of a remittance record.
CL_RMT_SVC_LVL_ADJ.IMAGE_ID: This is the ID for the remittance image record.
CL_RMT_SVC_LVL_ADJ.LINE: The line number in the results of a query.
CL_RMT_SVC_LVL_ADJ.CAS_SERVICE_LINE: This is the service line which this adjustment information refers.
CL_RMT_SVC_LVL_ADJ.SVC_CAS_GRP_CODE_C_NAME: This is the Code identifying the general category of payment adjustment.
CL_RMT_SVC_LVL_ADJ.SVC_ADJ_REASON_CD: This is the Code identifying the detailed reason the adjustment was made.
CL_RMT_SVC_LVL_ADJ.SVC_ADJ_AMT: This is the amount of the adjustment.
CL_RMT_SVC_LVL_ADJ.SVC_ADJ_QTY: This is the units of service being adjusted.

CL_RMT_SVC_LVL_REF._TABLE_: This table contains information relating to the Administrative Reference Number (REF) segment on the service line level.
CL_RMT_SVC_LVL_REF.IMAGE_ID: This is the ID for the remittance image record with related remit claim references.
CL_RMT_SVC_LVL_REF.LINE: The line number in the results of a query.  Each instance of claim remit information will have its own line.
CL_RMT_SVC_LVL_REF.REF_SVC_LN: This is the service line for reference segment.
CL_RMT_SVC_LVL_REF.SVC_REF_ID_QUAL_C_NAME: This is the service line level reference segment ID qualifier.
CL_RMT_SVC_LVL_REF.SVC_REF_IDENTIFIER: This is the service line level reference segment Identifier.

CODE_INT_COMB_LN._TABLE_: This table holds the combined service lines created by code integration.
CODE_INT_COMB_LN.HSP_ACCOUNT_ID: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the hosp acct record.
CODE_INT_COMB_LN.LINE: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
CODE_INT_COMB_LN.CODE_INT_REV_CODE_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the revenue code for the combined service line.
CODE_INT_COMB_LN.CODE_INT_REV_CODE_ID_REVENUE_CODE_NAME: The name of the revenue code.
CODE_INT_COMB_LN.CODE_INT_CPT: This item holds the CPT(R)/HCPCS code for the combined service line.
CODE_INT_COMB_LN.CODE_INT_MOD_1_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the first modifier for the combined service line.
CODE_INT_COMB_LN.CODE_INT_MOD_1_ID_MODIFIER_NAME: The name of the modifier record.
CODE_INT_COMB_LN.CODE_INT_MOD_2_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the second modifier for the combined service line.
CODE_INT_COMB_LN.CODE_INT_MOD_2_ID_MODIFIER_NAME: The name of the modifier record.
CODE_INT_COMB_LN.CODE_INT_MOD_3_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the third modifier for the combined service line.
CODE_INT_COMB_LN.CODE_INT_MOD_3_ID_MODIFIER_NAME: The name of the modifier record.
CODE_INT_COMB_LN.CODE_INT_MOD_4_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the fourth modifier for the combined service line.
CODE_INT_COMB_LN.CODE_INT_MOD_4_ID_MODIFIER_NAME: The name of the modifier record.
CODE_INT_COMB_LN.CODE_INT_RATE: This item holds the daily rate for the combined service line. The rate is only set for accommodation (room charge) revenue codes.
CODE_INT_COMB_LN.CODE_INT_DATE: This item holds the service date for the combined service line.
CODE_INT_COMB_LN.CODE_INT_QTY: This item holds the quantity (number of units) for the combined service line.
CODE_INT_COMB_LN.CODE_INT_AMT: This item holds the full charge amount for the combined service line. The value includes any non-covered amount for the line.
CODE_INT_COMB_LN.CODE_INT_NONCVRD: This item holds the non-covered amount for the combined service line.
CODE_INT_COMB_LN.CODE_INT_LN_SRC_C_NAME: This item holds the source for the CPT(R)/HCPCS code and modifiers for the combined service line.
CODE_INT_COMB_LN.CODE_INT_UNUSED_YN: This item identifies lines that are not true service lines but represent coded CPT(R)/HCPCS codes that cannot be used to create actual service lines.
CODE_INT_COMB_LN.CODE_INT_CHRG_CNT: This item holds the number of charges associated with the combined service line.
CODE_INT_COMB_LN.CODE_INT_RSN_C_NAME: This item identifies the reason the coded CPT(R)/HCPCS code could not be used in an actual service line.  This item is only set when the unused coded CPT(R)/HCPCS flag (CODE_INT_UNUSED_YN) is Yes.

COVERAGE._TABLE_: The COVERAGE table contains high-level information on both managed care and indemnity coverage records in your system.
COVERAGE.COVERAGE_ID: The unique ID assigned to the coverage record. This ID may be encrypted if you have elected to use enterprise reporting�s encryption utility.
COVERAGE.COVERAGE_TYPE_C_NAME: The category value that indicates whether a coverage is managed care or indemnity; 1 � Indemnity, 2 � Managed Care.
COVERAGE.PAYOR_ID: This column is only populated for indemnity coverages (COVERAGE_TYPE_C equal to 1). This column stores the unique identifier of the payor associated with the coverage record.  To look up the payor for managed care coverages (COVERAGE_TYPE_C equal to 2), join COVERAGE.COVERAGE_ID on V_COVERAGE_PAYOR_PLAN.COVERAGE_ID and filter on V_COVERAGE_PAYOR_PLAN.EFF_DATE and V_COVERAGE_PAYOR_PLAN.TERM_DATE to find the relevant PAYOR_ID.
COVERAGE.PLAN_ID: This column is only populated for indemnity coverages (COVERAGE_TYPE_C equal to 1). This column stores the unique identifier of the benefit plan associated with the coverage record.  To look up the benefit plan for managed care coverages (COVERAGE_TYPE_C equal to 2), join COVERAGE.COVERAGE_ID on V_COVERAGE_PAYOR_PLAN.COVERAGE_ID and filter on V_COVERAGE_PAYOR_PLAN.EFF_DATE and V_COVERAGE_PAYOR_PLAN.TERM_DATE to find the relevant BENEFIT_PLAN_ID.
COVERAGE.PLAN_GRP_ID: The ID of the employer group that determines the benefits in a managed care coverage. This item is NULL for indemnity coverages.
COVERAGE.PLAN_GRP_ID_PLAN_GRP_NAME: The name of the employer group record
COVERAGE.COBRA_STATUS_YN: This yes/no flag is set to �Y� if the coverage has been extended beyond termination of the subscriber�s employment according to a COBRA arrangement. If the coverage has not been extended under such an arrangement, this value is �N� or null.
COVERAGE.COBRA_DATE: The termination date for any COBRA arrangement.
COVERAGE.LATE_ENROLL_YN: Y if the subscriber applied for coverage outside of the open enrollment period. N or NULL if not specified as a late enrollment coverage.
COVERAGE.STUDENT_REVIEW_DT: The date on which you should review the status of any members on this coverage who are students.
COVERAGE.EPIC_CVG_ID: The unique ID of the coverage record. This column may be hidden if you have elected to use enterprise reporting�s security utility.
COVERAGE.PB_ACCT_ID: The unique ID of premium billing account associated with the coverage.
COVERAGE.CVG_EFF_DT: The effective date of the coverage.
COVERAGE.CVG_TERM_DT: The termination date of the coverage.
COVERAGE.CASEHEAD_NUMBER: The Medicaid ID number on the case head.
COVERAGE.CASEHEAD_NAME: The Medicaid name on the case head.
COVERAGE.TNSFRD_COVERAGE_ID: The ID of the coverage from which this coverage is transferred from.
COVERAGE.CVG_REG_STATUS_C_NAME: The verification status of the coverage, such as verified, changed, elapsed, etc.
COVERAGE.VERIFY_USER_ID: The ID of the user who performed the verification.
COVERAGE.VERIFY_USER_ID_NAME: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
COVERAGE.GROUP_NAME: The name of the coverage group.
COVERAGE.CVG_ADDR1: The first line of the address of the coverage (administrative offices).
COVERAGE.CVG_ADDR2: The second line of the address of the coverage (administrative offices).
COVERAGE.CVG_CITY: The city of the mailing address of the coverage (administrative offices).
COVERAGE.CVG_ZIP: The zip code of the mailing address of the coverage (administrative offices).
COVERAGE.CVG_PHONE1: The primary phone number of the coverage (administrative offices).
COVERAGE.GROUP_NUM: The identification number assigned to this subscriber's employer/plan group by the payor.  This number will appear in box 11 of the HCFA claim form.
COVERAGE.CLAIM_MAIL_CODE_C_NAME: The category value associated with where to send the claim on a coverage (i.e. send claim to payor, send claim to account, etc.)
COVERAGE.WC_EMPLOYER_ID: Workers' compensation employer at the time of injury.
COVERAGE.WC_DATE_OF_INJURY: Workers Comp date of injury. This is the date the injury occurred on the job. This field is populated as the user sets up the WC account.
COVERAGE.IS_SIG_ON_FILE_YN: Appears in Box 12 of HCFA claims. This is a Yes/No field that denotes whether authorization has been obtained to send bill or other documentation to payor for services relating to the claim.
COVERAGE.ENROLL_REASON_C_NAME: This category value stores the enrollment reason of the coverage.
COVERAGE.CVG_TERM_REASON_C_NAME: This category value stores the termination reason of the coverage.
COVERAGE.PAT_REC_OF_SUBS_ID: If the subscriber is the same person as a patient, this item contains the patient ID.
COVERAGE.COINSURANCE_OVR: Numeric Value for the coverage level coinsurance override.
COVERAGE.MEDC_COVERED_LEFT: This is the number of Medicare Covered Days Remaining
COVERAGE.MEDC_COINS_LEFT: This is the number of Medicare Coinsurance Days Remaining
COVERAGE.MEDC_RESERVE_LEFT: This is the number of Medicare Reserved Days Remaining
COVERAGE.CCS_PAT_ID: The patient's Comprehensive Community Services (CCS) ID.
COVERAGE.CCS_DX: Stores the diagnosis that makes the patient eligible for Comprehensive Community Services (CCS) coverage.
COVERAGE.CCS_CC_NAME: Stores the name of the Comprehensive Community Services (CCS) Case Coordinator.
COVERAGE.CCS_COOR_PHONE: Stores the phone number for the Comprehensive Community Services (CCS) Case Coordinator.
COVERAGE.CCS_COUNTY_PHONE: Stores the phone number for the Comprehensive Community Services (CCS) County Office.
COVERAGE.CVG_COUNTY_C_NAME: The county of the mailing address of the coverage (administrative offices).
COVERAGE.CVG_COUNTRY_C_NAME: The country of the mailing address of the coverage (administrative offices).
COVERAGE.CVG_HOUSE_NUM: The house number of the mailing address of the coverage (administrative offices).
COVERAGE.CVG_DISTRICT_C_NAME: The district of the mailing address of the coverage (administrative offices).
COVERAGE.EFF_HOSP_CVG_DT: The effective date of Medicare Part A.
COVERAGE.EFF_PROV_CVG_DT: The effective date of Medicare Part B.
COVERAGE.MEDICARE_CVG_TYPE_C_NAME: The category number for the type of Medicare coverage the patient has.
COVERAGE.Q4CO_BUCKETS_EXC_YN: Flag to indicate if bucket limits exceeded during carryover
COVERAGE.CHDP_COUNTY_C_NAME: The Child Health and Disability Prevention County Code.
COVERAGE.CHDP_AID_CODE: The Child Health and Disability Prevention Aid Code.
COVERAGE.CVG_DEDUCTIBLE_YN: This item will serve as a flag to let the end user know if the response has any deductible information
COVERAGE.FIRST_SPEC_AID_CODE: First special aid code for the Treatment Authorization Request (TAR) for Medi-Cal.
COVERAGE.SEC_SPEC_AID_CODE: Second special aid code for the Treatment Authorization Request (TAR) for Medi-Cal.
COVERAGE.THRD_SPEC_AID_CODE: Third special aid code for the Treatment Authorization Request (TAR) for Medi-Cal.
COVERAGE.EVC_NUM: Eligibility Verification Confirmation (EVC) that is used on the Treatment Authorization Request (TAR) for Medi-Cal.
COVERAGE.COUNTY_CODE_C_NAME: This item will store the county code that is returned from the 271 message.
COVERAGE.EXT_ROUTING_NUM_C_NAME: The external routing number for the coverage
COVERAGE.SUBSCR_OR_SELF_MEM_PAT_ID: This item contains the subscriber patient Id of a coverage and will be used to associate patients with linked premium billing accounts for EHI.

COVERAGE_2._TABLE_: The COVERAGE_2 table contains high-level information on both managed care and indemnity coverage records in your system.
COVERAGE_2.CVG_ID: The unique identifier for the coverage record.
COVERAGE_2.STATUS_C_NAME: The category number of the status for this coverage record.
COVERAGE_2.IS_DEDUCT_MET_C_NAME: Indicates whether the deductible has been met for this coverage. The deductible can be established on the guarantor account or patient level.
COVERAGE_2.IS_ASGN_CVG_C_NAME: Indicated whether the provider's assignment status is set to Coverage Assignment for this coverage's payor.
COVERAGE_2.SIG_ON_FILE_DATE: The date when the signature was filed.
COVERAGE_2.SIG_ON_FILE_LOC: The location at which the signature was filed.
COVERAGE_2.MEDIGAP_AUTH_YN: Indicates whether the payor for this coverage has Medigap authorization.
COVERAGE_2.TPL_RESOURCE_CODE: This column lists the Third Party Liability resource code for a specific plan. This code is either returned in the real-time eligibility response or found on the patient's insurance card.
