COVERAGE_2.THIRD_PARTY_LIAB_YN: Indicates if there is third-party liability for this coverage.
COVERAGE_2.BENEFIT_CODE: The benefit code for this coverage. This can contain any facility-specific benefit code.
COVERAGE_2.SCHEDULED_DISCON_DT: The date when the coverage is scheduled to be discontinued.
COVERAGE_2.SCHEDULED_ACTV_DT: The date when the coverage is scheduled to be activated.
COVERAGE_2.YR_ALLOW_DOL_TOT: The yearly dollar limit for payments against this coverage's payor.
COVERAGE_2.YR_ALLOW_DOL_USE: The year-to-date payments made against the coverage's payor.
COVERAGE_2.ORG_FOR_CLM_SUBMIT: The title or name of the organization to which submitted claims under this coverage will be sent.
COVERAGE_2.FINANCIAL_CLASS_C_NAME: The financial class for this coverage. This is only used for CMS claims forms and may not be reliably populated for reporting.  Reporting should done using the financial class of the payor specified in this coverage.
COVERAGE_2.COVERAGE_FAX: The fax number for this coverage.
COVERAGE_2.FREE_TXT_PLAN_NAME: The free-text plan name for this coverage.
COVERAGE_2.FREE_TXT_PAYOR_NAME: The free-text payor name for this coverage.
COVERAGE_2.PLAN_FREE_TEXT: The format of the coverage's free-text plan.
COVERAGE_2.TEFRA_PAT_YN: Indicates whether the patient is TEFRA. A patient is TEFRA if an eligible Medicare beneficiary is covered by a group health plan.
COVERAGE_2.ADMISSION_SRC_C_NAME: The category number of the admission source.
COVERAGE_2.ENROLL_CODE_FBC: The Federal Employment Program enrollment code.
COVERAGE_2.GRP_NUMBER: The group number for the coverage.
COVERAGE_2.HMO_SITE_NUM: The site number for the coverage's HMO.
COVERAGE_2.HMO_SITE_PHONE: The phone number for the coverage's HMO.
COVERAGE_2.COPAY_AMOUNT: The copay amount for the coverage.
COVERAGE_2.CHAMP_SPON_STATUS_C_NAME: The CHAMPUS/Tricare sponsor's military status, obtained from the military identification card.
COVERAGE_2.SERVICE_BRANCH: The military service branch for a CHAMPUS/Tricare coverage subscriber.
COVERAGE_2.CHAMP_SPON_BRANCH_C_NAME: A CHAMPUS/Tricare coverage sponsor's military service branch.
COVERAGE_2.CHAMP_SPON_GRADE_C_NAME: A CHAMPUS/Tricare coverage sponsor's military pay grade.
COVERAGE_2.MCARE_OTHER_INS_CO: An additional insurance company providing coverage for a Medicare patient.
COVERAGE_2.MCARE_REC_DIS_YN: Indicates if a Medicare patient is receiving disability benefit.
COVERAGE_2.DIS_CVD_BY_EMP_YN: Indicates if a Medicare patient is receiving disability coverage from their employer.
COVERAGE_2.MCARE_100_EMP_YN: Indicates if a Medicare employer has over 100 employees.
COVERAGE_2.MCARE_AUTO_YN: Indicates if the illness or injury for this visit is due to an automobile accident.
COVERAGE_2.MCARE_LIAB_YN: Indicates if the illness or injury for this visit is due to a liability accident.
COVERAGE_2.MCARE_WK_COMP_YN: Indicates if a Medicare visit is covered by Workman's Compensation.
COVERAGE_2.MCARE_NON_AUTO_YN: Indicates if the patient's visit is due to an accident not involving automobiles.
COVERAGE_2.MCARE_BLACK_LUNG_YN: Indicates whether the illness is covered by the Black Lung program.
COVERAGE_2.MCARE_VA_YN: Indicates if the illness is covered by a Veterans' Administration program.
COVERAGE_2.MCARE_PARENT_EMP_YN: Indicates whether the patient's parents or guardians are employed.
COVERAGE_2.MCARE_CVD_GD_YN: For large group health plans, indicates if the patient is covered by their parent or guardian.
COVERAGE_2.MCARE_GD_EMP_100_YN: Indicates whether the employer of this patient's parent or guardian employs over 100 people.
COVERAGE_2.IS_MCARE_VET_ADMN_C_NAME: Indicates whether this coverage is for a Veterans' Administration program.
COVERAGE_2.MCARE_EMPLOYED_YN: Indicates whether the Medicare patient is employed.
COVERAGE_2.MCARE_ENRL_HMO_YN: Indicates if the Medicare patient is enrolled in an HMO.
COVERAGE_2.MCARE_CVD_EGHP_YN: Indicates whether the patient is covered by an employer group health plan.
COVERAGE_2.MCARE_EMP_20_YN: Indicates whether the Medicare patient is employed by an employer with over 20 employees.
COVERAGE_2.MCARE_REN_DIAL_YN: Indicates whether the patient is a renal dialysis patient in the first 12 months of entitlement.
COVERAGE_2.IS_MCARE_RENAL_DI_C_NAME: Indicates whether the patient is a renal dialysis patient.
COVERAGE_2.MCARE_1ST_18MO_YN: Indicates whether the patient is in the first 18 months of entitlement for renal dialysis.
COVERAGE_2.MCARE_HOME_DIAL_YN: Indicates whether the patient is a home dialysis patient.
COVERAGE_2.MCARE_SELF_EPO_YN: Indicates whether this patient self-administers EPO.
COVERAGE_2.MCARE_DISABLE_YN: Indicates whether a patient's Medicare coverage is due to disability.
COVERAGE_2.MCARE_SPSE_RET_YN: Indicates whether a Medicare patient's spouse is retired.
COVERAGE_2.MCARE_SPOUSE_RET_DT: The date when a Medicare patient's spouse retired.
COVERAGE_2.MCARE_EMPR_INS_YN: Indicates whether a Medicare patient is insured by their employer.
COVERAGE_2.MCARE_RETIRE_YN: Indicates whether a Medicare patient is retired.
COVERAGE_2.MCARE_RETIRE_DATE: The date when a Medicare patient retired.
COVERAGE_2.MCARE_FAM_EMPY_YN: Indicates whether a Medicare patient's spouse or another family member is employed.
COVERAGE_2.MCARE_OTHR_CVG_YN: Indicates whether a Medicare patient is covered because of their spouse or other family member.
COVERAGE_2.MCARE_SPC_EMP_YN: Indicates whether a Medicare patient's spouse is employed.
COVERAGE_2.MCARE_CVG_FRM_SP_YN: Indicates whether a Medicare patient is covered through their spouse's employer group health plan.
COVERAGE_2.VERIF_EVS_YN: Indicates if verification is done through Eligibility Verification Systems (EVS).
COVERAGE_2.EVS_VERIF_DATE: The date when eligibility was verified with Eligibility Verification Systems (EVS).
COVERAGE_2.EXT_CVG_SRC_ORGANIZATION_ID: The Organization (DXO) that provided the information for this coverage.
COVERAGE_2.EXT_CVG_SRC_ORGANIZATION_ID_EXTERNAL_NAM: Organization's external name used as the display name on forms and user interfaces.
COVERAGE_2.EXT_CVG_FHIR_IDENT: The FHIR Id of a coverage record on an external system that was used to  create this coverage.
COVERAGE_2.EXT_CVG_OID: The OID of a coverage record on an external system that was used to create  this coverage.
COVERAGE_2.EXT_PAYER_NAME: Payer name received for a coverage from an external payer system.
COVERAGE_2.EXT_PLAN_NAME: Plan name received for a coverage from an external payer system.

COVERAGE_3.CVG_ID: The unique identifier for the coverage record.
COVERAGE_3.PAYOR_STATE_C_NAME: The state of the coverage payer.
COVERAGE_3.PAYOR_ZIP: The ZIP code of the coverage payer.
COVERAGE_3.PAYOR_PHONE: The phone number of the coverage payer.
COVERAGE_3.PAYOR_CLAIM_OFC_NUM: The claim office number of the coverage payer.
COVERAGE_3.REF_PROV_NAME_ID: The name of the Health Maintenance Organization's referring physician.
COVERAGE_3.REF_PROV_NAME_ID_REFERRING_PROV_NAM: The name of the referral source.
COVERAGE_3.REF_PROV_CITY: The city of the Health Maintenance Organization's referring physician.

COVERAGE_3.AUTH_NUM: The authorization number for this coverage.
COVERAGE_3.AUTHORIZATION_DTTM: The authorization date and time for this coverage.
COVERAGE_3.AUTH_PERSON: The name of the person who authorized services for this coverage.
COVERAGE_3.VERIF_DATETIME: The date and time when authorization was obtained.
COVERAGE_3.IS_CVG_VA_PROG_YN_NAME: Indicates if the coverage is for a Veterans' Administration program.
COVERAGE_3.IS_MC_PROGRAM_YN: Indicates whether the coverage is for a managed care program.
COVERAGE_3.MC_PRIM_PROV: The primary provider for a managed care coverage.
COVERAGE_3.MC_AUTH_NUM: The authorization number for a managed care coverage.
COVERAGE_3.MC_AUTH_PHONE_NUM: The authorization phone number for a managed care coverage.
COVERAGE_3.ALSO_HAS_MCARE_YN: Indicates whether the coverage subscriber also has Medicare.
COVERAGE_3.MAJOR_MEDICAL_C_NAME: Indicates whether the patient has Major Medical coverage.
COVERAGE_3.MCAID_GRP_NO_SUF_C_NAME: The two letters at the end of the recipient number on the Medicaid card.
COVERAGE_3.BC_BS_CNTRCT_ACCT_C_NAME: The contract account name on a Blue Cross/Blue Shield insurance card.
COVERAGE_3.MAC_PROV_PHONE_NUM: The phone number for the primary provider.
COVERAGE_3.MAC_AUTH_CNCT_PRSN: The person who provided authorization information for this visit.
COVERAGE_3.MCARE_RR_SUB_NO_P_C_NAME: The subscriber number for this managed care coverage.
COVERAGE_3.RECIPROCITY_NO: The reciprocity number for this coverage.
COVERAGE_3.MAC_AUTH_ENT_PRSN: The person who entered the authorization number for this managed care coverage.
COVERAGE_3.THERAPY_TYPE_C_NAME: The therapy type for this coverage.
COVERAGE_3.THERAPY_PLAN_DATE: The date when the therapy plan was established.
COVERAGE_3.THERAPY_START_DT: The date when the therapy started.
COVERAGE_3.AUTH_VALID_FROM_DT: The date when the authorization became valid.
COVERAGE_3.AUTH_VALID_TO_DATE: The date when the authorization became invalid.
COVERAGE_3.COMM_AUTH_PRSN: The person who authorized the commercial coverage.
COVERAGE_3.MC_COBRA_STATUS_YN: Indicated whether a managed care coverage has Consolidated Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act status.
COVERAGE_3.MC_COBRA_DATE: The date when a managed care coverage received Consolidated Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act status.
COVERAGE_3.PB_ACCT_CREATED_YN: Indicates whether a premium billing account was created for this coverage.
COVERAGE_3.ALTR_CVG_ATTN: The alternate name of the organization to which claims submitted under this coverage can be sent.
COVERAGE_3.ALTR_CITY: The alternate city to which claims under this coverage can be sent.
COVERAGE_3.ALTR_STATE_C_NAME: The alternate state to which claims submitted under this coverage can be sent.
COVERAGE_3.ENROLL_REASON_REG_C_NAME: The enrollment reason category number for this subscriber with this particular payer or plan.
COVERAGE_3.EXT_UPD_TYPE_C_NAME: This item stores what kind of change was requested by the external user.
COVERAGE_3.EXT_UPDATE_COMMENT: This item stores the comment that accompanies the external update request.
COVERAGE_3.ENROLL_RECV_DATE: The enrollment received date for this coverage.
COVERAGE_3.PRIOR_LIS_DATE: The most recent LIS period date.
COVERAGE_3.ALT_TRANSPLANT_PAYER_OPT_C_NAME: Use this item in conjunction with Alternate Payer configuration in the Plan record to help automate claims processing to alternate transplant payers when the relationship between Primary Plan and Alternate Payer/Plan is not 1:1.
COVERAGE_3.PB_PAID_THROUGH_DATE: The date at which the coverage's premium has been fully paid through.

DOCS_FOR_HOSP_ACCT._TABLE_: This table links the hospital account to the document (DCS) records relevant to the encounters associated with the hospital account.
DOCS_FOR_HOSP_ACCT.ACCT_ID: The unique ID of the hospital account (HAR) record for this row.
DOCS_FOR_HOSP_ACCT.LINE: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
DOCS_FOR_HOSP_ACCT.LINKED_DCS_ID: Document (DCS) record ID of the document(s) attached to the hospital account.

GUAR_ACCT_STMT_HX._TABLE_: This table contains statement history information for the guarantor account.
GUAR_ACCT_STMT_HX.ACCOUNT_ID: The unique identifier for the account record.
GUAR_ACCT_STMT_HX.LINE: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
GUAR_ACCT_STMT_HX.STMT_HX_STMT_DATE: The date on which statement was generated.
GUAR_ACCT_STMT_HX.STMT_HX_INVOICE_NUM: The invoice number of the invoice that was sent to the guarantor on this date.
GUAR_ACCT_STMT_HX.STMT_HX_NEW_CHARGE: The original amount of all new charges on this invoice. New charges are those that were not on the last invoice sent.
GUAR_ACCT_STMT_HX.STMT_HX_NEW_BALANCE: The new balance on the statement.
GUAR_ACCT_STMT_HX.STMT_HX_TTL_PMT: Total payment amount on the statement.
GUAR_ACCT_STMT_HX.STMT_HX_TTL_DB_ADJ: Total debit adjustment amount on the statement.
GUAR_ACCT_STMT_HX.STMT_HX_TTL_CR_ADJ: Total credit adjustment amount on the statement.
GUAR_ACCT_STMT_HX.STMT_HX_TTL_AMT_HLD: Total amount held on the statement.
GUAR_ACCT_STMT_HX.STMT_HX_TTL_AMT_VD: Total amount voided since last statement.
GUAR_ACCT_STMT_HX.STMT_HX_DVRY_MTHD_C_NAME: The statement delivery method category ID for the guarantor.
GUAR_ACCT_STMT_HX.STMT_HX_LST_VW_DTTM: Last date/time when the statement was most recently access from MyChart.
GUAR_ACCT_STMT_HX.STMT_HX_1ST_VW_DTTM: The date/time when the statement was first accessed from MyChart.
GUAR_ACCT_STMT_HX.STMT_HX_WHY_2_PR_C_NAME: Reason type why the paperless statement is forced to paper statement.

GUAR_ADDR_HX._TABLE_: This table holds the Accounts Receivable (EAR) related group 5000 pertaining to Guarantor Address Change History.
GUAR_ADDR_HX.ACCOUNT_ID: The unique identifier for the account record.
GUAR_ADDR_HX.LINE: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
GUAR_ADDR_HX.ADDR_CHANGE_DATE: This column specifies the date on which the address change described on the rest of the row was performed.
GUAR_ADDR_HX.ADDR_HX_1: This column contains the first line of a previous guarantor address.
GUAR_ADDR_HX.ADDR_HX_2: This column contains the second line of a previous guarantor address.
GUAR_ADDR_HX.ADDR_HX_EXTRA: This contains any additional lines for a previous guarantor address.
GUAR_ADDR_HX.CITY_HX: This column contains the city for a previous address for this guarantor.
GUAR_ADDR_HX.STATE_HX_C_NAME: This column contains the state for a previous address for this guarantor.
GUAR_ADDR_HX.ZIP_HX: This column contains the ZIP code for a previous address for this guarantor.
GUAR_ADDR_HX.ADDR_CHANGE_SRC_C_NAME: This column contains the context from which the address change was performed.

GUAR_PMT_SCORE_PB_HX._TABLE_: This table stores PB Guarantor Payment Score history items.
GUAR_PMT_SCORE_PB_HX.ACCOUNT_ID: The unique identifier for the account record.
GUAR_PMT_SCORE_PB_HX.LINE: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
GUAR_PMT_SCORE_PB_HX.SCORE_DATE: This history item will store the date that the score was calculated.
GUAR_PMT_SCORE_PB_HX.SCORE: This history item will store self-pay score.

HAR_ALL._TABLE_: Generic table that contains every hospital account record regardless of its type. It also contains the patient record that is associated with the hospital account.
HAR_ALL.ACCT_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.
HAR_ALL.PAT_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the patient associated with this hospital account.
HAR_ALL.PRIM_ENC_CSN_ID: The contact serial number associated with the primary patient contact.

HSP_ACCOUNT._TABLE_: This table contains hospital account information from the Hospital Account (HAR) and Claim (CLM) master files. It will exclude professional billing hospital accounts created by visit filing order in non-single billing office service areas.
HSP_ACCOUNT.HSP_ACCOUNT_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.HSP_ACCOUNT_NAME: The name of the patient associated with the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.ACCT_BILLSTS_HA_C_NAME: This column stores the status of the hospital account. If this is a professional billing default hospital account, this column always returns 4 (Billed).
HSP_ACCOUNT.ACCT_ZERO_BAL_DT: This column stores the date the hospital account went to a zero balance. This may be empty for older accounts, as Zero Balance Date (I HAR 244) had not always been available.
HSP_ACCOUNT.ADM_DATE_TIME: This column stores the admission date and time associated with the hospital account. The admission date and time (I HAR 400/405) are first pulled from the coding information on the hospital account. If this data is not stored on the hospital account yet, then this will pull the data from the primary patient encounter for the hospital account. Depending on a hospital billing system definition setting, this will pull either the admission date and time (I EPT 18850/18851) or the arrival date and time (I EPT 10820/10815). If the arrival date and time is not available than the admission date and time will be used.
HSP_ACCOUNT.ADM_DEPARMENT_ID: The department of the account's admission event.
HSP_ACCOUNT.ADM_LOC_ID: The location of the account's admission event.
HSP_ACCOUNT.ADM_PRIORITY: The admission priority stored in the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.ADM_PROV_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the admitting provider stored on the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.ATTENDING_PROV_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the attending provider stored on the hospital account. See column PROV_ID in table HSP_ATND_PROV if coding has not been performed on this hospital account. Alternatively, see V_ARHB_HSP_ACCOUNT_ADDL_INFO for the calculated value for this column based on both hospital account and encounter data. This view should be used to maintain backwards compatibility with reports created before upgrading to the Summer 2009 release.
HSP_ACCOUNT.AUTOPSY_DONE_YN: Denotes whether an autopsy was performed.
HSP_ACCOUNT.BAD_DEBT_AGENCY_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the collection agency that was selected when the hospital account was sent to bad debt, sent to external agency A/R, outsourced, or pre-collected. This is cleared when the account returns from bad debt, returns from external agency A/R, or is no longer outsourced.
HSP_ACCOUNT.BAD_DEBT_AGENCY_ID_COLL_AGENCY_NAME: The name of the collection agency.
HSP_ACCOUNT.BAD_DEBT_BUCKET_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the bad debt bucket that was created when the hospital account was sent to bad debt.
HSP_ACCOUNT.CODE_BLUE_YNU: Denotes whether the patient associated with the hospital account was code blue.
HSP_ACCOUNT.COMBINE_ACCT_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the target hospital account into which this hospital account was combined.
HSP_ACCOUNT.COMBINE_DATE_TIME: The date and time that this hospital account was combined with another one.
HSP_ACCOUNT.COMBINE_USER_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the user who combined this hospital account with another one.
HSP_ACCOUNT.COMBINE_USER_ID_NAME: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
HSP_ACCOUNT.COMPLETION_DT_TM: The date and time when abstracting was completed for the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.CVG_LIST_SELECT_YN: Denotes whether coverages have been put on the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.DISCH_DATE_TIME: This column stores the discharge date and time associated with the hospital account. The discharge date and time (I HAR 425/430) are first pulled from the coding information on the hospital account. If this data is not stored on the hospital account yet, then this will pull the discharge date and time (I EPT 18855/18856) that is stored on the primary patient encounter for the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.DISCH_DEPT_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the discharge department on the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.DISCH_DESTIN_HA_C_NAME: This column stores the discharge destination stored in the hospital account. This item is copied from the patient's ADT event record.
HSP_ACCOUNT.DISCH_LOC_ID: The discharge location stored in the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.DISCH_TO: A discharge destination stored in the hospital account for coding and/or abstracting purposes. This is manually entered into the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.DRG_EXPECTED_REIMB: This column stores the diagnosis-related group (DRG)-based expected reimbursement amount stored in the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.ER_ADMIT_DATE_TIME: The emergency room admission date and time stored in the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.ER_DSCHG_DATE_TIME: The emergency room discharge date and time stored in the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.ER_PAT_STS_HA_C_NAME: The emergency room patient status stored in the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.EXPIRATION_UNIT_ID: The expiration unit stored in the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.FINAL_DRG_ID: The final coded DRG stored in the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.FINAL_DRG_ID_DRG_NAME: The name of the Diagnoses Related Group name.
HSP_ACCOUNT.FRST_DMND_STMT_DT: The date that the first demand statement was sent for the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.FRST_STMT_DATE: The date that the first statement (non-demand) was sent for the hospital account.  If you are sending informational or prorated statements this date will store the date the first informational, prorated, or full statement was sent.
HSP_ACCOUNT.GUAR_ADDR_1: The first line of the street address of the guarantor for the hospital account at time of discharge.
HSP_ACCOUNT.GUAR_ADDR_2: The second line of the street address of the guarantor for the hospital account at time of discharge.
HSP_ACCOUNT.GUAR_NAME: The name of the guarantor for the hospital account at time of discharge.
HSP_ACCOUNT.GUAR_WK_PHONE: The work phone number of the guarantor for the hospital account at time of discharge.
HSP_ACCOUNT.GUAR_ZIP: The ZIP Code of the guarantor for the hospital account at time of discharge.
HSP_ACCOUNT.IS_INSTI_YN: Denotes whether the hospital account is designated as an institutional account. A hospital account is considered institutional if its guarantor is of a type designated as institutional in the system definition profile.
HSP_ACCOUNT.LAST_DMND_STMT_DT: The last date that a demand statement was sent for the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.LAST_INTRM_BILL_DT: The last date that interim billing was performed for the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.MEANS_OF_ARRV_C_NAME: The patient's means of arrival stored in the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.NUM_OF_DET_BILLS: The number of detail bills that have been sent for the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.NUM_OF_DMND_STMTS: The number of demand statements that have been sent for the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.NUM_OF_STMTS_SENT: The number of statements (non-demand) that have been sent for the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.PAT_CITY: The city portion of the address of the patient for the hospital account at time of discharge.
HSP_ACCOUNT.PAT_DOB: The date of birth of the patient for the hospital account at time of discharge.
HSP_ACCOUNT.PAT_HOME_PHONE: The home phone number of the patient for the hospital account at time of discharge.
HSP_ACCOUNT.PAT_SSN: The social security number of the patient for the hospital account at time of discharge.
HSP_ACCOUNT.PAT_WRK_PHN: The work phone number of the patient for the hospital account at time of discharge.
HSP_ACCOUNT.PAT_ZIP: The ZIP Code of the patient for the hospital account at time of discharge.
HSP_ACCOUNT.POLICE_INVOLVD_YNU: Denotes whether the police were involved in the circumstances of the patient's hospital stay.
HSP_ACCOUNT.POST_ADM_EXP_HA_C_NAME: Denotes whether the patient expired after admission.
HSP_ACCOUNT.POST_OP_EXP_HA_C_NAME: Denotes whether the patient expired after an operation.
HSP_ACCOUNT.PREBILL_BUCKET_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account's prebilled bucket.
HSP_ACCOUNT.PRIM_SVC_HA_C_NAME: The primary service stored in the hospital account for the patient's hospital stay.
HSP_ACCOUNT.PSYCH_CASE_YNU: Denotes whether the patient is classified as a psychiatric case.
HSP_ACCOUNT.REHAB_INDICATOR: Denotes whether the patient was undergoing rehab.
HSP_ACCOUNT.SCNDRY_SVC_HA_C_NAME: The secondary service stored in the hospital account for the patient's hospital stay.
HSP_ACCOUNT.SELF_PAY_BUCKET_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account's self-pay bucket.
HSP_ACCOUNT.SERV_AREA_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the service area stored on the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.TOT_ADJ: The total of all adjustments on the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.TOT_CHGS: The total of all charges on the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.TRANSFER_FROM: Denotes where the patient was transferred from.
HSP_ACCOUNT.TREATMENT_AUTH_NUM: Note: This column will be deprecated in a future release. Please start referring to the column HSP_ACCT_CLAIM_HAR.AUTHORIZATION_NUM in your reports. Authorization Number: Used on claims for identifying patient referrals and affected reimbursements. Refer to CLAIM_INFO2 table if not set on the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.UB92_COINS_DAYS: The number of coinsurance days that were listed on a UB92 claim for the hospital account. This is a user-entered value that overrides the value calculated by the system. Refer to AP_CLAIM table if not set on the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.UB92_COVERED_DAYS: The number of covered days that were listed on a UB92 claim for the hospital account. This is a user-entered value that overrides the value calculated by the system. Refer to AP_CLAIM table if not set on the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.UB92_LIFETIME_DAYS: The number of lifetime reserve days that were listed on a UB92 claim for the hospital account. Refer to AP_CLAIM table if not set on the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.UB92_NONCOVRD_DAYS: The number of noncovered days that were listed on a UB92 claim for the hospital account. This is a user-entered value that overrides the value calculated by the system. Refer to AP_CLAIM table if not set on the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.UB92_TOB_OVERRIDE: Note: This column will be deprecated in a future release. Please start referring to the column HSP_ACCT_CLAIM_HAR.UB92_TOB_OVERRIDE in your reports. Type of Bill (TOB) override: TOB is a numeric code printed on claims that provide encounter information to a payer. Values entered here will override system settings that normally determine the Type of Bill. Refer to CLAIM_INFO2 table if not set on the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.UNDISTRB_BUCKET_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for a hospital account's undistributed bucket.
HSP_ACCOUNT.PATIENT_STATUS_C_NAME: The patient status (discharge disposition) category ID for the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.ADMISSION_SOURCE_C_NAME: The point of origin category ID (admission source) for the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.ADMISSION_TYPE_C_NAME: The admission type category ID for the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.PRIMARY_PAYOR_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the primary payer associated with the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.PRIMARY_PLAN_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the primary benefit plan associated with the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.NUM_OF_CHARGES: The total number of charge transactions posted to the hospital account. This number may include inactive charges, such as reversals and reversed charges.
HSP_ACCOUNT.SIGN_ON_FILE_C_NAME: The category ID indicating whether a hospital account signature is on file. This is an abstracting item.
HSP_ACCOUNT.SIGN_ON_FILE_DATE: The date the signature on file was entered for the hospital account. This is an abstracting item.
HSP_ACCOUNT.PRIM_CONTACT_OVRD: The value for the primary contact override associated with the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.CODING_STATUS_C_NAME: The coding status category ID for the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.CODING_STS_USER_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the user when the coding status for the hospital account last changed.
HSP_ACCOUNT.CODING_STS_USER_ID_NAME: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
HSP_ACCOUNT.CODING_DATETIME: The date and time that the coding status for the hospital account was last changed.
HSP_ACCOUNT.ABSTRACT_USER_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the user who last changed the abstracting status of the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.ABSTRACT_USER_ID_NAME: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
HSP_ACCOUNT.OLD_RECUR_PRNT_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the parent recurring account before combine.
HSP_ACCOUNT.CASE_MIX_GRP_CODE: The case-mix group code associated with the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.LAST_CMG_CODE: The CMG code from the last CPT merge.
HSP_ACCOUNT.LAST_INT_CVG_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the last interim coverage associated with the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.BIRTH_WEIGHT: The birth weight of the newborn associated with the hospital account. This is an abstracting item.
HSP_ACCOUNT.GESTATIONAL_AGE: On the mother's hospital account, the gestational age of the baby. This is an abstracting item.
HSP_ACCOUNT.DISCHARGE_WEIGHT: The discharge weight of the newborn associated with the hospital account. This is an abstracting item.
HSP_ACCOUNT.ORGAN_DONOR_YN: Indicates whether the patient associated with hospital account is an organ donor. This is an abstracting item.
HSP_ACCOUNT.PREMATURE_BABY_YN: Indicates whether the baby associated with the hospital account is premature. This is an abstracting item.
HSP_ACCOUNT.CODER_INITIALS: The initials of the user to last change the coding status on the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.ADMIT_CATEGORY_C_NAME: This column stores the admission category ID for this hospital account. See column ADMIT_CATEGORY_C in table PAT_ENC_HSP if coding has not been performed on this hospital account. Alternatively, see V_ARHB_HSP_ACCOUNT_ADDL_INFO for the calculated value for this column based on both hospital account and encounter data. This view should be used to maintain backwards compatibility with reports created before upgrading to the Summer 2009 release.
HSP_ACCOUNT.FIRST_BILLED_DATE: This column stores the date when the account moved to the billed state for the first time.
HSP_ACCOUNT.LAST_CODING_DATE: The date of the last coding status change for the hospital account. This is an abstracting item.
HSP_ACCOUNT.EXP_TOTAL_CHG_AMT: The expected total charge amount for the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.EXP_TOTAL_CHG_CMT: The expected total charge user comment for the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.EXP_PAT_LIAB_CMT: The expected patient liability user comment for the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.BILL_DRG_IDTYPE_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the billing DRG code set on the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.BILL_DRG_IDTYPE_ID_ID_TYPE_NAME: The name of the ID Type.
HSP_ACCOUNT.BILL_DRG_MDC_VAL: The Major Diagnostic Category value for the billing DRG on the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.BILL_DRG_WEIGHT: The weight for the billing DRG on the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.BILL_DRG_PS_NAME: The severity of illness (SOI) category ID associated with the billing DRG on the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.BILL_DRG_ROM_NAME: The risk of mortality category ID associated with the billing DRG on the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.BILL_DRG_SHORT_LOS: The short length of stay for the billing DRG on the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.BILL_DRG_LONG_LOS: The long length of stay for the billing DRG on the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.BILL_DRG_AMLOS: The arithmetic mean length of stay for the billing DRG on the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.BILL_DRG_GMLOS: The geometric mean length of stay for the billing DRG on the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.BASE_INV_NUM: The base invoice number for this row.
HSP_ACCOUNT.INV_NUM_SEQ_CTR: The invoice number sequence counter for the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT.RESEARCH_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the research study or client record.
HSP_ACCOUNT.SPECIALTY_SVC_C_NAME: The specialty service category ID associated with the hospital account. This is an abstracting item.
HSP_ACCOUNT.XFER_TO_NURSE_C_NAME: The category value of the transfer to nursing home item for the hospital account. This is an abstracting item.
HSP_ACCOUNT.XFER_TO_ACUTE_C_NAME: The category value of the transfer to acute care facility item for the hospital account. This is an abstracting item.
HSP_ACCOUNT.DEATH_TYPE_C_NAME: The type of death category ID for the hospital account. This is an abstracting item.
HSP_ACCOUNT.APGAR_1_MIN: The Apgar score at one minute for the newborn associated with the hospital account. This is an abstracting item.
HSP_ACCOUNT.APGAR_5_MIN: The Apgar score at five minutes for the newborn associated with the hospital account. This is an abstracting item.
HSP_ACCOUNT.GRAVIDA: The total number of pregnancies the patient on the hospital account has had, regardless of whether they were carried to term. This is an abstracting item.
HSP_ACCOUNT.PARA: The number of pregnancies that the patient on the hospital account has carried until the point where the fetus is viable. This is an abstracting item.
HSP_ACCOUNT.BIRTH_CERT_SENT_YN: Indicates whether a birth certificate has been sent for this account. A null value for this column indicates that a birth certificate has not been sent. This is an abstracting item.
HSP_ACCOUNT.FAILED_VBAC_YN: Indicates whether a vaginal birth after caesarian failed. This is an abstracting item.
HSP_ACCOUNT.DELIVERY_DATE_TIME: The date and time of the delivery associated with the hospital account. This is an abstracting item.
HSP_ACCOUNT.PRENATAL_PROV_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the prenatal physician. This is an abstracting item.
HSP_ACCOUNT.DELIVER_PROV_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the delivering physician associated with the hospital account. This is an abstracting item.
HSP_ACCOUNT.HOLD_STATUS_C_NAME: The coding hold status category ID for the hospital account. This is an abstracting item.
HSP_ACCOUNT.GEST_AGE_BABY: The gestational age of the baby associated with the hospital account. This is an abstracting item.
HSP_ACCOUNT.ACCT_FOLLOWUP_DT: This column stores the self-pay follow-up date associated with this hospital account.

HSP_ACCOUNT_2._TABLE_: This table contains hospital account information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file. This second hospital account table has the same basic structure as HSP_ACCOUNT, but was created as a second table to prevent HSP_ACCOUNT from getting any larger. This table will exclude professional billing HARs created by visit filing order in non-single billing office service areas.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.HSP_ACCOUNT_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.HH_AGENCY_C_NAME: The home health agency associated with the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.EXPIRATION_REASON: The reason for expiration (anesthesia, operation, etc.).  If the discharge disposition is not "expired," this field will not be populated.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.DECEASED_TIME: The date and time for the death of the patient that is associated with this hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.DURATIONS_HYPERAL: This column stores the number of days patient is on Hyperal. Hyperal is the same as Total Parenteral Nutrition (TPN) regarding diet and nutrition management.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.OPEN_DENIAL_BDC_YN: This column stores whether the hospital account has an open denial record.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.OPEN_RMK_BDC_YN: This column stores whether the hospital account has an open remark record.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.OPEN_COR_BDC_YN: This column stores whether the hospital account has an open correspondence record.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.ECMO: This column stores the number of days the patient has been using the ECMO (extracorporeal membrane oxygenation) equipment.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.MECHANICAL_VENT: The number of days the patient has been using the mechanical ventilator.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.ARCHIVE_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the archive record of the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.ARCHIVE_DT: The date the hospital account was archived.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.REC_CREATE_USER_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the user who created the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.REC_CREATE_USER_ID_NAME: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.REGIONAL_STUDY_1: This column stores the Regional study 1, which is one of the coding info items.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.REGIONAL_STUDY_2: This column stores the Regional study 2, which is one of the coding info items.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.FACILITY_STUDY_A: Facility study A is one of the coding info items. The abstract info tab in account maintenance can be configured to display these items.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.FACILITY_STUDY_B: Facility study B is one of the coding info items. The abstract info tab in account maintenance can be configured to display these items.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.DECUBITIS_C_NAME: Decubitis is one of the coding info items. The abstract info tab in account maintenance can be configured to display these items.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.TRAUMA_C_NAME: Trauma is one of the coding info items. The abstract info tab in account maintenance can be configured to display these items.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.GEST_AGE_DAYS: Gestational age days is one of the coding info items. The abstract info tab in account maintenance can be configured to display these items.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.GEST_AGE_BABY_DAYS: Gestational (baby) age days is one of the coding info items. The abstract info tab in account maintenance can be configured to display these items.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.ESOP_PAYOR_C_NAME: This column stores the expected source of payment payer, which is a coding info item that stores the payer that is expected to pay for the services. This item is necessary for regulatory reporting in some states. The abstract info tab in account maintenance can be configured to display this item.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.ESOP_PLAN_NAME_C_NAME: Expected source of payment plan name is one of the coding info items. It stores the plan that is expected to pay for the services. This item is necessary for regulatory reporting in some states. The abstract info tab in account maintenance can be configured to display coding items.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.ESOP_PLAN_TYPE_C_NAME: Expected source of payment plan type is one of the coding info items. It stores the type of plan that is expected to pay for the services. This item is necessary for regulatory reporting in some states. The abstract info tab in account maintenance can be configured to display coding items.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.CODING_USER: This column stores the unique identifier for the user who last changed the coding status of the hospital account. This is frequently used to join to the CLARITY_EMP table.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.CODING_USER_NAME: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.APGAR_10_MIN: The Apgar score at ten minutes for the newborn associated with the hospital account. This is an abstracting item.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.FRST_PRO_STMT_DT: This field contains the date of the first non-demand enterprise statement to be sent with a self-pay proration balance.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.LST_PRO_STMT_DT: This field contains the date of the most recent non-demand enterprise statement to be sent with a self-pay proration balance.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.NUM_PRO_STMTS: This field contains the total number of non-demand enterprise statements sent with a self-pay proration balance.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.FRST_PRO_D_STMT_DT: This field contains the date of the first demand enterprise statement to be sent with a self-pay proration balance.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.LST_PRO_D_STMT_DT: This field contains the date of the most recent demand enterprise statement to be sent with a self-pay proration balance.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.NUM_PRO_D_STMTS: This field contains the total number of demand enterprise statements sent with a self-pay proration balance.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.FRST_FULL_STMT_DT: This field contains the date of the first non-demand enterprise statement to be sent where the remaining account balance is completely self-pay.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.LST_FULL_STMT_DT: This field contains the date of the most recent non-demand enterprise statement to be sent where the remaining account balance is completely self-pay.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.NUM_FULL_STMTS: This field contains the total number of non-demand enterprise statements sent where the remaining account balance is completely self-pay.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.FST_FULL_D_STMT_DT: This field contains the date of the first demand enterprise statement to be sent where the remaining account balance is completely self-pay.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.LST_FULL_D_STMT_DT: This field contains the date of the most recent demand enterprise statement to be sent where the remaining account balance is completely self-pay.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.NUM_FULL_D_STMTS: This field contains the total number of demand enterprise statements sent where the remaining account balance is completely self-pay.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.FIRST_SELF_PAY_DT: This field contains the date of the first self-pay balance for this account.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.FIRST_FULL_SP_DT: This field contains the first date when the self-pay balance equaled the full account balance for this account.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.STILLBORN_YN: Indicates whether a pregnancy resulted in a stillbirth. This is an abstracting item.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.NUM_LIVE_BIRTHS: This column contains the abstracted number of children that were born alive for the hospital account encounter.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.FIRST_INFO_STMT_DT: This field contains the date of the first non-demand enterprise statement to be sent with no self-pay balance (only insurance balance).
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.LAST_INFO_STMT_DT: This field contains the date of the most recent non-demand enterprise statement to be sent with no self-pay balance (only insurance balance).
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.LAST_D_INFO_STM_DT: This field contains the date of the most recent demand enterprise statement to be sent with no self-pay balance (only insurance balance).
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.NUM_D_INFO_STMTS: This field contains the total number of demand enterprise statements sent with no self-pay balance (only insurance balance).
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.FARM_ACCIDENT_YN: This column stores whether or not the hospital account was abstracted as a farm accident. 0-No or 1-Yes.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.EXTERN_AR_FLAG_YN: External A/R Flag. This flag determines if an account's A/R is to be counted as belonging to an external agency (i.e., as bad debt). This flag is set by a collections action and can be unset by another action. This flag is only used if external agency A/R has been enabled.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.PRIMARY_CONTACT: This column stores the primary contact date (DAT) of the hospital account. It's used in many places, such as in determining the admission/discharge date of the account.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.NUM_STILLBORNS: This column contains the abstracted number of stillborns for the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.HOSP_INFECTION_YN: Indicates whether the patient developed a hospital infection during the hospital account encounter.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.RAPID_RESP_TEAM_YN: Indicates whether a rapid response team was needed during the hospital account encounter.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.RETURN_TO_OR_YN: Indicates whether the patient was returned to operating room. This is an abstracting item.
HSP_ACCOUNT_2.NONCVRD_SNF_STAY_YN: This column stores whether the Skilled Nursing Facility (SNF) stay billed on this account is non-covered due to not having a prior qualifying inpatient stay.

HSP_ACCOUNT_3._TABLE_: This table contains hospital account information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file. This third hospital account table has the same basic structure as HSP_ACCOUNT and HSP_ACCOUNT_2, but was created as a third table to prevent the other tables from getting any larger. This table will exclude professional billing hospital account records created by visit filing order in non-single billing office service areas.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.HSP_ACCOUNT_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.ADMIT_TYPE_EPT_C_NAME: Admit type as stored on patient record.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.PAT_STS_EPT_C_NAME: Patient Status as stored on patient record.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.PMTPLN_EST_INIT_BAL: This column stores the initial estimated payment plan balance for the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.IP_ADMIT_DATE_TIME: This column indicates the inpatient admission date and time that has been stored in the hospital account.  This may differ from the admission date and represents the date a patient was admitted with an IP base class.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.NEW_CANCER_YNU: This column stores a yes/no/unknown record of whether or not a patient's cancer is new.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.HYPERALIMENT_DAYS: This column stores the number of days that a patient received hyperalimentation therapy.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.BAD_DEBT_FLAG_YN: Bad Debt Flag. This flag determines if an account's non-prebilled balance is in bad debt. This is only used if account-based bad debt is used.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.PAT_HOUSE_NUM: House number in the address in patient demographic information on a hospital account. Added to support international address formats.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.FAC_TRANS_FROM_C_NAME: The facility the patient was transferred from prior to their stay.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.FAC_TRANS_TO_C_NAME: The facility the patient was transferred to after their stay.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.TISSUE_REMOVED_YN: This item represents if tissue was removed during surgery.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.READMIT_RLTD_YN: This item represents if the patient was readmitted for a related reason.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.WNDCARE_PRVD_YN: This item represents if wound care was provided during this visit.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.OSHPD_ADM_SITE_C_NAME: The OSHPD admission site category number for this hospital account.  This data is populated by coders in the abstracting activity.  The abstracting activity must be configured to include this field to use this.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.OSHPD_LIC_SITE_C_NAME: The OSHPD licensure of site category number for this hospital account.  This data is populated by coders in the abstracting activity.  The abstracting activity must be configured to include this field to use this.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.OSHPD_RTE_ADM_C_NAME: The OSHPD route of admission category number for this hospital account.  This data is populated by coders in the abstracting activity.  The abstracting activity must be configured to include this field to use this.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.OSHPD_TYP_CARE_C_NAME: The OSHPD patient's type of care category number for this hospital account.  This data is populated by coders in the abstracting activity.  The abstracting activity must be configured to include this field to use this.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.HAS_OPEN_OVRP_BD_YN: Indicates whether the hospital account has open overpayment records.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.EBC_BIRTH_DT_TM: The date and time of birth on the electronic birth certificate for the child that is associated with this hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.HH_HSB_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the home health summary block that is associated with this hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.SELF_PAY_YN: Indicates whether this hospital account is self-pay.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.EBC_LAST_MENSES_FT: The date of the mother's last normal menses prior to the birth.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.SBO_SPLIT_HAR_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for a mixed hospital account used with splits in shared-mode single billing office. This will be populated on professional billing-only hospital accounts that were created as the result of splitting a mixed hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.BILL_DRG_QLFR_C_NAME: This column stores the additional diagnosis-related group (DRG) qualifier for the billing DRG type and code.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.ACTUAL_COPAY_AMT: For all insurance buckets of the last coverage in the filing order, the total copay specified by insurance on payments.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.ACTUAL_COINS_AMT: For all insurance buckets of the last coverage in the filing order, the total coinsurance specified by insurance on payments.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.ACTUAL_DED_AMT: For all insurance buckets of the last coverage in the filing order, the total deductible specified by insurance on payments.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.SBO_BILL_AREA_ID: Save the bill area associated with HAR. Currently it is only set when the one PB HAR per bill area logic is used.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.SBO_BILL_AREA_ID_BILL_AREA_NAME: The record name of this bill area, financial subdivision, or financial division.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.MYC_LST_ST_VW_DTTM: This column stores the date and time when this Hospital Billing statement was last viewed in MyChart for this hospital account. If you are using hospital account-level statements, this field will be updated when that specific hospital account statement is viewed in MyChart. If you are using guarantor-level statements, then this field will be updated when a guarantor statement that includes this hospital account is viewed in MyChart. The date and time for this column is stored in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) and can be converted to local time by using the EFN_UTC_TO_LOCAL Clarity database function.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.MYC_LST_DB_VW_DTTM: This column stores the date and time when a Hospital Billing detail bill was last viewed in MyChart for this hospital account. The date and time for this column is stored in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) and can be converted to local time by using the EFN_UTC_TO_LOCAL Clarity database function.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.MYC_LST_LTR_VW_DTTM: This column stores the date and time when a Hospital Billing letter was last viewed in MyChart for this hospital account. The date and time for this column is stored in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) and can be converted to local time by using the EFN_UTC_TO_LOCAL Clarity database function.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.CDI_SPECIALIST_ID: Stores the person responsible for the CDI process.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.CDI_SPECIALIST_ID_NAME: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.CDI_START_DATE: Stores the date the CDI review started.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.CDI_LAST_RVW_DATE: Stores the last date the CDI review was done.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.CDI_DRG_CHANGED_YN: This column indicates whether the clinical documentation improvement (CDI) queries resulted in a DRG change.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.CDI_INITIAL_DRG_ID: Stores the initial DRG before the CDI review is complete.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.CDI_INITIAL_DRG_ID_DRG_NAME: The name of the Diagnoses Related Group name.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.CDI_INITIAL_REIMB: Stores the expected reimbursement based on the initial DRG.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.CDI_WORKING_DRG_ID: Stores the working DRG assigned by the CDI specialist.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.CDI_WORKING_DRG_ID_DRG_NAME: The name of the Diagnoses Related Group name.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.CDI_WORKING_REIMB: Stores the expected reimbursement based on the working DRG.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.CDI_PRIMARY_DX_ID: Stores the primary diagnosis identified by the CDI specialist.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.CDI_DRG_MATCH_YN: Indicates whether the final DRG selected by the coder matches the working DRG specified by the CDI specialist.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.PULSE: The pulse for the patient on the hospital account. This is an abstracting item. The data can be configured to copy from the first pulse taken on the primary contact.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.PRELIM_COD_DX_ID: This item contains the Preliminary Cause of Death as entered by a coder.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.COD_RECORD_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the coding record for CDI that is associated with the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.CMS_OP_ESRD_STRT_DT: This column stores the date the patient started to receive maintenance dialysis treatments for end-stage renal disease (ESRD).
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.CMS_OP_ESRD_DX_G_DT: The first date that the acute comorbidity of gastrointestinal bleeding was present during maintenance dialysis treatments for ESRD.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.CMS_OP_ESRD_DX_B_DT: This column stores the first date the acute comorbidity of bacterial pneumonia was present during maintenance dialysis treatments for end-stage renal disease (ESRD).
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.CMS_OP_ESRD_DX_P_DT: The first date that the acute comorbidity of pericarditis was present during maintenance dialysis treatments for ESRD.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.BILLING_DRG_SRC_C_NAME: This virtual item displays the source code set of the billing DRG.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.NYS_PROC_STRT_DTTM: The start date and time that the ambulatory surgery patient entered the operating room exclusive of pre-op (preparation) and post-op (recovery) time.  This is used for New York SPARCS reporting.
HSP_ACCOUNT_3.NYS_PROC_END_DTTM: The end date and time that the ambulatory surgery patient left the operating room exclusive of pre-op (preparation) and post-op (recovery) time.  This is used for New York SPARCS reporting.

HSP_ACCOUNT_4._TABLE_: This table contains hospital account information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file. It excludes Professional Billing HARs created by visit filing order in non-single billing office service areas. This fourth hospital account table has the same basic structure as HSP_ACCOUNT, HSP_ACCOUNT_2 and HSP_ACCOUNT_3.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.HSP_ACCOUNT_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.EPISODE_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the bundled episode record for this row. This column will only be populated for hospital accounts that have been linked to a bundled episode and is frequently used to link to the BND_EPSD_INFO table. This column is being transitioned to the HSP_ACCT_BND_EPSD_INFO__BND_EPSD_EPISODE_ID column. This column will continue to work in the following manner: 1. Data in Bundled Episode (I HAR 10001) will continue to be extracted by this column.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.SRCHG_POSTED: Stores the surcharge amount posted on the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.SRCHG_PAID: Stores the surcharge amount paid on the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.SRCHG_PAID_SELFPAY: Stores the surcharge amount paid by patient on the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.SRCHG_PAID_INS: Stores the surcharge amount paid by insurance on the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.TRAUMA_ADMISSION_C_NAME: Whether the admission is a trauma case.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.REHAB_ADMISSION_C_NAME: The code for rehabilitation admission class from the Guide for the Uniform Data Set for Medical Rehabilitation.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.REHAB_IMPAIRMENT_C_NAME: The group code for rehabilitation impairment from the Guide for the Uniform Data Set for Medical Rehabilitation.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.RANCHO_LEVEL_C_NAME: This column stores the Rancho level used to determine diagnosis-related groups (DRG) for rehabilitation services.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.SVC_SUCCESS_C_NAME: Holds whether the account was successfully marked "Coding Complete" by Simple Visit Coding.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.HH_COVCHG_DT: The home health coverage change date for the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.HH_COVCHG_DC_DISP_C_NAME: This is the discharge disposition value that should be used in the case of a home health coverage change.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.HAR_EXTRACT_TRIGGER_DATE: Stores the date that hospital account information was changed that will cause the extraction of a closed hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.IRF_PAI_REGISTRY_DATA_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the Inpatient Rehabilitation Facility Patient Assessment Instrument (IRF-PAI) record associated with the hospital account. The IRF-PAI record stores the assessment data collected for rehabilitation services.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.PB_SPLIT_REF_DATE: This column stores the beginning service date of the date range used to split professional billing hospital accounts. Calculated based on the inpatient stay's admission date.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.BILLING_LENGTH_OF_STAY: This column stores the billing length of stay (LOS) for the inpatient portion of the hospital account. The billing LOS is calculated as the number of days between admission and discharge.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.INST_INJURY_UTC_DTTM: This column stores the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) instant when the injury happened. Used along with the Injury Codes in Denmark.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.TOT_INS_PMT: The total amount of insurance payments posted to this account, not including refunds.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.TOT_INS_RFND: The total amount of insurance refunds posted to this account. Includes refunds posted as either payments or adjustments.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.TOT_INS_ADJ: The total amount of insurance adjustments posted to this account, not including refunds.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.TOT_SP_PMT: The total amount of self-pay payments posted to this account, not including refunds.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.TOT_AR_INS_PMT: The total amount of active AR insurance payments posted to this account, not including refunds.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.TOT_AR_INS_RFND: The total amount of active AR insurance refunds posted to this account. Includes refunds posted as either payments or adjustments.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.TOT_AR_INS_ALLOWANCES: The total amount of active AR insurance allowance adjustments posted to this account.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.TOT_AR_SP_PMT: The total amount of active AR self-pay payments posted to this account, not including refunds.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.TOT_AR_SP_RFND: The total amount of active AR self-pay refunds posted to this account. Includes refunds posted as either payments or adjustments.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.TOT_AR_SP_ALLOWANCES: The total amount of active AR self-pay allowance adjustments posted to this account.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.HH_IS_REV_REC_YN_NAME: Indicates whether the hospital account was evaluated by Revenue Recognition based on the Revenue Recognition active dates and the admission date of the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.ESTIMATE_ID: Stores the estimate created directly from this account for advance billing. Estimates provided prior to service are only linked to encounters and are not stored here.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.QUALIFIED_CDI_REVIEW_YN: This item indicates whether the account qualified for clinical documentation improvement (CDI) review, regardless of whether a review actually occurred.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.TOT_INS_PMTS_AND_RFNDS: The total insurance payment amount posted to the account, less any refunded amount.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.TOT_SP_PMTS_AND_RFNDS: The total self-pay payment amount posted to the account, less any refunded amount.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.TOT_PMTS_AND_RFNDS: The total payment amount posted to the account, less any refunded amount.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.TOT_ADJ_EXCL_RFNDS: The total adjustment amount posted to the account, not including refund adjustments.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.ANCHOR_HSP_ACCOUNT_ID: For an encounter series of accounts, if the system automatically splits a cycle such that it has multiple accounts to span the cycle, one account is maintained to be the anchor for that cycle. The anchor account is intended to always exist for the cycle, so if the split is no longer needed, the other accounts in the cycle will be combined in to the anchor.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.ANCHOR_START_DATE: When establishing an anchor account, this is the start date that encapsulates all the accounts in the anchor group. If it's just the anchor account, then it should be that account's start date. If there are multiple accounts anchored to the same account, then it's the earlier date of the group.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.ANCHOR_END_DATE: When establishing an anchor account, this is the end date that encapsulates all the accounts in the anchor group. If it's just the anchor account, then it should be that account's end date. If there are multiple accounts anchored to the same account, then it's the latest date of the group.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.COCM_EPISODE_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the coordinated care management service episode linked to the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.MECH_VENT_HOURS: The number of hours used by the mechanical ventilator.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.SP_RESP_AFTER_INS: The balance transferred to self-pay after insurance is taken into account. This does not include any self-pay discount, financial assistance, or pre-payments.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.SP_RESP_LESS_DISCOUNT: The self-pay responsibility after any self-pay or financial assistance discounts are posted on the self-pay bucket.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.TOT_PRESERVICE_PMT: This column stores the total pre-service payments made by the guarantor for the hospital account.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.BAL_IN_FULL_SELF_PAY_YN: This column indicates whether the balances for this hospital account are entirely in self-pay. 'Y' indicates that all balances are in self-pay. 'N' or NULL indicates that there are some balances not in self-pay or the account has not been billed.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.FIRST_TX_POST_DATE: This column is the original post date for the very first transaction that filed to this hospital account, even if that transaction has been reposted, transferred, or reversed.
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.SELF_PAY_EXEMPT_RSN_C_NAME: The self-pay charge exemption reason category ID for why self-pay only charges on the hospital account should be billed to insurance.

HSP_ACCT_ADJ_LIST._TABLE_: This table contains adjustment lists for hospital accounts.
HSP_ACCT_ADJ_LIST.HSP_ACCOUNT_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.
HSP_ACCT_ADJ_LIST.LINE: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
HSP_ACCT_ADJ_LIST.ADJ_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the adjustment associated with this hospital account.

HSP_ACCT_ADMIT_DX._TABLE_: This table contains hospital account admit diagnoses from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file.
HSP_ACCT_ADMIT_DX.HSP_ACCOUNT_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.
HSP_ACCT_ADMIT_DX.LINE: This column stores the line number in the results of a query. As multiple admission diagnoses can be stored in one hospital account, each diagnosis will have a unique line number.
HSP_ACCT_ADMIT_DX.ADMIT_DX_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for admission diagnosis stored in the hospital account.
HSP_ACCT_ADMIT_DX.ADMIT_DX_TEXT: A text description of an admission diagnosis stored in the hospital account.

HSP_ACCT_ATND_PROV._TABLE_: This table contains hospital account attending provider information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file.
HSP_ACCT_ATND_PROV.HSP_ACCOUNT_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.
HSP_ACCT_ATND_PROV.LINE: This column stores the line number of the attending provider for the patient associated with the hospital account. Multiple attending providers can be stored in one hospital account, and each will have a unique line number.
HSP_ACCT_ATND_PROV.ATTENDING_PROV_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the attending provider stored in the hospital account.
HSP_ACCT_ATND_PROV.ATTEND_DATE_FROM: The date on which a provider began to be an attending provider for the patient associated with the hospital account.
HSP_ACCT_ATND_PROV.ATTEND_DATE_TO: The date on which a provider ceased to be an attending provider for the patient associated with the hospital account.

HSP_ACCT_BILL_DRG._TABLE_: This table contains billing diagnosis related group (DRG) information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file.
HSP_ACCT_BILL_DRG.HSP_ACCOUNT_ID: The hospital account ID with associated billing DRG information.
HSP_ACCT_BILL_DRG.BL_DRG_COND_CODE: This column stores the billing diagnosis-related group (DRG) condition code on the hospital account.
HSP_ACCT_BILL_DRG.BL_DRG_LOS: This column stores the billing DRG length of service in days for the hospital account.
HSP_ACCT_BILL_DRG.BL_DRG_PAT_STATUS: The patient status for the billing DRG on the hospital account.
HSP_ACCT_BILL_DRG.BL_DRG_ECCS: The ECCS (episode clinical complexity score) associated with the billing DRG.

HSP_ACCT_CHG_LIST._TABLE_: This table contains the hospital account charge list, which is the transaction list associated with the account.
HSP_ACCT_CHG_LIST.HSP_ACCOUNT_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.
HSP_ACCT_CHG_LIST.LINE: The line count for the hospital account charge list related group.
HSP_ACCT_CHG_LIST.TX_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the charge in the charge list on this hospital account.

HSP_ACCT_CLAIM_HAR._TABLE_: This table contains hospital account claims information extracted from hospital account records.
HSP_ACCT_CLAIM_HAR.ACCT_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.
HSP_ACCT_CLAIM_HAR.UB92_COVEREDDAYS: This column stores the UB92 Covered days (inpatient only): the number of days covered by the primary payer, as qualified by the payer organization.
HSP_ACCT_CLAIM_HAR.UB92_NONCOVEREDDAY: This column stores the UB92 Non Covered days (inpatient only): the number of days not covered by the primary payer, as qualified by the payer organization.
HSP_ACCT_CLAIM_HAR.UB92_COINSDAYS: This column stores the UB92 Coinsurance days: Days covered by secondary coverage in addition to primary coverage.
HSP_ACCT_CLAIM_HAR.UB92_RESERVEDAYS: UB92 Lifetime Reserve Days (INPATIENT ONLY):  Each beneficiary has a lifetime reserve of 60 additional days after using 90 days of inpatient hospital services during a spell of illness.  Lifetime reserve days are not renewable.
HSP_ACCT_CLAIM_HAR.ADMISSION_TYPE_C_NAME: The admission type category ID for the hospital account.
HSP_ACCT_CLAIM_HAR.ADMISSION_SOURCE_C_NAME: The admission source (e.g., Physician Referral, Transfer from a Hospital, Information Not Available) for the patient encounter associated with this hospital account.
HSP_ACCT_CLAIM_HAR.UB92_TOB_OVERRIDE: This column stores the Type of Bill (TOB) override: TOB is a numeric code printed on claims that provide encounter information to a payer. Values entered here will override system settings that normally determine the TOB.
HSP_ACCT_CLAIM_HAR.AUTHORIZATION_NUM: Authorization Number: Used on claims for identifying patient referrals and affected reimbursements.
HSP_ACCT_CLAIM_HAR.PARTA_EXHAUST_DT: The date on which the patient's Part A benefits are exhausted for this inpatient stay.  Part A benefits cover up to 90 inpatient days per stay (plus any lifetime reserve days the patient may opt to use after the 90th day).  After these days have been used, Part A claims will be denied.  Inpatient Part B claims may be submitted for appropriate services.
HSP_ACCT_CLAIM_HAR.PATIENT_STATUS_C_NAME: The patient status for the patient associated with this hospital account (e.g., Alive, Dead, Unknown, Discharged to Home or Self Care, Admitted as an Inpatient to this Hospital).
HSP_ACCT_CLAIM_HAR.SHAREABLE_CLAIM_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for a shareable claim associated with the hospital account.
HSP_ACCT_CLAIM_HAR.NONCVRD_SNF_STAY_YN: This item indicates whether the Skilled Nursing Facility (SNF) stay billed on this account is non-covered due to not having a prior qualifying inpatient stay.

HSP_ACCT_CL_AG_HIS._TABLE_: This table contains collection agency history information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file.
HSP_ACCT_CL_AG_HIS.HSP_ACCOUNT_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account with associated collection agency information.
HSP_ACCT_CL_AG_HIS.LINE: The line number in the results of a query. Each collection agency history will have its own line number.
HSP_ACCT_CL_AG_HIS.AGNCY_HST_DT_OF_CH: Date hospital account was either assigned to or withdrawn from the collection agency.
HSP_ACCT_CL_AG_HIS.AGNC_HST_CHG_TP_C_NAME: Change in the collection agency status.  1-Assign to agency 2-Withdraw from agency
HSP_ACCT_CL_AG_HIS.AGNCY_HST_AGNCY_ID: ID of collection agency hospital account has been assigned to.
HSP_ACCT_CL_AG_HIS.AGNCY_HST_AGNCY_ID_COLL_AGENCY_NAME: The name of the collection agency.
HSP_ACCT_CL_AG_HIS.AGN_HST_COL_ACT_C_NAME: This column stores the type of collection action done on the hospital account: 1-Send Letter, 2-Pre-Collect, 3-Bad Debt, 4-Return to Self-Pay, 5-Write Off, 6-Create Billing Note, 7-Change Notification Date, 8-Add to Queue, 10- Outsource Account, 11- Return from Outsource, 12-Change Agency, 13-Set Billing Indicator, or 14-Send SmartText Letter.
HSP_ACCT_CL_AG_HIS.AGNCY_HST_ACCT_BAL: Account balance on the hospital account that was sent to collections.
HSP_ACCT_CL_AG_HIS.AGNCY_HST_CHG_RSN_C_NAME: This column contains the reason why the account was placed or withdrawn from the agency. Refer to the AGNC_HST_CHG_TP_C to know whether this was related to an assign or withdraw.

HSP_ACCT_CVG_LIST._TABLE_: This table contains hospital account and PB visit coverage list information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file.
HSP_ACCT_CVG_LIST.HSP_ACCOUNT_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.
HSP_ACCT_CVG_LIST.LINE: This column stores the line number in the results of a query. As multiple coverages can be associated with one hospital account, each coverage will have a unique line number.
HSP_ACCT_CVG_LIST.COVERAGE_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the coverage associated with the hospital account.
HSP_ACCT_CVG_LIST.CVG_IGNR_PRIM_PAY_YN: This item stores whether the coverage was ignored for being assigned as primary payer. Typically the first coverage in the coverage list is used for primary payer, but a subsequent coverage may be assigned in some cases instead.
HSP_ACCT_CVG_LIST.CVG_IGNR_RSN_C_NAME: This item stores the reason why the coverage was ignored for primary payer. Typically the first coverage in the coverage list is used to determine primary payer, but a subsequent coverage may be assigned in some cases instead.
HSP_ACCT_CVG_LIST.CVG_TIMELY_FILING_DATE: This item stores the timely filing date for the coverage. The date is updated as the HAR changes and remains populated after the HAR is closed for reporting purposes. The date stamped is the earliest timely filing date from any active, non-closed buckets for this coverage. If no buckets are active, for primary coverages the prebilled bucket is used to calculate the expected timely filing. For secondary coverages with non active buckets, the NRP deadline is used from the previous coverage.

HSP_ACCT_DX_LIST._TABLE_: This table contains hospital account final diagnosis list information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file.
HSP_ACCT_DX_LIST.HSP_ACCOUNT_ID: The ID number of a hospital account.
HSP_ACCT_DX_LIST.LINE: The line number in the results of a query. Since multiple final ICD diagnoses can be stored in one hospital account, each diagnosis will have a unique line number. The record associated with line 1 represents the principal final coded  diagnosis.
HSP_ACCT_DX_LIST.DX_ID: The system ID number of a final diagnosis code stored in the hospital account.
HSP_ACCT_DX_LIST.DX_AFFECTS_DRG_YN: Specifies if the diagnosis affects the diagnosis-related group (DRG) associated with the hospital account.  1-yes, 2-no
HSP_ACCT_DX_LIST.DX_COMORBIDITY_YN: Specifies if the diagnosis is a non-complication/comorbidity ("N"),  complication/comorbidity ("Y"), or major complication/comorbidity ("Y").   Note that this column is extracted as an explicit "N" or "Y", where "Y" is used for both CC and MCC.  The updated column DX_COMORBIDITY_C can be used to distinguish between CC and MCC diagnoses.
HSP_ACCT_DX_LIST.FINAL_DX_SOI_C_NAME: Stores the final diagnosis severity of illness
HSP_ACCT_DX_LIST.FINAL_DX_ROM_C_NAME: Stores the final diagnosis risk of mortality
HSP_ACCT_DX_LIST.FINAL_DX_EXCLD_YN: Stores whether the final diagnosis should be excluded from clinical reporting
HSP_ACCT_DX_LIST.FNL_DX_AFCT_SOI_YN: Stores whether the diagnosis affects severity of illness.
HSP_ACCT_DX_LIST.FNL_DX_AFCT_ROM_YN: Stores whether the diagnosis affects risk of mortality.
HSP_ACCT_DX_LIST.FINAL_DX_POA_C_NAME: Specifies whether each diagnosis was present on admission.
HSP_ACCT_DX_LIST.DX_COMORBIDITY_C_NAME: Specifies if complication / comorbidity exists for each diagnosis on the hospital account.
HSP_ACCT_DX_LIST.DX_HAC_YN: Specifies if the diagnosis contributed to a Hospital Acquired Condition.
HSP_ACCT_DX_LIST.DX_COF_C_NAME: The COF (Condition Onset Flag) for the diagnosis. This item describes whether the diagnosis is onset during the episode (on) or outside of the timeframe of the episode (not).
HSP_ACCT_DX_LIST.DX_COMPLEXITY_LVL: The diagnosis complexity level - the complexity weight assigned to the diagnosis in relation to the DRG.
HSP_ACCT_DX_LIST.COMPLEX_DX_C_NAME: The complex diagnosis indicator for the diagnosis code.

HSP_ACCT_EARSTADDR._TABLE_: Table containing guarantor street address in guarantor demographics of the hospital account for what was the guarantor address at the time of discharge.
HSP_ACCT_EARSTADDR.ACCT_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.
HSP_ACCT_EARSTADDR.LINE: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
HSP_ACCT_EARSTADDR.GUAR_ADDRESS: This column stores the multiple lines of the guarantor street address at time of discharge for a hospital account.

HSP_ACCT_EXTINJ_CD._TABLE_: This table contains hospital account external injury codes information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file.
HSP_ACCT_EXTINJ_CD.HSP_ACCOUNT_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.
HSP_ACCT_EXTINJ_CD.LINE: This column stores the line number in the results of a query. Because multiple external injury codes can be stored in one hospital account, each code will have a unique line number.
HSP_ACCT_EXTINJ_CD.EXT_INJURY_DX_ID: This column stores the system identifier of a external injury code stored in the hospital account.
HSP_ACCT_EXTINJ_CD.EXT_INJURY_POA_YNU: This column specifies whether each External Cause of Injury Code diagnosis was present on admission. ** Note: this column was deprecated in the Spring 2008 release.
HSP_ACCT_EXTINJ_CD.EXT_COMORBIDITY_YN: This column specifies whether the External Cause of Injury Code diagnosis is a non-complication/comorbidity ("N"), complication/comorbidity ("Y") or major complication/comorbidity ("Y"). Note that this column is extracted as an explicit "N" or "Y", where "Y" is used for both complication or comorbidity (CC) and major complication or comorbidity (MCC). The updated column EXT_COMORBIDITY_C can be used to distinguish between CC and MCC diagnoses.
HSP_ACCT_EXTINJ_CD.EXT_DX_AFF_DRG_YN: This column specifies whether the External Cause of Injury Code diagnosis affects the diagnosis-related group (DRG) associated with the hospital account. A null value for this column indicates no.
HSP_ACCT_EXTINJ_CD.ECODE_DX_SOI_C_NAME: External Cause of Injury Code diagnosis severity of illness
HSP_ACCT_EXTINJ_CD.ECODE_DX_ROM_C_NAME: External Cause of Injury Code diagnosis risk of mortality
HSP_ACCT_EXTINJ_CD.ECODE_DX_EXCLD_YN: External Cause of Injury Code diagnosis exclude from clinical reporting
HSP_ACCT_EXTINJ_CD.ECD_DX_AFCT_SOI_YN: External Cause of Injury Code diagnosis affects severity of illness
HSP_ACCT_EXTINJ_CD.ECD_DX_AFCT_ROM_YN: External Cause of Injury Code diagnosis affects risk of mortality
HSP_ACCT_EXTINJ_CD.ECODE_DX_POA_C_NAME: This column stores whether each External Cause of Injury Code diagnosis was present on admission. This column links to category table ZC_DX_POA.
HSP_ACCT_EXTINJ_CD.EXT_COMORBIDITY_C_NAME: Specifies if complication/comorbidity exists for each External Cause of Injury Code diagnosis on the hospital account.
HSP_ACCT_EXTINJ_CD.ECD_HAC_YN: Specifies if the External Cause of Injury Code diagnosis contributed to a Hospital Acquired Condition.

HSP_ACCT_LETTERS._TABLE_: This table contains hospital billing letters information from the Notes (HNO) master file.
HSP_ACCT_LETTERS.NOTE_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the note record.
HSP_ACCT_LETTERS.LETTER_SENT_DATE: The date the letter was sent.
HSP_ACCT_LETTERS.LET_CREATE_USER_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the user who created the letter.
HSP_ACCT_LETTERS.LET_CREATE_USER_ID_NAME: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
HSP_ACCT_LETTERS.ACCOUNT_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the guarantor account that is associated with this letter. This is only populated for letters sent at the guarantor account level.
HSP_ACCT_LETTERS.HSP_ACCOUNT_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account that is associated with this letter. This is only populated for letters sent at the hospital account level.
HSP_ACCT_LETTERS.BUCKET_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the liability bucket that is associated with this letter. This is only populated for letters sent at the liability bucket level.

HSP_ACCT_OCUR_HAR._TABLE_: This table contains the Occurrence Codes and Occurrence Dates for a Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) record.
HSP_ACCT_OCUR_HAR.ACCT_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.
HSP_ACCT_OCUR_HAR.LINE: This column stores the line number in the results of a query. Because multiple occurrence codes can be stored in one hospital account, each code will have a unique line number.
HSP_ACCT_OCUR_HAR.OCCURRENCE_CODE_C_NAME: An occurrence code stored in the hospital account.
HSP_ACCT_OCUR_HAR.OCCURRENCE_DATE: The date associated with an occurrence code stored in the hospital account.

HSP_ACCT_OTHR_PROV._TABLE_: This table contains hospital account other providers information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file.
HSP_ACCT_OTHR_PROV.HSP_ACCOUNT_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.
HSP_ACCT_OTHR_PROV.LINE: This column stores the line number in the results of a query. As multiple "other providers" can be stored in one hospital account, each provider will have a unique line number.
HSP_ACCT_OTHR_PROV.OTHER_PROV_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for an "other provider" stored in the hospital account. The hospital account can store an attending, admitting, and referring provider, plus any number of other providers. For each other provider, the user can specify a role the provider played in treatment.
HSP_ACCT_OTHR_PROV.OTH_PRV_ROLE_C_NAME: This column stores the role associated with an "other provider" stored in the hospital account.

HSP_ACCT_PRORATION._TABLE_: This table contains the Proration related information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file.
HSP_ACCT_PRORATION.HSP_ACCOUNT_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.
HSP_ACCT_PRORATION.LINE: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
HSP_ACCT_PRORATION.COVERAGE_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the coverage record on the hospital account.
HSP_ACCT_PRORATION.EXP_COINS_PC: This column stores the expected coinsurance percentage.
HSP_ACCT_PRORATION.EXP_COINS_AMT: This column stores the expected coinsurance amount.
HSP_ACCT_PRORATION.EXP_DED_AMT: This column stores the expected deductible amount.
HSP_ACCT_PRORATION.SYS_EXP_COPAY_AMT: This column stores the copay amount expected by the system.

HSP_ACCT_PYMT_LIST._TABLE_: This table contains payment lists for hospital accounts.
HSP_ACCT_PYMT_LIST.HSP_ACCOUNT_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.
HSP_ACCT_PYMT_LIST.LINE: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
HSP_ACCT_PYMT_LIST.PMT_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the payment that is associated with this hospital account.

HSP_ACCT_SBO._TABLE_: This table contains the single billing office (SBO) balances on the hospital account (HAR). The information is only populated in Enterprise SBO mode. SBO balances are the combined Hospital Billing and Professional Billing transaction balances on each HAR.
HSP_ACCT_SBO.HSP_ACCOUNT_ID: The hospital account ID with associated single billing office information.
HSP_ACCT_SBO.SBO_TOT_BALANCE: Contains the combined total balance of Hospital Billing (HB)�and Professional Billing (PB) transactions on the hospital account, including charges, payments and adjustments in all statuses (single billing office (SBO)�mode only).
HSP_ACCT_SBO.SBO_TOTAL_CHARGES: Combined Hospital Billing (HB)�and Professional Billing (PB) charges on the hospital account in all statuses (single billing office (SBO)�mode only).
HSP_ACCT_SBO.SBO_TOTAL_PAYMENTS: Combined Hospital Billing (HB)�and Professional Billing (PB) payments on the hospital account in all statuses (single billing office (SBO)�mode only).
