HSP_ACCT_SBO.SBO_TOTAL_ADJ: Contains combined Hospital Billing (HB)�and Professional Billing (PB) adjustments on the hospital account in all statuses (single billing office (SBO)�mode only).
HSP_ACCT_SBO.SBO_PREBILL_BALANC: Contains combined Hospital Billing (HB)�and Professional Billing (PB) prebilled balances including charges, payments and adjustments (single billing office (SBO)�mode only).
HSP_ACCT_SBO.SBO_INS_BALANCE: Contains combined Hospital Billing (HB)�and Professional Billing (PB) insurance balances including charges, payments and adjustments (single billing office (SBO)�mode only).
HSP_ACCT_SBO.SBO_UND_BALANCE: Contains combined Hospital Billing (HB)�and Professional Billing (PB) undistributed balances. (single billing office (SBO)�mode only).
HSP_ACCT_SBO.SBO_SP_BAL: Contains combined Hospital Billing (HB)�and Professional Billing (PB) self pay balances including charges, payments and adjustments (single billing office (SBO)�mode only).
HSP_ACCT_SBO.SBO_BAD_DEBT_BAL: Contains combined Hospital Billing (HB)�and Professional Billing (PB)�bad debt balances including charges, payments and adjustments (single billing office mode only).

HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1._TABLE_: This table contains claim print record information for claims associated with a given hospital account or liability bucket.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.CLAIM_PRINT_ID: Stores the claim record ID associated with a single hospital account.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.MAIL_NAME: The mailing name for this claim.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.MAIL_CITY_STATE_ZIP: The mailing city, state, and ZIP code for this claim.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.MAIL_PHONE: The mailing phone number for this claim.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.SRC_OF_ADDR_C_NAME: The source of the mailing address for this claim.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.LINE_SOURCE_CLP_ID: The source claim record for resubmit and demand claims.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.PARTIAL_CLAIM_YN: Indicates whether the claim is a partial resubmit.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.ORIG_HAR_RES_ACT_ID: Stores the original hospital account when research charges have been added to the account.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.DRG_ID: Diagnosis related group for this claim.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.DRG_ID_DRG_NAME: The name of the Diagnoses Related Group name.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.CLAIM_BILLED_AMOUNT: Billed amount determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.CLM_CONTRACTUAL: Contractual amount determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.CLM_EXPECTED_PRICE: Expected amount determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.CLAIM_PMT_METHOD_C_NAME: Payment method determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.CLAIM_PRIM_PMT_RATE: Primary payment rate determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.CLM_PRIMARY_CVD_QTY: Quantity covered by primary method. Determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.CLM_ADDL_PMT_MTHDS: Additional payment methods. Determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.CLM_ADDL_PMT_RATES: Additional payment rates. Determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.CLM_ADDL_CVD_QTY: Additional payment quantity. Determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.CLM_LINE_PNLTY_PER: Line/Service level penalties imposed on the claim. Determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.CLAIM_LATE_DAYS: Late submission days. Determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.CLM_SUB_PNLTY_PER: Late submission penalty percent applied. Determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.CLM_U_AND_C_AMT: Usual and customary amount for the claim. Determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.CLAIM_INS_PORTION: Insurance portion of the expected amount. Determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.CLM_PATIENT_PORTION: Portion of the expected amount the patient is responsible for. Determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.CLAIM_MTHD_DESC: A text description of the method used to price the claim.  Determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.CLAIM_TERM_DESC: This item stores the term description from the matching contract line.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.OPERATING_PROV_ID: Stores the operating provider to go onto the uniform billing claim.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.CONTRACT_ID: The unique ID of the contract that was used for this claim. Zero means that the contract is from an external system.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.CONTRACT_ID_CONTRACT_NAME: The name of the Vendor-Network contract.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.CONTRACT_DATE_REAL: A numerical representation of the contact date for the contract used in this claim. Used to help link to the VEN_NET_CONT_SVC table.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.CONTRACT_USED_DT: The date that the contract was used for this claim.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.CONTRACT_NOT_USED: Indicates whether the contract was used for this claim. Y indicates that the contract was not used.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.EDITED_TOB: Indicates the claim type of bill was edited.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.EDITED_EOB: Indicates the claim explanation of benefits was edited.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.MAIL_ADDR1: First line of the mailing address for a given claim record.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.MAIL_ADDR2: Second line of the mailing address for a given claim record.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.REIMB_COST_THRESH: The cost threshold of this claim's outlier data. Determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.REIMB_COST_OUT: The cost outlier of this claim's outlier data. Determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.REIMB_DAY_THRESH: The day threshold of this claim's outlier data. Determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.REIMB_DAY_OUT: The day outlier of this claim's outlier data. Determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.REIMB_OTH_THRESH: The other threshold of this claim's outlier data. Determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.REIMB_OTH_OUT: The other outlier of this claim's outlier data. Determined from reimbursement information for Diagnosis Related Group priced claims.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL1.EXPECT_PAT_RESP_AMT: Stores the total expected patient responsibility for the claim.

HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2._TABLE_: This table contains detailed claim print record information for claims associated with the hospital liability bucket.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.CLAIM_PRINT_ID: The ID of the claim record associated with a single hospital liability bucket.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.SA_ID: This column holds the service area for the claim.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.INACTV_CLP_YN: This column has a value of yes when the claim is inactive.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.CLAIM_ACCEPT_DTTM: This column holds the instant the claim was accepted.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.SG_PAYOR_ID: The payer ID for this claim.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.SG_PLAN_ID: The plan ID for this claim.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.SG_CVG_ID: The coverage ID for this claim.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.INVOICE_NUM: The invoice number for this claim.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.SG_PAT_ID: The patient ID for this claim.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.SG_GR_ACCT_ID: The guarantor account ID for this claim.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.HOSPITAL_ACCT_ID: The hospital account ID for this claim.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.HLB_ID: The liability bucket ID for this claim.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.SG_PROV_ID: The billing provider ID for this claim.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.SG_REF_SRC_ID: The referring source ID for this claim.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.SG_REF_SRC_ID_REFERRING_PROV_NAM: The name of the referral source.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.SG_DEP_ID: The department ID for this claim.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.SG_POS_ID: The place of service ID for this claim.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.SG_CLM_ID: The claim information ID used by this claim.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.SG_RQG_ID: The requisition grouper ID for this claim.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.CLAIM_CLASS_C_NAME: The account class used to evaluate this claim.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.CLAIM_BASE_CLASS_C_NAME: The base account class used to evaluate this claim.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.MIN_SERVICE_DT: The minimum service date for this claim.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.MAX_SERVICE_DT: The maximum service date for this claim.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.UB_FROM_DT: The uniform billing claim from date.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.UB_THROUGH_DT: The uniform billing claim through date.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.CLAIM_FRM_TYPE_C_NAME: The form type. This is either paper or electronic.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.CNCL_CLAIM: Indicates whether this is a cancel claim.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.REPL_CLAIM: Indicates whether this is a replacement claim.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.CNCL_CLAIM_CODE: The value code associated with this claim if it is a cancel claim.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.REPL_CLAIM_CODE: The value code associated with this claim if it is a replacement claim.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.SG_ALTPYR_CLM_YN: Flag used to indicate that claim is for alternate payer.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.FILING_ORDER_C_NAME: This column holds the filing order position of the claim coverage at the time claims were processed.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.CLM_EXT_VAL_ID: The ID of the claim record.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.SG_TREAT_PLAN_ID: The unique ID of the treatment plan that is associated with the claim.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.UB_COMB_CLM_TYP_C_NAME: If this column is set to 1, the claim is a combined claim.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.REND_PROV_ID: This column holds the claim level rendering provider.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.RESEARCH_ID: This column holds the research study for the claim.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.SRC_INV_NUM: In PB, this column holds the original invoice number during refresh and resubmit. In HB, this column holds the invoice number associated with the primary claim in a crossover scenario.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.CLAIM_TAX_AMOUNT: Gross tax amount at a claim level, this is the sum of all the tax amounts sent on a claim.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.DRG_XR_AMOUNT: The Diagnosis Related Group expected reimbursement amount. This will be stored for accounts billed with Diagnosis Related Group that need tax calculated specifically for the Diagnosis Related Group without any outliers or add-ons, as compared to the total expected reimbursement on the claim.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.DRG_TAX_AMOUNT: The Diagnosis Related Group tax amount. This will be stored for accounts billed with Diagnosis Related Group that have tax calculated based on expected reimbursement values.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.CLAIM_APEC_OUTLIER: This item stores the Adjudicated Payment per Episode of Care Outlier amount for a claim.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.SNF_CLAIM_TYPE_C_NAME: This item identifies the type of Skilled Nursing Facility claim produced.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.DEPT_TYPE_C_NAME: The type of department. For Norway claims, this identifies the department as a GP Office, Trust, or Municipality.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.CLM_REBILL_REASON_C_NAME: This column stores the reason why we sent the claim again to payer. It holds onto the rebill reason with the highest precedence from the category list.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.CLM_REBILL_USER_ID: This column stores the user who resubmitted the claim.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.CLM_REBILL_USER_ID_NAME: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.FAC_ACTOR_TYPE_C_NAME: This item stores the type of facility. For Norway claims, this identifies the facility as a GP Office, Trust, or Municipality.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.BENEFIT_RECORD_ID: Stores the ID of the benefit (BEN) record used to calculate the patient responsibility.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.PREDICTED_PAY_DATE: The predicted payment response date for a claim based on historical trends for the payer.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.SUGGESTED_FOL_UP_DATE: The suggested initial follow-up date for a claim based on historical trends for the payer.
HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2.CLM_CLOSED_TIMELY_YN: Denotes if the claim closed prior to its Suggested Initial Follow-up Date, whereby it was no longer outstanding to insurance.

HSP_CLAIM_PRINT._TABLE_: This table contains claim print record information for claims associated with a given hospital account or liability bucket.
HSP_CLAIM_PRINT.CLAIM_PRINT_ID: Stores the claim record ID associated with a single hospital account or liability bucket.
HSP_CLAIM_PRINT.CONTACT_DATE_REAL: The contact date for the creation of the record in internal format. (There is only one contact date per CLP record.)
HSP_CLAIM_PRINT.HSP_ACCOUNT_ID: The ID of the hospital account with which this claim record is associated.
HSP_CLAIM_PRINT.CM_PHY_OWN_ID: ID of the physical deployment owner for this record. Physical owners will be where the data is hosted, either on the cross-over server or the owner deployment.

HSP_CLP_CMS_LINE._TABLE_: This table contains claim line information for claims associated with the hospital account/liability bucket. For uniform medical billing (UB) claims, this table contains pre-processing charge information, which is used in the creation of UB claim lines. Post-processing claim line data for UB claims is stored in the HSP_CLP_REV_CODE table. For CMS claims, this table contains the post-processing claim line data.
HSP_CLP_CMS_LINE.CLAIM_PRINT_ID: The ID of the claim record associated with a single hospital account or liability bucket.
HSP_CLP_CMS_LINE.LINE: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.
HSP_CLP_CMS_LINE.REIMB_AMT: Stores the reimbursement amount for claim line.
HSP_CLP_CMS_LINE.FROM_SERV_DT: Stores the from date for a claim line. For services that do not span multiple days, the service date will be held here.
HSP_CLP_CMS_LINE.TO_SERV_DT: Stores the through date for a claim line.
HSP_CLP_CMS_LINE.POS_TYPE_PER_TX: Stores the place of service type per transaction.
HSP_CLP_CMS_LINE.TOS_C_NAME: Stores the type of service for the claim line.
HSP_CLP_CMS_LINE.HCPCS_CODES: Stores the Healthcare Common Procedure Coding System code for the claim line.
HSP_CLP_CMS_LINE.PROF_CLM_MODIFIERS: Stores modifiers on the claim line.
HSP_CLP_CMS_LINE.DX_MAP: Comma-delimited list of diagnosis pointers for the claim line.
HSP_CLP_CMS_LINE.QUANTITY: Stores the quantity associated with the claim line.
HSP_CLP_CMS_LINE.OVRD_REV_CODE_ID_REVENUE_CODE_NAME: The name of the revenue code.
HSP_CLP_CMS_LINE.CHARGE_AMT: Stores the charge amount for the claim line.
HSP_CLP_CMS_LINE.INS_DUE_AMT: Stores the insurance amount due for the claim line.
HSP_CLP_CMS_LINE.PAT_DUE_AMT: Stores the patient amount due for the claim line.
HSP_CLP_CMS_LINE.NON_CVD_AMT: Stores the non-covered amount for the claim line.
HSP_CLP_CMS_LINE.PAYMENT_AMT: Stores the payment amount for the claim line.
HSP_CLP_CMS_LINE.INSURANCE_PAID_AMT: Stores the insurance amount paid for the claim line.
HSP_CLP_CMS_LINE.PAT_PAID_AMT: Stores the patient amount paid for the claim line.
HSP_CLP_CMS_LINE.ADJUSTMENT_AMT: Stores the adjustment amount for the claim line.
HSP_CLP_CMS_LINE.PRINT_DESCRIPTIO_YN: This controls procedure description printing for professional claims.
HSP_CLP_CMS_LINE.DEPT_ID: Department of service for the line.
HSP_CLP_CMS_LINE.CMS_CODE_TYPE_C_NAME: Stores the code type for the transaction level Healthcare Common Procedure Coding System code override. If a procedure has been assigned to the line without setting the override, this column will be left blank.
HSP_CLP_CMS_LINE.CMS_REND_PROV_ID: This item holds the line level rendering provider for American National Standards Institute claims. Professional claims will use this value to print the claim and line rendering provider loops.
HSP_CLP_CMS_LINE.CMS_MOLDX_TEST_CODE: Holds the auxiliary procedure code for a CMS line.
HSP_CLP_CMS_LINE.CMS_AUXPX_CD_TYPE_C_NAME: Holds the type of auxiliary procedure code when one is applicable to a CMS line.
HSP_CLP_CMS_LINE.CMS_PRIOR_AUTH: Stores the prior-authorization number for a service line.
HSP_CLP_CMS_LINE.CMS_REF_NUM: Stores the referral number for a service line.
HSP_CLP_CMS_LINE.CMS_LINKED_AUTH_ID: Stores the professional billing charge level linked authorization ID.
HSP_CLP_CMS_LINE.CMS_MEDICARE_PAID_AMT: For eMedNY 150003 claims, this is the amount that Medicare paid for this service line. This appears in field 24K (SVC_LN_INFO_2.LN_MCR_PAID_AMT). The EMEDNY_MEDICARE_PLANS profile variable can be used to control which coverages count as Medicare coverages.
HSP_CLP_CMS_LINE.INVOICE_GRP_LN: The group line number on the invoice record that corresponds to the data in INVOICE_CLM_LN.

HSP_CLP_CMS_TX_PIECES._TABLE_: This table contains the hospital transactions that were used in the creation of CMS claim lines in Hospital Billing.
HSP_CLP_CMS_TX_PIECES.CLAIM_PRINT_ID: The unique identifier for the claim record.
HSP_CLP_CMS_TX_PIECES.LINE: The line number of the claim line in the claim record.
HSP_CLP_CMS_TX_PIECES.TX_PIECE: The index of the transaction for the claim line.
HSP_CLP_CMS_TX_PIECES.TX_ID: ID of the hospital transaction used in the creation of this claim line.

HSP_CLP_DIAGNOSIS._TABLE_: This table contains diagnosis related information for claim print records associated with the hospital account/liability bucket.
HSP_CLP_DIAGNOSIS.CLAIM_PRINT_ID: The unique identifier for the claim record.
HSP_CLP_DIAGNOSIS.LINE: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.
HSP_CLP_DIAGNOSIS.DX_ID: The diagnoses to print on both institutional and professional claim forms.
HSP_CLP_DIAGNOSIS.DX_POA_C_NAME: Diagnosis present on admission indicator. Will only print on institutional claim forms.

HSP_CLP_REV_CODE._TABLE_: This table contains the revenue code list for the claim print records associated with the hospital account/liability bucket.
HSP_CLP_REV_CODE.CLAIM_PRINT_ID: The unique identifier for the claim record associated with a single hospital account or liability bucket.
HSP_CLP_REV_CODE.CONTACT_DATE_REAL: The contact date for the creation of the record in internal format. (There is only one contact date per claim print record.)
HSP_CLP_REV_CODE.LINE: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
HSP_CLP_REV_CODE.UB_MIN_SERVICE: The minimum service date for the claim print record.
HSP_CLP_REV_CODE.UB_MAX_SERVICE: The maximum service date for the claim print record.
HSP_CLP_REV_CODE.UB_CHARGES: The uniform billing charges on the claim
HSP_CLP_REV_CODE.UB_MODIFIER: The modifier for the claim print record.
HSP_CLP_REV_CODE.UB_CPT_CODE: The uniform billing current procedural terminology code on the claim print record.
HSP_CLP_REV_CODE.HSP_ACCOUNT_ID: The unique ID of the hospital account associated with this claim print record.
HSP_CLP_REV_CODE.CM_PHY_OWN_ID: ID of the physical deployment owner for this record. Physical owners will be where the data is hosted, either on the cross-over server or the owner deployment.
HSP_CLP_REV_CODE.REV_CODE_EXT: The external uniform billing revenue code.
HSP_CLP_REV_CODE.UB_REV_CD_DESC: The description of the uniform billing line.
HSP_CLP_REV_CODE.UB_HIPPS_CD: The uniform billing line health insurance prospective payment system code.
HSP_CLP_REV_CODE.UB_NON_CVD_AMT: The non-covered amount for the uniform billing line.
HSP_CLP_REV_CODE.UB_LMRP_CD: The uniform billing local coverage determination code.
HSP_CLP_REV_CODE.UB_HCPCS_RATE: The uniform billing healthcare common procedure coding system code and modifier or rate.
HSP_CLP_REV_CODE.UB_CODE_TYPE_C_NAME: The code type for the uniform billing claim line. If there is no code type this field will be blank.
HSP_CLP_REV_CODE.UB_PRIOR_AUTH: The prior authorization number for the uniform billing line.
HSP_CLP_REV_CODE.UB_RFL_NUM: The uniform billing line referral number.
HSP_CLP_REV_CODE.UB_REND_PROV_ID: The line level rendering provider for an American National Standards Institute institutional claim. This will only be populated for a combined claim.
HSP_CLP_REV_CODE.UB_LINE_SRC_C_NAME: The category of the line source for the uniform billing line.
HSP_CLP_REV_CODE.UB_REIMB_AMT: The reimbursement amount for the uniform billing line.
HSP_CLP_REV_CODE.UB_REIMB_CNTRCT_AMT: The reimbursement contract amount for the uniform billing line.
HSP_CLP_REV_CODE.UB_SVC_DATE: The service date of the uniform billing service line.
HSP_CLP_REV_CODE.UB_MOLDX_TEST_CODE: The auxiliary procedure code for a uniform billing line.
HSP_CLP_REV_CODE.UB_AUXPX_CD_TYPE_C_NAME: The type of auxiliary procedure code when one is applicable to a uniform billing line.
HSP_CLP_REV_CODE.UB_AUTH_ID: Stores the hospital billing charge level linked authorization ID.
HSP_CLP_REV_CODE.UB_REF_PROV_ID: The ID of the line level referring provider. It is only populated under special circumstances.

HSP_CLP_UB_TX_PIECES._TABLE_: This table contains the hospital transactions that were used in the creation of UB claim lines in Hospital Billing.
HSP_CLP_UB_TX_PIECES.CLAIM_PRINT_ID: The unique identifier for the claim print record.
HSP_CLP_UB_TX_PIECES.LINE: The line number of the claim line in the claim print record.
HSP_CLP_UB_TX_PIECES.TX_PIECE: The hospital transaction IDs used for the claim line.
HSP_CLP_UB_TX_PIECES.TX_ID: ID of the hospital transaction used in the creation of this claim line.
HSP_CLP_UB_TX_PIECES.CLAIM_LINE_NUM: The ordinal position of the claim line. This can be different than the line number in the claim print record for claim print records that include summary lines.

HSP_PMT_LINE_REMIT._TABLE_: This is a type of summary level of the remittance actions associated with a payment transaction. This table will summarize remittance information from Electronic Remittance and manual payment posting as stored on the transaction. This table is meant to hold a high level summary of line-level reason code information. Data will not be populated if a payment was posted at the invoice-level.
HSP_PMT_LINE_REMIT.TX_ID: The unique identifier for the transaction record.
HSP_PMT_LINE_REMIT.LINE: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
HSP_PMT_LINE_REMIT.LINE_SVCLINE: Stores the service line number for line level payments.
HSP_PMT_LINE_REMIT.LINE_GRP_CODE_C_NAME: Stores the group code corresponding to the reason code at the line level.
HSP_PMT_LINE_REMIT.LINE_REMIT_CODE_ID: Stores the reason code or remark code from the service line.
HSP_PMT_LINE_REMIT.LINE_REMIT_CODE_ID_REMIT_CODE_NAME: The name of each remittance code.
HSP_PMT_LINE_REMIT.LINE_RSN_CODE_EXTL: Stores the external claim level reason code or remark code from the service line.
HSP_PMT_LINE_REMIT.LINE_RMT_AMT: Stores the amount associated with the reason code at the line level.
HSP_PMT_LINE_REMIT.LINE_RMK_CODES: Stores information about the remark codes that are associated with specific reason codes at the line level. This is a comma delimited list of remark codes. The system will associate all remark codes present at any particular service line to every reason code on the same line.

HSP_PMT_REMIT_DETAIL._TABLE_: This is a type of summary level of the remittance actions associated with a payment transaction. This table will summarize remittance information from Electronic Remittance and manual payment posting as stored on the transaction. This table extracts the information that displays in the remittance grid in payment posting as the end user sees it.
HSP_PMT_REMIT_DETAIL.TX_ID: The unique identifier for the transaction record.
HSP_PMT_REMIT_DETAIL.LINE: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
HSP_PMT_REMIT_DETAIL.DTL_GRP_CODE_C_NAME: This column stores the group code for the reason code that is entered in the remittance grid when this batch is opened in payment posting.
HSP_PMT_REMIT_DETAIL.DTL_REMIT_CODE_ID: This column stores the remit code that is entered in the remittance grid when this batch is opened in payment posting.
HSP_PMT_REMIT_DETAIL.DTL_REMIT_CODE_ID_REMIT_CODE_NAME: The name of each remittance code.
HSP_PMT_REMIT_DETAIL.DTL_RSN_CODE_EXTL: This column stores the external reason code that is entered in the remittance grid when this batch is opened in payment posting.
HSP_PMT_REMIT_DETAIL.DTL_REMIT_AMT: This column stores the amount associated with the reason code that is entered in the remittance grid when this batch is opened in payment posting.
HSP_PMT_REMIT_DETAIL.DTL_ACTION_STRING: This column stores the actions associated with the reason code that is entered in the remittance grid when this batch is opened in payment posting. This is a comma delimited string of actions for reason codes with multiple actions associated with them.
HSP_PMT_REMIT_DETAIL.DTL_CREATE_BDC_YN: This column stores whether a denial or remark record should be created with the reason code. If any action on the reason code creates a denial or remark, this column will be set to Yes, otherwise this column will be set to No.
HSP_PMT_REMIT_DETAIL.DTL_SERVICE_LINE: This column stores the service line this reason code was entered in on the remittance grid when this batch was opened in payment posting. If any reason code was entered at the claim level this row will be set to -1.
HSP_PMT_REMIT_DETAIL.DTL_DFLTCD_MAPCOL_C_NAME: This column contains the mapped column of the defaulted remit code.

HSP_TRANSACTIONS._TABLE_: This table contains hospital account transaction detail from the Hospital Permanent Transactions (HTR) master file.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.TX_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital billing transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.HSP_ACCOUNT_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account associated with the hospital billing transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.ACCT_CLASS_HA_C_NAME: Holds the account class of the account when the transaction filed. This is set for all transaction types.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.ACTION_STRING: A comma-delimited list of one or more numbers stored in a payment transaction that correspond to actions entered in payment posting. Actions are 1 -- Not Allowed Adjustment, 2 -- Next Responsible Party, 3 -- Claim Denied.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.ALLOWED_AMOUNT: An allowed amount stored in a payment transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.BILLED_AMOUNT: A billed amount stored in a payment transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.BILLING_PROV_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the billing provider stored in the hospital billing transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.BUCKET_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the liability bucket on which the transaction is currently active. This field is only populated for payment and adjustment transactions, not charges.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.COINSURANCE_AMOUNT: A coinsurance amount stored in a payment transaction. Coinsurance amounts are informational only.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.COPAY_AMOUNT: A copay amount stored in a payment transaction. Coinsurance amounts are informational only.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.DEDUCTIBLE_AMOUNT: A deductible amount stored in a payment transaction. Coinsurance amounts are informational only.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.DEPARTMENT: This column stores the unique identifier for the department associated with the hospital billing transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.DFLT_FEE_SCHED_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the default fee schedule for the service area with which a charge transaction is associated.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.DFLT_FEE_SCHED_ID_FEE_SCHEDULE_NAME: The name of each fee schedule.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.DFLT_PROC_DESC: This column stores the original description of the procedure stored in the procedure record's Name History (I EAP 6), which appears in Procedure Editor as Name. This item is only populated if the description for the procedure was overridden in charge entry.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.DFLT_UB_REV_CD_ID: The default revenue code from the procedure master file for a charge transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.DFLT_UB_REV_CD_ID_REVENUE_CODE_NAME: The name of the revenue code.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.FACILITY_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the facility associated with the hospital billing transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.FIN_CLASS_C_NAME: This column stores the category ID of the financial class stored in a hospital billing transaction. For charges, the financial class comes from the hospital account that the charge is associated with. For payments, the financial class comes from the payer specified during payment posting. If no payer is specified during payment posting, the financial class is self-pay. If the adjustment is entered in adjustment posting, the financial class is from the payer specified in adjustment posting. If the adjustment is created from a bucket action, the financial class comes from the financial class on the bucket. If no payer is specified during adjustment posting or the adjustment bucket action is made on an undistributed bucket, the financial class is self-pay. Adjustment refund bucket actions can specify the payer, in which case the specified payer's financial class is used.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.INST_BILL_COMMENT: A comment stored in a charge transaction. If a hospital account's guarantor is of a type that is considered institutional, then certain pieces of institutional billing-related information can be stored in charges filed on that hospital account.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.INST_BILL_DOB: A date of birth stored in a charge transaction. If a hospital account's guarantor is of a type that is considered institutional, then certain pieces of institutional billing-related information can be stored in charges filed on that hospital account. A date of birth is one such piece of information.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.INST_BILL_EMP_NUM: An employee number stored in a charge transaction. If a hospital account's guarantor is of a type that is considered institutional, then certain pieces of institutional billing-related information can be stored in charges filed on that hospital account. An employee number is one such piece of information.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.INST_BILL_PAT_NAME: A patient name stored in a charge transaction. If a hospital account's guarantor is of a type that is considered institutional, then certain pieces of institutional billing-related information can be stored in charges filed on that hospital account. A patient name is one such piece of information.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.INST_BILL_SEX_C_NAME: A patient sex stored in a charge transaction. If a hospital account's guarantor is of a type that is considered institutional, then certain pieces of institutional billing-related information can be stored in charges filed on that hospital account. A patient sex is one such piece of information.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.INT_CONTROL_NUMBER: The internal control number stored in a payment transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.IS_SYSTEM_ADJ_YN: Denotes whether an adjustment was the result of moving balances between liability buckets or between collection statuses.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.IS_HOSPITALIST_YN: Denotes whether a charge has a billing provider who is designated in ADT as a hospitalist.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.IS_LATE_CHARGE_YN: Denotes whether a charge is a late charge.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.IS_RECOUPMENT_YN: Denotes whether a payment is a recoupment.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.MODIFIERS: A comma-delimited list of one or more modifiers associated with a charge transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.OLD_HSP_ACCOUNT_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account associated with the old hospital billing transaction that was transferred to a different hospital account, causing this new transaction to be created.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.ORDER_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the clinical system order that triggered a hospital billing transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.ORIG_PRICE: Denotes the price that was determined for a charge based on fee schedules.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.ORIG_REPOST_TX_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the original transaction of a hospital billing transaction automatically reposted due to a change in financial class, account class, or primary payer.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.ORIG_REV_TX_ID: In a reversal transaction, this column denotes the ID number of the original transaction that was reversed.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.PAT_ENC_CSN_ID: For a charge dropped via ADT's bed charge billing function or a payment collected at the point-of-service, the contact serial number of the patient contact that triggered the bed charge or led to the collection of the payment.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.PAYMENT_FROM: For self pay payments, a text string indicating from whom the payment was received.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.PAYMENT_SRC_HA_C_NAME: The payment source stored in a payment transaction, i.e. cash, check, or credit card.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.PAYOR_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the payer associated with each payment or adjustment. This is not populated for charge transactions or when the payment or adjustment is posted to the self-pay bucket. Payments are assigned to the payer specified in payment posting. Adjustments made using adjustment posting are assigned to the payer specified in adjustment posting. Adjustments made using bucket actions are assigned to the payer on the liability bucket to which the adjustment was posted. Refund bucket actions can override the bucket payer with a user entered payer. Users can override any adjustment's payer in adjustment workqueues. Adjustments posted to the undistributed bucket have no payer unless overridden.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.PERFORMING_PROV_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the performing provider associated with a charge transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.PREV_CREDITS_ACT: For adjustment transactions that move liability from one bucket to another, the total monetary amount of previous credits on the former bucket.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.PRIM_FEE_SCHED_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the primary fee schedule used to price a charge transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.PRIM_FEE_SCHED_ID_FEE_SCHEDULE_NAME: The name of each fee schedule.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.PROCEDURE_DESC: This column stores the value manually entered for the procedure description at the time of charge entry. If no value was manually entered, then the procedure record's Name History (I EAP 6) is populated here.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.PROC_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the procedure associated with the hospital billing transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.REFERENCE_NUM: The payment posting reference number associated with a transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.UB_REV_CODE_ID: The revenue code associated with a charge transaction. This could come from the procedure master file or from a user-entered override.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.UB_REV_CODE_ID_REVENUE_CODE_NAME: The name of the revenue code.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.REVENUE_LOC_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the revenue location stored in the hospital billing transaction. It is only set when hospital account identifiers are assigned by location instead of service area.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.SERV_AREA_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the service area associated with the hospital billing transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.SERVICE_DATE: The service date of a charge, the deposit date of a payment, or the creation date of an adjustment.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.START_DATE_TIME: For charge transactions that result from timed procedures, the start date and time stored in the transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.STOP_DATE_TIME: For charge transactions that result from timed procedures, the end date and time stored in the transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.TEMP_TX_ID: The ID number of the temporary transaction (HTT record) associated with the transaction in question.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.TOTAL_CHARGES_ACT: For adjustment transactions that move liability from one bucket to another, the total monetary amount of charges on the latter bucket.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.TX_AMOUNT: The monetary amount of a transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.TX_COMMENT: A comment associated with a transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.TX_FILED_TIME: The date and time when a transaction was filed on a hospital account.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.TX_NUM_IN_HOSPACCT: A number denoting in what order the transaction filed on the hospital account. For example, if the transaction in question was the third transaction to file on the account, this column would contain the number 3.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.TX_POST_DATE: The date on which the transaction was posted.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.TX_SOURCE_HA_C_NAME: The source of the transaction, i.e. unit charge entry, payment posting, electronic remittance,
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.TX_TYPE_HA_C_NAME: The transaction type, i.e. charge, payment, debit adjustment, or credit adjustment.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.TYPE_OF_SVC_HA_C_NAME: The type of service associated with a transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.USER_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the user who posted the hospital billing transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.USER_ID_NAME: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.XFER_LIAB_ADJ_YN: Y/N flag denoting if the transaction transfers the liability adjustment.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.CHG_CRED_ORIG_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the transaction of a late charge credit.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.LATE_CRCTN_ORIG_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the original charge for a late charge correction transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.ALLOWANCE_ADJ_YN: Y/N flag indicating if there is an allowance adjustment.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.PLACE_OF_SVC_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the place of service associated with the hospital billing transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.NON_COVERED_YN: Indicates whether the transaction is expected to be a non-covered charge.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.BEN_BKT_CVG_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the benefit bucket associated with the hospital billing transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.BEN_BKT_INC_STR: The increment string for the benefit bucket associated with the transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.QUICK_PMT_TYPE_C_NAME: The quick payment type category ID for the transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.NON_COVERED_AMT: The non-covered amount associated with the transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.IS_REFUND_ADJ_YN: Denotes whether this is a Refund Adjustment.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.INVOICE_NUM: The invoice number for the transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.COLLECTION_AGENCY: This column stores the unique identifier for the collection agency that the hospital billing transaction has been sent to for collections.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.COLLECTION_AGENCY_COLL_AGENCY_NAME: The name of the collection agency.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.PRIMARY_PLAN_ID: Holds the primary plan of the account when the transaction filed. This is set for all transaction types.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.HCPCS_CODE: The override CPT� or HCPCS code either entered manually during charge entry or coming from the clinical application.  Often, pharmacy and supply charges will have a code sent from the clinical system to override the code stored on the procedure. When reporting, you will often want to display this column if it is populated, otherwise display CPT_CODE.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.NDC_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the historical National Drug Code for the corresponding charge. This column will only be set for certain charges posted prior to being on the Epic Summer 2009 release. For current NDC code information, use NDC_CODE_RG_ID column in the HSP_TX_NDC_CODES table.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.NDC_ID_NDC_CODE: The external code for the National Drug Code (NDC). An NDC represents packages of medications.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.HIPPS_CODE_TYPE_C_NAME: HIPPS Code type for this transaction. i.e. 1-Skilled Nursing Facility 2-Home Health PPS 99-other
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.HIPPS_CODE_DESC: HIPPS Code description for this transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.RFND_SND_TO_C_NAME: This column specifies where to send the refund should there be a credit balance on the hospital billing transaction: 1-Coverage, 2-Guarantor, 3-Patient, 4-Custom Payee, 5-Address Override, 6-Payor, or 7-Plan.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.RFND_GUAR_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the guarantor associated with the refund code on the hospital billing transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.RFND_COVERAGE_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the coverage associated with the refund code on the hospital billing transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.REFUND_PLAN_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the benefit plan associated with the refund code on the hospital billing transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.RECONCILIATION_NUM: Reconciliation number from a remittance run.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.RFND_CUST_PAYEE_C_NAME: The custom payee for the refund (no system-released values).
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.CE_SRC_DEP_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the source deployment of the transaction. This identifies the location where the hospital billing transaction originated. This will have a value of null unless the transaction's deployment of origination and the home deployment are different.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.CE_POST_DT: The post date for the transaction.  This will have a value of null unless the transaction's deployment of origination and the home deployment are different.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.CE_FILED_TIME: The date and time that the transaction was filed.  This will have a value of null unless the transaction's deployment of origination and the home deployment are different.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.CE_HM_OFF_TXTYP_C_NAME: The type of transaction that took place.  This will have a value of null unless the transaction's deployment of origination and the home deployment are different.  Some example values for this field are as follows: 1 - charge, 2 - payment, 3 - debit adjustment, 4 - credit adjustment.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.POS_SESSIONID: This column stores the unique identifier for the Point of Sale session.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.POS_TXID: This column stores the unique identifier for the Point of Sale transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.POS_TX_LINE: The Point of Sale transaction line number.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.ORIG_ETR_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the Professional Billing transaction that was the transfer source for this Hospital Billing transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.EXTERN_AR_FLAG_YN: External A/R Flag. This flag determines if an transaction's A/R is to be counted as belonging to an external agency (i.e., as bad debt). This flag is copied from the hospital account level flag. This flag is only used if external agency A/R has been enabled.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.ERX_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the medication record on the hospital billing transaction. This column will have relevant data for any pharmacy charges. It can be used to link to CLARITY_MEDICATION and other pharmacy tables.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.SUP_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital billing transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.SUP_ID_SUPPLY_NAME: The name of the inventory item.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.BAD_DEBT_FLAG_YN: Bad Debt Flag. This flag determines if a transaction's amount is to be counted as belonging to a bad debt agency. This flag is copied from the hospital account level flag. This flag is only used if account-based bad debt is used. This flag will be set to 'Y' if the account is in bad debt, 'N' otherwise.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.PMT_RECEIPT_NO: Stores the receipt number for a receipt printed during payment posting.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.RFND_AP_DATE: Stores the date on which the A/P system approved and processed the transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.RFND_AP_STATUS_C_NAME: Stores the action taken by the A/P system when it processed the transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.OPTIME_LOG_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the OpTime log associated with the hospital billing transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.INI_FILE_ATTEMPT_DT: Item to represent the date when the first attempt to file the transaction was made.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.RELATED_HTR_ID: This column stores the unique identifier of the related hospital billing (HB) transaction for this HB transaction. This will map to a HB transaction that is associated with the related hospital account.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.IMD_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the image associated with this hospital billing transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.DURATION_MINUTES: This column contains the duration of service in minutes.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.EB_PMT_HAR_RES_YN: Indicates whether hospital account restrictions are used.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.PMT_HAR_DIS_FROM_DT: The hospital account restriction discharge from date.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.PMT_HAR_DIS_TO_DT: The hospital account restriction discharge to date.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.OVERRIDE_XOVER_YN: Indicates whether this payment contained override crossover information.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.RESEARCH_STUDY_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the research study or client associated with this hospital billing transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.RSH_CHG_ORIG_HAR_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the original hospital account for a research charge.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.PAYMENT_NOT_ALLOWED: This column contains the not-allowed amount on the payment transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.EB_PMT_TOTAL_AMOUNT: This column contains the original payment amount. Original payment amount is the amount of the payment prior to getting split in split cases and if the payment is not split, then the original payment amount is the full payment of the transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.EB_PMT_POST_TYPE_C_NAME: The type category number of the post type used to post the enterprise payment.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.EB_PREPMT_POST_TP_C_NAME: The type category number for the pre-payment post type associated with this transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.PANEL_DT: The contact date of the panel procedure that is associated with this transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.PANEL_DAT: The contact date of the panel procedure that is associated with this transaction, in decimal format. Used to link with the CLARITY_EAP_OT table.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.ELEC_PMT_APRVL_CODE: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital billing transaction sent back by the merchant.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.ELEC_PMT_INST_TIME: Instant of when the payment was approved
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.IMPLANT_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the implant record associated with this procedure.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS.LINKED_HTR_ID: This item links two hospital billing transactions in the system. These transactions will be reversed and transferred at the same time.

HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2._TABLE_: This table contains hospital account transaction details from the Hospital Permanent Transactions (HTR) master file.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.TX_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital billing transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.REL_ACCL_INS_BKT_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the insurance bucket on the accelerated self-pay adjustment transaction in the self-pay bucket.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.IMPLIED_QTY: The implied quantity for the order at the time this charge was dropped.  This represents the quantity used to calculate the billing quantity on a pharmacy charge.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.IMPLIED_QTY_UNIT_C_NAME: This column stores the implied unit for the order at the time a charge was dropped. This represents the unit of the quantity used to calculate the billing quantity on a pharmacy charge.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.IMPLIED_UNIT_TYPE_C_NAME: The implied unit type for the order at the time a charge was dropped. This is where the unit was taken from (i.e. dispense unit, package unit, entire package).
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.LATEST_MED_ORD_DAT: This column stores the most recent Order contact date (DAT) for the medication Order.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.SYS_RECLASS_RSN_C_NAME: Stores the reclassification reason for a transaction reposted for system reasons.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.CHRG_AMT_SRC_FLG_C_NAME: The charge amount source flag category number for the charge transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.ORIG_ACCT_COMB_ID: This column stores the first account that a hospital billing transaction attempted to post to prior to combine accounts or combined account redirection. Resets upon transfer.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.PLB_PROV_ID: Stores PLB (Provider Level Adjustment) provider ID
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.PLB_FP_DATE: Stores PLB (Provider Level Adjustment) fiscal period date.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.PLB_REASON_CODE_C_NAME: Stores PLB (Provider Level Adjustment) reason code.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.PLB_REFERENCE_NUM: Stores PLB (Provider Level Adjustment) reference code.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.PLAN_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the benefit plan entered in Hospital Insurance Payment Posting. The payment poster can manually enter this item as a configurable column (configured in HSD settings) in Insurance Payment Posting. In this case, the payment poster can select only from the plans associated with the payer on the bucket that the payment is being posted onto. Adjustments posted during payment posting also are populated with the plan selected by the payment poster.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.RSH_MOD_TYPE_C_NAME: This column stores the charge's research billing modifier type. Having a value set here should mean that the charge should file to the patient account in order to bill to insurance, instead of filing to the study account. Thus, in most cases, the presence of data in this column should mean that RSH_CHG_ROUTE_C is also set to Yes, because the RSH_CHG_ROUTE_C column actually controls whether the study-related charge files to the patient or to the study budget.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.RSH_CHG_ROUTE_C_NAME: This column indicates whether a research-related charge should route to the patient account or the study account. In most cases, if the charge has a research billing modifier type, it will also file to the patient in order to be billed to insurance. However, the flag that actually determines when a charge will file to the patient account is its charge route value; the value in this column indicates the final determination whether the charge will file to the patient or to the study budget.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.ELEC_PMT_AUTH_CODE: Authorization code sent back by the merchant
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.TREATMENT_PLAN_CSN: The contact serial number of the treatment plan that generated this charge and order.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.TREATMENT_DAY_CSN: This column stores the contact serial number of the treatment day that generated this charge's order. This contact serial number can be linked to TRG_UPDATE_INFO.CONTACT_SERIAL_NUM for additional information on the treatment day. This treatment day is contained within the treatment plan specified in HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.TREATMENT_PLAN_contact serial number (CSN).
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.OTHER_ADJ_AMOUNT: Stores the other adjustment amount associated with this payment.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.OTHER_ADJ_REF_NUM: Stores the other adjustment reference number associated with this payment.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.OTHER_ADJ_COMMENT: Stores the other adjustment comment associated with this payment.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.PMT_DRG_CODE: This column stores the diagnosis-related group (DRG) code received on the remittance image.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.RATE_CNTR_ID: The rate center stored in a charge transaction. If a user has chosen to override the default rate center in the procedure master file, the user-entered override rate center will display here.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.RATE_CNTR_ID_COST_CENTER_NAME: The name of the cost center.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.DFLT_RATE_CNTR_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the default rate center from the procedure master file for a charge transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.DFLT_RATE_CNTR_ID_COST_CENTER_NAME: The name of the cost center.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.DX_PRIM_CODE_SET_C_NAME: The primary diagnosis code set configured in the facility for the service date of the transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.DX_ALT_CODE_SET_C_NAME: The alternate diagnosis code set configured in the facility for the service date of the transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.COMPOUND_DRUG_LINK_NUM: The link number for compound medication. The link number is used to group charge lines for components from the same compound drug on claim.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.LATEST_MED_ORD_DTE: This column stores the most recent order date (DTE) for the medication order. This column can be used to link to the CONTACT_DATE_REAL column in many order tables to find the correct contact.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.FIRST_TX_POST_DATE: This column stores the post date of the first transaction across hospital billing and professional billing in a chain of transfers, reposts, and reversals.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.ELEC_PMT_RESP_STS_C_NAME: Response message status from the gateway. This item is only stored for non-accepted responses.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.ELEC_PMT_RESP_MSG: Response message from gateway if transaction was not successful. We don't store a message (if any is sent) for accepted transactions.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.ACCT_FIN_CLASS_C_NAME: Holds the financial class of the account when the transaction filed. This is set for all transaction types.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.PRIMARY_PAYOR_ID: This column stores the primary payer of the account when the transaction filed. This is set for all transaction types.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.DISCOUNT_PERCENT: Stores the discount percentage applied to the self-pay balance.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.DISCOUNT_PROGRAM_ID: Stores the financial assistance program that the hospital account qualified for which caused the financial assistance adjustment to be applied.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.DISCOUNT_PROGRAM_ID_PROGRAM_NAME: The name of the financial assistance program record.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.DISCOUNT_COMMENT: Stores the additional details on why the discount is posted on the hospital account.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.PRIMARY_COVERAGE_ID: Holds the primary coverage of the account when the transaction filed. This is set for all transaction types.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.HAR_FIRST_POST_DATE: This column stores the post date of the first hospital billing transaction on the hospital account in a chain of reposts and reversals.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.POST_SOURCE_C_NAME: This column stores the source from which the payment is posted in the system. This is calculated based on the transaction source on the hospital billing transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.SERVICE_SPEC_C_NAME: The service specialty of the transaction. This may be different from the service provider's specialty for providers working outside their specialty. If this field has no value, the transaction specialty is the same as the service provider's first-listed specialty.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.BILLING_SPEC_C_NAME: The billing specialty of the transaction. This may be different from the billing provider's specialty for providers working outside their specialty. If this field has no value, the transaction specialty is the same as the billing provider's first-listed specialty.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.ORIG_BUNDPMT_ETR_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the professional billing transaction for the original bundled payment.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.ORIG_BUNDPMT_HTR_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital billing transaction for the original bundled payment.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.REFERENCE_AMT: Holds the reference amount that is calculated based on the financial class for the charge. This is set by the system and is applicable only to charges.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.REFERENCE_AMT_SRC_C_NAME: Holds the source of the reference amount that is used in the calculation of the reference amount. This is set by the system and is applicable only to charges.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.SRCHG_CLP_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the claim print record containing the values contributing to the surcharge adjustment.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.ADJUSTMENT_CAT_C_NAME: The adjustment category of the adjustment procedure at the time of posting.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.WRITE_OFF_RSN_C_NAME: The mapped write-off reason for the adjustment.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.SCHED_PMT_ID: Stores the scheduled payment record that resulted in this payment.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.PARENT_SCHED_PMT_ID: Stores the parent scheduled payment record that resulted in this payment.

HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3._TABLE_: This table contains hospital account transaction details from the Hospital Permanent Transactions (HTR) master file.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.TX_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital billing transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.CONTEST_RSN_C_NAME: Stores the contested reason. This is set only for charges.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.CONTEST_RESOLUTION_RSN_C_NAME: Stores the contested resolution reason. This is set only for charges.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.REVERSAL_RSN_C_NAME: Holds the reversal reason. This is set for all transaction types.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.TAX_RATE_DEF_CSN: This column stores the tax rate definition contact serial number (CSN) used in the tax calculation.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.IS_PRE_SERVICE_PMT_YN: Indicates whether or not this is a pre-service payment, such as a co-pay. This item is only populated for self-pay payments A payment is considered pre-service if it is a visit pre-pay or co-pay payment (such as during check-in).
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.FIRST_HTR_TX_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the first hospital billing transaction in a chain of transactions. Note that this chain will include transactions from both hospital billing and professional billing, so this item will return the very first transaction. For a given transaction, either column HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.FIRST_HTR_ID, or column HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.FIRST_ETR_ID will be populated. This is different from column HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.FIRST_TX_ID, which only chains back to the point that the transaction was transferred from professional billing.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.FIRST_ETR_TX_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the first professional billing transaction (ETR record) in a chain of transactions. Note that this chain will include transactions from both hospital billing and professional billing, so this item will return the very first transaction. For a given transaction, either column HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.FIRST_HTR_ID, or column HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.FIRST_ETR_ID will be populated. This is different from column HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.FIRST_TX_ID, which only chains back to the point that the transaction was transferred from professional billing.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.NO_PAY_CLAIM_TYPE_C_NAME: If this charge was posted to drive no-pay claims to be generated, this charge is intended to file and bill immediately. These claims will have different types/purposes. This item defines the type of claim that should be generated for the bucket that hold this charge.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.ORIG_PMT_SPLIT_TX_ID: This column stores the original unique identifier for the hospital billing transaction when payments are distributed or split.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.SVC_AUTH_ID: This item stores the social care service decision level authorization record associated with this charge.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.POSTING_DEPARTMENT_ID: The department where the transaction was posted.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.TAX_EFFECTIVE_DATE: This column stores the date used in the hospital billing system definitions that determine when this tax line went into effect.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.TAXABLE_AMOUNT: This item stores the amount that the tax is applied to
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.TAX_PERCENT: Percent used to calculate the tax amount
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.TAX_AMOUNT: This item stores the amount used for the tax
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.DIGITAL_WALLET_C_NAME: Holds the digital wallet used for an electronic payment. Stored on payments made from a digital wallet and on reversals. This item is not stored on refund transactions.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.ADV_BILL_DB_TX_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital billing transaction for this advance bill debit transfer adjustment.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.ADV_BILL_ESTIMATE_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the estimate used in posting this advance bill adjustment.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.IS_ADV_BILL_TRANS_YN: Indicates if this transaction an advance bill transfer system adjustment. Includes both credit and debit adjustments.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.SAVED_PMT_DIGITAL_WALLET_C_NAME: Holds the digital wallet of the saved payment method used to make the payment
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.RESEARCH_ENROLL_ID: The unique ID of the research study association linked to this transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.CLAIM_PRINT_ID: The payment's claim print ID with a matching invoice number.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.INS_WRITE_OFF_AMT: This item stores the insurance write off amount from the payment based on remittance codes that are mapped to an insurance write-off action.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.IS_SCANNED_CHECK_YN: Indicates if a transaction was made using a scanned check.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.E_PMT_RECEIPT_MSG: Saves the receipt message received from the gateway for an electronic payment transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.PAT_PMT_COLL_WKFL_C_NAME: This column contains the workflow category ID performed to collect a patient payment from the point of view of the user. For example, MyChart eCheck-in vs. MyChart One-Touch.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.MYC_SIGNIN_METHOD_C_NAME: This column denotes how the patient or guarantor logged in to MyChart to either post the payment or create an agreement that will post a payment via Auto Pay. Only populated for agreements made via MyChart.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.POSTING_MYPT_ID: This column contains either the MyChart account that created the agreement that resulted in the self-pay payment (if applicable) or the MyChart account that posted the self-pay payment.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.POSTING_MYC_STATUS_C_NAME: This column contains either the status of the MyChart account that created the agreement that resulted in the self-pay payment (if applicable) or the status of the MyChart account that posted the self-pay payment.  An active MyChart account status is defined as whether a MyChart user could log into the account with a user name and password. Accounts that are not yet active, deactivated, or are proxy accounts are considered inactive.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.EB_TX_SOURCE_C_NAME: This column stores the enterprise posting module for the transaction. This is calculated based on the hospital billing transaction source for the transaction. For reversals, the module will always match the module of the reversed parent transaction.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.LINKED_PARENT_TX_ID: Stores the parent HTR ID in a linked child HTR.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.RELATED_ETR_TX_ID: Applies only if you have enabled Consolidated Self-Pay Balances functionality. Stores the professional transaction ID of the related transaction. This will only be populated on transactions that were mirrored from professional billing.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.PMT_PLAN_AGRMT_SCHED_PMT_ID: The unique ID of the transaction's target guarantor's active payment plan agreement record at the time of filing.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.IS_EST_PRE_SERVICE_PLAN_PMT_YN: Indicates whether this payment was made on an estimated balance on a payment plan at time of filing ('Y'). 'N' or NULL indicates that the transaction is not a payment, the payment is not on a balance on a payment plan, or the balance was not estimated at the time of filing.
HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.IS_PRE_SERVICE_PLAN_PMT_YN: Indicates whether this payment was made toward a hospital account on a payment plan that was added by an estimate ('Y'). 'N' or NULL indicates that the transaction is not a payment or the payment was not made toward a hospital account on a payment plan that was added by an estimate.

HSP_TX_AUTH_INFO._TABLE_: This table contains the authorization information for each hospital transaction.
HSP_TX_AUTH_INFO.TX_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital billing transaction.
HSP_TX_AUTH_INFO.LINE: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
HSP_TX_AUTH_INFO.AUTH_COVERAGE_ID: This item is the list of coverages the associated Authorization values are being applied to.
HSP_TX_AUTH_INFO.AUTH_NUM: This item stores the list of authorization number overrides for a charge. This item cannot be set at the same time as Authorization ID (I HTR 833).
HSP_TX_AUTH_INFO.AUTH_ID: This item is the list of authorization records linked to a charge
HSP_TX_AUTH_INFO.AUTH_SOURCE_C_NAME: This stores the source of the authorization link.
HSP_TX_AUTH_INFO.AUTH_OVRIDE_USER_ID: This item stores the user who was responsible for the last authorization assignment.
HSP_TX_AUTH_INFO.AUTH_OVRIDE_USER_ID_NAME: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
HSP_TX_AUTH_INFO.AUTH_UPDATE_DTTM: This item stores the last time the authorization was updated either by the system or a user.
HSP_TX_AUTH_INFO.INCL_IN_AUTH_CHG_CNT_YN: This column indicates whether the charge contributes to the used count of the authorization linked to it.

HSP_TX_DIAG._TABLE_: This table contains hospital account transaction diagnoses from the Hospital Permanent Transactions (HTR) master file.
HSP_TX_DIAG.TX_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital billing transaction.
HSP_TX_DIAG.LINE: The line number in the results of a query. Because multiple diagnosis codes can be associated with one charge, each diagnosis will have a unique line number.
HSP_TX_DIAG.HSP_ACCOUNT_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account associated with the hospital billing transaction.
HSP_TX_DIAG.POST_DATE: The post date of a transaction.
HSP_TX_DIAG.SERV_AREA_ID: The service area with which a transaction is associated.
HSP_TX_DIAG.DX_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the diagnosis code.
HSP_TX_DIAG.DX_QUAL_HA_C_NAME: A qualifier entered with a diagnosis code in charge entry.

HSP_TX_LINE_INFO._TABLE_: This table contains Line level transactions information from Hospital Permanent Transactions (HTR).
HSP_TX_LINE_INFO.TX_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital billing transaction.
HSP_TX_LINE_INFO.LINE: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
HSP_TX_LINE_INFO.HSP_ACCOUNT_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.
HSP_TX_LINE_INFO.POST_DATE: The post date for the transaction on the hospital account.
HSP_TX_LINE_INFO.SERV_AREA_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the service area associated with the hospital billing transaction on the hospital account.
HSP_TX_LINE_INFO.LL_REV_CODE_ID: This column stores the line-level revenue code for the hospital billing transaction on the hospital account.
HSP_TX_LINE_INFO.LL_REV_CODE_ID_REVENUE_CODE_NAME: The name of the revenue code.
HSP_TX_LINE_INFO.LL_CPT_CODE: This column stores the line-level CPT code for the hospital billing transaction on the hospital account.
HSP_TX_LINE_INFO.LL_MODIFIER: This column stores the line-level modifier info for the hospital billing transaction on the hospital account.
HSP_TX_LINE_INFO.LL_SERVICE_DATE: This column stores the line-level service date for the hospital billing transaction on the hospital account.
HSP_TX_LINE_INFO.LL_BILLED_AMT: This column stores the line-level billed amount for the hospital billing transaction on the hospital account.
HSP_TX_LINE_INFO.LL_ALLOWED_AMT: This column stores the line-level allowed amount for the hospital billing transaction on the hospital account.
HSP_TX_LINE_INFO.LL_NOT_ALLOWED_AMT: This column stores the line-level not-allowed amount for the hospital billing transaction on the hospital account.
HSP_TX_LINE_INFO.LL_DED_AMT: This column stores the line-level deductible amount for the hospital billing transaction on the hospital account.
HSP_TX_LINE_INFO.LL_COINS_AMT: This column stores the line-level coinsurance amount for the hospital billing transaction on the hospital account.
HSP_TX_LINE_INFO.LL_COPAY_AMT: This column stores the line-level copay amount for the hospital billing transaction on the hospital account.
HSP_TX_LINE_INFO.LL_NON_COVERED_AMT: This column stores the line-level non-covered amount for the hospital billing transaction on the hospital account.
HSP_TX_LINE_INFO.LL_POSTED_AMT: This column stores the line-level posted amount for the hospital billing transaction on the hospital account.
HSP_TX_LINE_INFO.LL_ADJ_AMT: This column stores the line-level adjustment amount for the hospital billing transaction on the hospital account.
HSP_TX_LINE_INFO.LL_REASON_CODES: This column stores the line-level reason codes for the hospital billing transaction on the hospital account.
HSP_TX_LINE_INFO.LL_ACTIONS: This column stores the line-level action string for the hospital billing transaction on the hospital account.
HSP_TX_LINE_INFO.LL_CONTROL_NUMBER: This column stores the line-level control number for the hospital billing transaction on the hospital account.
HSP_TX_LINE_INFO.LL_QUANTITY: This column stores the line-level quantity from remittance payments.

HSP_TX_NAA_DETAIL._TABLE_: This table contains the not allowed amount (NAA) calculation details for an insurance payment transaction.
HSP_TX_NAA_DETAIL.TX_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital billing transaction.
HSP_TX_NAA_DETAIL.LINE: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
HSP_TX_NAA_DETAIL.NAA_DTL_STEP: This column stores the calculation step to be shown in the not allowed amount calculation detail on the transaction detail form. It may include other characters for aid in display formatting.
HSP_TX_NAA_DETAIL.NAA_DTL_DESC: This column stores the description of a calculation step to be shown in the not allowed amount calculation detail on the transaction detail form.
HSP_TX_NAA_DETAIL.NAA_DTL_VAL: This column stores the value calculated or used in a calculation step to be shown in the not allowed amount calculation detail on the transaction detail form.

HSP_TX_RMT_CD_LST._TABLE_: This table contains remit code lists from the Hospital Permanent Transactions (HTR) master file.
HSP_TX_RMT_CD_LST.TX_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital billing transaction with associated remit code lists.
HSP_TX_RMT_CD_LST.LINE: The line number in the results of a query. Each remittance code list will have its own line.
HSP_TX_RMT_CD_LST.RMT_CODE_LIST_ID: This column stores the unique identifier for the remittance code used for the hospital billing transaction.
HSP_TX_RMT_CD_LST.RMT_CODE_LIST_ID_REMIT_CODE_NAME: The name of each remittance code.
HSP_TX_RMT_CD_LST.RMT_AMT_LIST: This column stores the remittance code amount associated with transaction.
HSP_TX_RMT_CD_LST.RMT_CODE_EXT: This column stores the external identifier for the remittance code associated with the hospital billing transaction.
HSP_TX_RMT_CD_LST.GRP_CODE_LIST_C_NAME: This item holds the reason group code associated with the reason code.

INVOICE._TABLE_: This table includes the basic data for the invoice (INV) record. It contains one row for each used INV record (excluding unused pre-allocated invoices). Note that a row in this table can correspond to multiple claims sent.
INVOICE.PAT_ID: The patient ID associated with this invoice.
INVOICE.ACCOUNT_ID: The account ID that is associated with this invoice.
INVOICE.SERV_AREA_ID: The ID of the service area associated with this invoice.
INVOICE.LOC_ID: The ID of the revenue location associated with this invoice.
INVOICE.POS_ID: The ID of the place of service associated with this invoice.
INVOICE.DEPARTMENT_ID: The ID of the department associated with this invoice.
INVOICE.UB_COVERED_DAYS: The number of covered days for a uniform billing claim.
INVOICE.UB_NON_COVERED_DAYS: The number of non-covered days for a uniform billing claim.
INVOICE.UB_COINSURANCE_DAYS: The number of coinsurance days for the uniform billing claim.
INVOICE.UB_PRINCIPA_DIAG_ID: The principal diagnosis for the uniform billing claim.
INVOICE.UB_TYPE_OF_BILL_STR: Stores the type of bill that was sent out on the claim.
INVOICE.PROV_ID: Stores the ID of the billing provider associated with the invoice.
INVOICE.ACCT_SERIAL_NUM: Stores the account serial number associated with the invoice.
INVOICE.PAT_SERIAL_NUM: Stores the patient serial number associated with the invoice.
INVOICE.RQG_ID: Stores the requisition grouper ID associated with the invoice when there is no patient record.
INVOICE.TAX_ID: Stores the tax ID associated with the invoice.
INVOICE.TAX_ID_TYPE: Stores the type of tax ID associated with the invoice.
INVOICE.TREATMENT_PLAN_ID: Stores the treatment plan ID associated with the invoice.
INVOICE.INSURANCE_AMT: Stores the insurance amount for the invoice.
INVOICE.SELF_PAY_AMT: Stores the initial self-pay amount for the invoice.
INVOICE.INIT_INSURANCE_BAL: Stores the initial insurance amount for the invoice.
INVOICE.INIT_SELF_PAY_BAL: Stores the initial self-pay amount for the invoice.
INVOICE.BILL_AREA_ID: Stores the bill area associated with the invoice.
INVOICE.BILL_AREA_ID_BILL_AREA_NAME: The record name of this bill area, financial subdivision, or financial division.
INVOICE.PB_HOSP_ACT_ID: The Professional Billing Hospital Account ID.
INVOICE.RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME: This column shows the status of the invoice record.

INV_BASIC_INFO._TABLE_: This table contains basic invoice information. Each column in this table is from the INV 100 related group, and each line in the table corresponds to a claim that was sent for this invoice (INV) record.
INV_BASIC_INFO.LINE: The line number for the invoice number associated with the invoice record. Multiple invoice numbers can be associated with a single invoice record.
INV_BASIC_INFO.INV_NUM: The specific invoice number for the bill or claim. Subsequent invoice numbers may be secondary claims or primary claims that were resubmitted to the same payer.
INV_BASIC_INFO.INV_STATUS_C_NAME: The status for the invoice number.
INV_BASIC_INFO.FROM_SVC_DATE: The from (minimum) service date for the invoice number. This date is determined from the transaction on the invoice with the service date furthest in the past.
INV_BASIC_INFO.TO_SVC_DATE: The to (maximum) service date for the invoice number. This date is determined from the transaction on the invoice with the most recent service date.
INV_BASIC_INFO.INV_TYPE_C_NAME: The claim type for the invoice number. This column identifies whether the invoice number is a bill/statement or a claim.
INV_BASIC_INFO.DEMAND_CLM_IND_C_NAME: This column identifies the invoice number as being a demand claim.
INV_BASIC_INFO.CROSS_OVER_YN: Indicates whether the invoice number is a crossover claim. This usually only applies to secondary claims and indicates that although the claim associated with the invoice was created, it was suppressed from a claim run.
INV_BASIC_INFO.MAILING_NAME: The bill/statement or claim mailing name for the invoice number.
INV_BASIC_INFO.MAILING_ADDR: The bill/statement or claim mailing street address for the invoice number.
INV_BASIC_INFO.CITY_STATE_ZIP: The bill/statement or claim mailing city, state, and ZIP Code for the invoice number.
INV_BASIC_INFO.REF_ID_REFERRING_PROV_NAM: The name of the referral source.
INV_BASIC_INFO.VIS_NUM: The visit number for the invoice number.
INV_BASIC_INFO.TAX_ID_NUM: The tax ID/IRS number for the invoice number.
INV_BASIC_INFO.TAX_ID_TYPE: The tax ID/IRS number type for the invoice number.
INV_BASIC_INFO.CANCELED_INV: Contains a list of all the canceled invoice numbers associated with the invoice record.
INV_BASIC_INFO.REPLACED_INV: Contains a list of all the replaced invoice numbers associated with the invoice record.
INV_BASIC_INFO.CLM_CHANGE_RSN_COD: Contains a list of all the claim change reason codes associated with the invoice record.
INV_BASIC_INFO.CLM_CHANGE_COMMENT: Contains a list of all the claim change comments associated with the invoice record.
INV_BASIC_INFO.MAIL_PHONE: The mailing phone number for the invoice number.
INV_BASIC_INFO.ALTPAYR_INV_YN: Identifies if the invoice is for an alternate payer.
INV_BASIC_INFO.LATE_REPLACEMENT_C_NAME: Flag to indicate the late replacement claim status of the invoice.
INV_BASIC_INFO.CLM_EXT_VAL_ID: The unique ID associated with the claim external value record for this row. Values derived from the claim print record or edited by the user will be stored in the claim external value. Form output will be based on the claim external value.
INV_BASIC_INFO.CLM_DX_CODE_SET_C_NAME: The code set of the diagnoses on the invoice.
INV_BASIC_INFO.FILING_ORDER_C_NAME: This column holds the filing order position of the claim coverage at the time claims were processed.
INV_BASIC_INFO.DEMAND_CLAIM_YN: This column indicates whether the invoice was created in a demand claim run.
INV_BASIC_INFO.SRC_INV_NUM: This column stores the invoice number that generated the current invoice number.
INV_BASIC_INFO.PREDETERMINATION_YN: Stores a Yes/No indicator that the associated record represents a request for a predetermination of benefits.
INV_BASIC_INFO.PREDICTED_PAY_DATE: The predicted payment response date for a claim based on historical trends for the payer.
INV_BASIC_INFO.SUGGESTED_FOL_UP_DATE: The suggested initial follow-up date for a claim based on historical trends for the payer.
INV_BASIC_INFO.FINAL_FOL_UP_DATE: This item shows the final date all the follow-up records were completed and is based on the last Completed Date (I FOL 122). It will only have a value if all of the follow-up records are currently completed. Should one reopen, this value will also be cleared.
INV_BASIC_INFO.CLM_CLOSED_TIMELY_YN: Denotes if the claim closed prior to its Suggested Initial Follow-up Date, whereby it was no longer outstanding to insurance. The claim closed date is based on the CRD item of the same name (I CRD 86) if set, else the Final Follow-up Completed Date (I INV 133).

INV_CLM_LN_ADDL._TABLE_: This table holds additional line-level information about the invoice (INV) specific to a given invoice including any line-level overrides.
INV_CLM_LN_ADDL.INVOICE_NUM: The invoice number related to this claim line.
INV_CLM_LN_ADDL.PROC_OR_REV_CODE: This is the procedure revenue code
INV_CLM_LN_ADDL.REV_CODE_DESCRIPT: This is the revenue code description
INV_CLM_LN_ADDL.POS_CODE: The place of service type for this claim line
INV_CLM_LN_ADDL.UB_CPT_CODE: This is the Common Procedure Terminology (CPT) code for this institutional claim line.
INV_CLM_LN_ADDL.EOB_ALLOWED_AMOUNT: The service line's explanation of benefits adjustment amount.
INV_CLM_LN_ADDL.EOB_ADJUSTMENT_AMT: The service line's explanation of benefits allowed amount.
INV_CLM_LN_ADDL.EOB_NON_COVRD_AMT: The service line's explanation of benefits non-covered amount.
INV_CLM_LN_ADDL.EOB_COINSURANCE: The service line's explanation of benefits coinsurance amount.
INV_CLM_LN_ADDL.EOB_DEDUCTIBLE: The service line's explanation of benefits deductible.
INV_CLM_LN_ADDL.EOB_ICN: The explanation of benefits internal control number for the claim line.
INV_CLM_LN_ADDL.EOB_INV_LVL_YN: Identifies if this explanation of benefits is for the invoice level.
INV_CLM_LN_ADDL.EOB_COPAY: The service line's explanation of benefits copay amount.
INV_CLM_LN_ADDL.EOB_COB: The explanation of benefits coordination of benefits amount.
INV_CLM_LN_ADDL.CLAIM_DENIED_CODE: Claim denied code for this claim line on this invoice.
INV_CLM_LN_ADDL.REMIT_CODE_ID: Remittance code for this claim line on this invoice.
INV_CLM_LN_ADDL.TEXT_MESSAGE: Message associated with the remittance code for this line on this invoice.
